115.content:
"He's at it again.", says a lone hyena, sitting by himself at a table in a cafeteria. Right across from the cafe building is a gym, where he keeps his full attention at a weight-lifting patron. The patron is a large, brawny jaguar, pumping an arm with a heavy dumbbell, and taking his sweet time doing it. The hyena sighs.

"Whatcha starin' at, Roddie?" The grey and black-spotted hyena gets interrupted by his friend, a red-feathered parrot, who sits across from at the table with a platter of food. "You staring at that Tristin guy again?", the polly asks while taking a bite out of his burger.

Roddie sighs again to himself, while looking away. "Yeah...I guess."

The bird replies with his mouth full, "Ya know, you never told me how you know about him." He gulps his food down. "Or why you seem so interested in him."

"Oh. I never did?" Roddie was surprised himself. "Well Tucker, me and Tristin used to be good friends." Tucker suddenly spews out the drink he got into Roddie's face. The hyena frowns, "...Is it really that surprising?"

"Sorry I...just realized this wasn't what I asked for. But still, you were friends with a big guy like him?"

Roddie wipes himself up with a napkin. "Before he was even big as a matter of fact. We used to talk about stuff amongst each other all the time back when we first entered high school. To others, we seemed like the perfect pair. Of friends that is."

Tucker isn't doing a very good job of chewing with his mouth closed. "Mm. Go on."

Hyena lowers his head down, "Then, out of the blue, Tristan decides he wants to start working out, and becoming one of those big guys we used to see on the wrestling team."

"Man...", the parrot awes. "Sure looks like he's succeeded."

"He did, during our sophmore year. He was really pumped and all about getting big, and got big fast. He was soon getting the attention of other schools, and a few colleges. But...we kinda started to grow apart too.", Roddie explains sadly.

The parrot burps. "Oh? How come?"

"Well, one day, he asks if I wanted to start working out with him. I said no. He said it was okay, but then he started to devote more and more of his time working out, until we didn't talk no more." Tucker lets out another unnecessary burp, and sounds more intimate with his food than Roddie's story. "You know, I was hoping you'd be more interested in my story than all that food."

"Hey, I'm listening!", he blurts with his mouth full once again. He then gulps it all down. "So, you guys hate each other?"

"What? No!", Roddie yells. "We just don't talk anymore. Though...I do kinda wish I could be as big as him."

The polly burps once more. "Why not start now? I'm sure you can start working out with him as your personal trainer or somethin'."

"Mm... Nah... We haven't spoken in years. It'd be kinda awkward."

"Mm! Well, why not me? I'd be happy to help you out.", Tucker replies happily.

"Yeah... This coming from the guy who chugged three burgers down in five minutes." Roddie gets up out of his seat and puts his backpack on. "Look, I'm just gonna head home. I'll see ya around."

"See ya!"

Roddie made his way back home and headed straight into his room. He laid on his back thinking what would it be like if he was still friends with Tristan. Roddie wasn't sure how it would turn out but he missed Tristan. Tristan was one of his closest friends and now he was gone. To get his mind distracted, Roddie reached for a comic book on his night stand. On the cover of the comic book was a muscular wolf in black and red tights. There were bold letters over the wolf that spelled "Muscle Wolf."

Roddie skimmed through the pages seeing the incredible feats of strength that Muscle Wolf was performing inside the comic book. Roddie's mind played tricks on him as Roddie saw Tristan's face in Muscle Wolf's place. Roddie tossed the comic book aside and sighed. He felt so confused. Roddie missed his friend while at the same time felt envious for strength and power. Maybe if Roddie was as big as Tristan they would be friends again.

Roddie turned his head towards the comic on the floor. It layed opened to the back where all the ads were. Roddie got up and picked up the comic. He then saw an ad that caught his eye. There was a before and after picture of a scrawny lion to a bodybuilder-looking lion. Right next to the picture was an image of a bottle of supplements. The ad said, "Tired of being weak and scrawny? Try our new 'Growth Spurt' supplements! You won't regret it!" Roddie looked at the ad with intrigue. Could it really be true? Roddie knew the ads on backs of comic books were fake but he felt so desperate of getting his friend back. Maybe it was worth giving a try. Roddie wasn't sure.
115.title: Hyena

133.content:
Xander climbed the mountain feeling hot and tired. Xander, a blue wingless dragon, decided to go on a journey alone, which was probably a bad idea. But he heard rumors of a great treasure on this mountain and he couldn’t pass by on an opportunity that could make him rich, especially in his world. His world was a magical and dangerous one. He had no means of defending himself if he ever came across any danger. He didn’t have an ounce of muscle on his scaly body. He didn’t even have wings. Xander always found it ironic because dragons were one of the strongest beings in the world and he had neither muscle or wings. Maybe if he gets the treasure, he can find someone with magic powers and who can make him much, much bigger, and pay them then.

Hey, he didn't have much to lose. Literally. He only had a small ax-like weapon, which he could barely lift, a few pieces of gold he scrounged up, the few pieces of clothing (Armor plates that only covered his chest and forearms, and an underwear-like loincloth). He left for his trip to what was known as Acrid Mountain. Properly named because of the hot lava that swelters inside it. He was told no one has ever set foot to the top. When he said he would scour the mountain, he received nothing but laughs and hurtful comments. He didn't care, least not for them anyways, he just wished he could be big and strong, so he could show them who's boss. He had thoughts of going back down once or twice, but he already got this far. Wasn't going to be that long until he reaches the top of the mountain. He had to press on.

The next part Xander came across was a path on the side of the mountain that was broken apart. It was a pretty long gap for him to jump over. Seems the only way he could get across was by jumping for a long tree branch that hung in the middle. He takes a deep breath, even though his heart was pumping awfully fast. "Well...here goes nothing.", he gulps. The dragon takes a couple steps back, and then makes a run for it. He leaps for it the moment his foot touches the edge of the cliff and manages to reach for the lone-growing branch. He ends up swinging around the branch a few more times than he expected, but finally swings himself up and about. While in motion, he sees the great a looong way down, and then realizes he wasn't going to reach the other side. In a split second, he pulls out his weapon and quickly uses it like an extra-long arm to reach the other side of the cliff. "Oh goodness...", he sweats.

He manages to pick himself up, his whole body sweating after his crazy feat. "That...was close..." Xander continued climbing the mountain. As he got closer to the peak, the hotter he got. He wiped the sweat off his scales and huffed a few breaths. After what felt forever, Xander finally arrived to the top of the mountain only to be disappointed.

As Xander looked around, he only saw a pool of bubbling lava, no treasure, no items, not even a monster. There was nothing. Xander couldn't help but feel mad making smoke come out of his nostrils. "I can't believe it! I came all this way to find nothing! How can this be happening?! Here I am trying to prove myself, only to find absolutely nothing!" Xander kicked a rock to the side. Suddenly the piece of cliff he was standing began to crumble. Before Xander could even think, the cliff gave away into the lava along with him. Xander wished he had wings until he met what appeared to be his fiery demise.
133.title: Xander the Dragon

1331.content:
Xander expected the lava to cook his flesh while drowning. Except, nothing happened. The dragon felt fine. The lava didn't feel hot to him in all. In fact, in felt relaxing. Xander had no explanation as to why the lava wasn't burning him. Was it magical? Xander quickly swam up to the surface and heaved himself back on solid rock.

Xander stood up and looked back at the lava pool with wonder. "What the heck just happened? I should have been dead! I should have been fried alive! I should...I should..." Xander felt a tingle in his stomach. It felt very unusual. He never felt something like it before. However, the tingle quickly turned into an intense cramp. Xander wrapped his arms tightly around his chest and knelt to the hot ground. He closed his eyes and gritted his teeth. "Wh..what's happening to me?!"

Xander felt like the lava seeped into his scales and was heating up his entire body. Without realizing, his arms grew thicker showing some slight muscle definition and larger biceps. His chest broadened wider giving him stronger shoulders, thicker pecs, and slight definition in his abs without giving him actual abs. His legs twitched as they expanded more giving him stronger thighs and calves. Xander couldn't explain why but he felt like he was getting taller and stronger but nothing prepared him for what was next.

His back suddenly began to feel really sensitive, so sensitive that it ached. Xander thought something was crawling on his back and begged it to go away but instead it provided more pain. Blue limbs with a thick and armored membrane grew out of his back! Bones grew longer, nerves developed, and muscles expanded while Xander was undergoing unbelievable pain. Suddenly the pain just stopped out of nowhere. It mysteriously disappeared as it first appeared.

The aching dragon stumbles to get back on his feet, barely even taking notice to what just happened to him. He looks around, feeling a little better now that the pain in his body was gone. He looks around and comes across his weapon on the ground. He sighs. "Well, best be getting back to town." Soon as he reaches for his weapon, he realizes that his arm wasn't as bony as it was just before he fell into the lava. To his surprise, it was much thicker than he thought, thicker than he ever could have imagined. He then takes a gander all along the rest of his muscly frame. It wasn't anything he'd take part in a bodybuilding competition with, but definitely well-built to get enough attention. Plus he can finally pick up his own weapon with east, which is a plus one.

He was getting pretty excited with his new body and muscles, but then finally takes notice of something fluttering involuntarily behind him. It was his new wings. It seems another dream had come true for him, owning his own pair of wings, and they were fairly large too. He starts test-driving his wings out, making them flutter up and down, in and out. It wasn't long until was able to fly himself a few feet off the ground. Guess being a dragon and all, controlling a pair of wings is just natural to him. "This is great! I can finally fly!" The next thing Xander had his eyes set for was town. "I'm gonna show them what I've got now." Just before he flies off, he pulls out a small empty bottle and fills it up with the lava he fell in.

He stuffs the bottle in his pocket and then sprouts his wings to take off. He flew up higher than he expected, but handling was a breeze. In a only a few minutes, he reaches his place of birth and catches everyone by surprise. "Townspeople, I have come back from atop Acrid Mountain, and survived!" People of all different species walked up to him as he holds up the bottle of lava he had. Everyone was impressed, though one person speaks up, "Um, wasn't he a tad skinnier before he left?" Xander came up with a simple explanation. "Oh, I, I just got a really good workout climbing the mountain is all." Everyone believed him quite easily being that no one else has been known to traverse up there. Although there was someone watching who didn't believe a word of what Xander said.
1331.title: Athlete build

13311.content:
"You expect me to believe that?" Xander and his audience turned to see a large, muscular, and armored lion standing in the back of the crowd. Everyone knew him as Leon, the biggest and strongest warrior in the town. He saved the town a few times from monsters but he was very arrogant and proud. Xander clutched his fist at the sight of him.

"What are you talking about, Leon?" asked Xander.

"You want us to believe that a scrawny guy like you climbed that giant volcano and lived? You can't leave this town for less than an hour without getting hurt! I say you just got a potion that looks like lava and telling a story!" Despite Leon's behavior, the townspeople looked up to him and thoughts his logic to be true. The townspeople slowly dispersed as Xander pleaded them to stay and show them that his story was true. Before leaving, Leon mocked, "Grow a few pounds and inches before trying to get yourself killed!"

With nothing else to do, Xander went back to his home with his bottle of lava. As he entered his room, Xander let out smoke from his mouth in anger. "I can't believe it! After such an experience, a jerk like Leon had to ruin it for me! I don't care if he saved the town a hundred times! He's no warrior! If I was a warrior, I wouldn't be like him!" Xander let out a big sigh and fell onto his bed sulkily. He then turned his head to his bottle of lava. It made him think. What if the lava made him grow before? If it did it before, could it do it again? Xander got up from his bed and held the bottle in his hand. He looked at it deeply still wasn't sure if his theory was correct. However, after being humiliated in public, Xander thought it was worth the risk. The dragon took the top of the bottle and drank the lava. Once again, it felt pleasant to him. No burning in his throat, just a soothing sensation seeping into his stomach.

The lava's magic starts swirling around Xander's insides. He could feel his body start to swell up from inside, almost as if he was ready to blow. His legs began to explode down below as he drops to his knees. His calves and thighs shred apart and fill out to show more size and definition. He gets knocked back on his back to the floor and his abs start to rise up from the bottom up. He even earns a fourth row to add to his well-sculpted abdomoinals. His pecs start to inflate even more over his powerful chest, and his back starts to spread from beneath. He could feel his back muscles increase in size and make his lats spread out on the floor. His forearms start to increase as the lava's power fills up his bulging arms. He must have earned another five inches to his beefy bi's, as wells as broaden out his shoulders even more. The last to was his neck, which fills out to make even the dragon's throat to attract attention.

Xander manages to pick himself off the ground, wiping the sweat off his forehead. "Whoa...that was intense..." Another change brought upon the reptile's frame was his voice, which sounded a tad deeper and manlier than before. "Sweet!" He then picks up his lone weapon, which felt like a stick in his grasp. "Hmm... Maybe I can find a new weapon along the way." He carries it around his back, and then flies right out the window. "Leon wants to see a big man, I'll show him how big and buff I get when I come back!"
13311.title: A big strong warrior

1331111.content:
When Xander had full visibility of the monster, all it was was just a puny centaur, almost no muscle definition in the human like upper part of it but it had extremely large muscles in its horse like lower half. The caves lighting must have played a trick on him! The puny century still looked extremely hostile towards Xander.

"Normally, I wouldn't stand a chance against something like this... but now...I can just punch this thing into submission easily." Xander thought arrogantly as he punched the tiny centaur once and it fell over, seemingly dead. Xander walked past it's "corpse" chuckling to himself.

But as soon as his back was turned to the defeated centaur, it got right back up, growing in both height and strength in mass comparable to the force of the punch that was dealt to it. It's upper body muscles grew to a size comparable to Xander's after his first lava dip and it grew to about his height in Xander's current state. "Back for more huh?" Xander said with an increasing sense of arrogance, not realizing that his opponent had grown. Xander punched it multiple times, each with increasing force, all seeming to do little to no damage.

Once exhausted, Xander fell back and watched in horror as the once puny centaur grew at an exponential rate. It's biceps and triceps exploding with muscle mass as a rate much MUCH faster than Xander ever could with any amount of the lava potion, if he had any left that is. It's pecs growing at the same rate. It had even grew four more rows to its amazingly muscular abdomen. It's skeleton audibly snapping, popping, and overall growing to an defense size. After it's giant spurt, the centaur now stood at over four times the size of Xander.

Xander still in awe, the centaur roared at him and flicked Xander across the cave, Xander hitting the side of the cave with enough force to cause a crater in the wall. Xander barely able to get up he massive blow, he realized that he needed to kill it in one hit, or else it would just get even more massive with each non-fatal blow.

"Son of a F___ing b___h." Was all that Xander could muster with the towering sense of grief, hopelessness, and anger.

Should Xander fight of flight?
1331111.title: Growth on impact

Xander awoke from his unconsciousness, everything hurt, he used his one and only healing potion to soothe this for awhile. "Holy crap!!! I actually did it! Through complete luck, chance, and lazy writing I beat it!" Xander limped over to the gigantic corpse to see if it had any loot. He pulled multiple items from the dead behemoth, including but not limited to: Armor, Weapons, Gold, and a magical artifact.

Xander equipped all of his new gear but was left puzzled over this artifact. It was mainly made out of brimstone but it's eyes were genuine green emeralds. Xander could not take his eyes from the artifacts. Xander felt an all to familiar pain course through his body, increasing in intensity with every second he gazed into the

135.content:
Frank sighed in front of a giant poster. The poster displayed a giant tiger and wolf gritting each other as if they were ready to fight. On top the poster said, "Fist Brawl!" It was an ultimate fighting competition was going to start up soon.

Ever since Frank was a young alligator, he was always fascinated by fighting. He even wanted to do it himself. However, he never got the body needed to fight. Frank's arms and legs looked like twigs and his chest was flat. Frank rubbed his scales to feel nothing. No muscle, not even fat. He was just average. Frank once tried to bulk up by going to the gym and eating right but he got no results no matter what he did. Frank felt discouraged and gave up on his dream thinking he had no means of achieving it.

Without having anything else to do, Frank decided to walk back home. As Frank walked, he passed by giant swamp and smiled at it. He had a lot of memories in that place. Back when he was a kid, Frank would just swim around endlessly without a care in the world. However, he didn't make a lot of friends because of that. Everyone thought the swamp was gross and it was crazy for anyone to swim in it. Frank couldn't really explain himself. Being in the swamp felt natural to him. For nostalgic reasons, Frank walked to the swamp and stopped at the small harbor that sat on the shore.

Frank sat on the harbor and looked at his reflection in the water. The only friends that accompanied him were the fish swimming through the muddy water and the mosquitoes buzzing across his face. Frank looked at himself pathetically. He was small, weak, and lonely. It seemed like nothing in life could go his way no matter how hard he tried. Still... things would get better eventually... right? How long would life kick him until it finally relented?

Frank sighed as he dipped his toes into the water below, his clawed digits sinking under the water almost vanishing in the slightly murkiness as his green scales blended with the water's color. The cool water lapped gently at his feet as he scooted forward and sank them in further. He liked the coolness the water brought to his body. It was a nice change heat that plagued the county he lived in. It seemed like everyday nature was trying to steam cook his body, so this was a welcome relief. Even if people did think he was weird, he still enjoyed this water.

Frank thought about possibly going for a swim, it had been a long time since he last taken a swim here, but very little had changed since then. It was still the same place as always. It brought a smile to his face as he gave his feet a small kick, sending small ripples through the water. Today was certainly hot enough for a swim, plus he remembered always feeling better after a swim in the water. It always seemed to have a calming effect and helped him forget his troubles for a little while.

Frank pulled his scaly feet out of the water and leaned forward into the swamp. He stuck out both his hands and scooped up some of the water into them. Even though it was hot enough for a swim, Frank didn't want to get wet because he didn't have his swim suit. Frank splashed the water into his face. Every drop seeped into his pores and it felt great to Frank. Frank felt the refreshing water go into face to wash away the heat and sweat from his brow. The svelte alligator let out a sigh of relief and laid back on the harbor.

Suddenly, he the cool water began to feel hot on Frank's face. The heat from his face made Frank think he was getting sick. The heat quickly spread from his face to the rest of his body. Frank thought he was boiling inside a volcano and had no idea what was going on. Frank could feel tension and pain on every flat muscle on his body. He gritted his teeth for a second till it stopped suddenly. Frank rose up puzzled. He had no idea what happened. First he was feeling intense pain then all of sudden it stopped. How? Why?

Frank figured something was in the water that made him sick. To think he used to play in it. People always told him he would get sick but never did until now. Frank guessed he was too old for the swamp and it was time to leave, so he got up and headed for home.
135.title: Frank the Alligator

1352.content:
Frank arrived home feeling exhausted. Without doing anything else he headed upstairs to his room to change and go to bed. The alligator made his way to his room and closed the door behind him. He then reached for his dresser to get his pajamas on. The mirror beside the dresser caught his eye and Frank stood in front of it.

He couldn't help but feel sorry for himself. He felt like such a loser and there was nothing to do about it. Frank figured the best thing for him to do was to live with it. As he took off his shirt to change into his sleeping shirt, Frank stood in awe. His chest looked leaner than before. He didn't have any solid muscle but he saw some slight definition on his chest and arms. He had no idea where it came from.

Frank wondered how did the sudden change happen. He hasn't worked out in a long time and, even if he did, he would never get results this fast. Then it hit him, the sensation he got from the swamp. Frank wondered, "Did the water do this to me?" The swamp water did make him feel strange and gave him a sensation in his muscles. It had to have been it. Frank quickly put his shirt back on, slipped into a pair of swim trunks, and rushed back to the swamp.

Frank found himself at the harbor. He wasn't entirely sure why he came back. Maybe out of hope. If the swamp water truly bulked his body slightly when Frank splashed himself, could it do it again if he swam in it. Frank took off his shirt leaving his trunks on. He looked at his reflection in the water again. Hopefully, it would be the last time he would see himself like that. Frank took a deep breath and dove into the swamp. The was a moment where it seemed liked the world had frozen. It was almost an agonizingly slow descent into the water. It wasn't until he felt the cool water engulfing his body that time started picking back up and he burst through the surface of the water into the cold beneath.

It enveloped his body like a thick blanket, seeping into every pore of his body. He expected it to be chilly, but it seemed much colder than it had been before. It wasn't like it had been before, this kind of cold was... unnatural. It dug into every fiber of his being, almost making him screaming and forcing out a great deal of oxygen. His lungs felt like they were going to explode from the air slowly being processed inside, with no means of letting it out. He had to squirm wildly before he actually found the bottom with his feet and he pushed up, tilting his head upwards towards the filtered light.

The moment his head broke the surface, a shrill cry of pain tore through his body as his face burned with an agonizing intensity. It was like he'd started bathing in acids, he could almost feel it eating at his body as he clawed at the wood deck that hung on one corner of the water and he tried pulling himself up with all his might, sinking his claws into the wood as he hauled himself, but with each inch of his flesh exposed tot he air, the burning became far more intense, the air setting his body alight with a fire that burned deep beneath his scales.

Frank gasped weakly as the all consuming pain threatened to overwhelm him. This water was contaminated with something, he didn't know what, but it felt like whatever it was had been eating away his body from the inside. His thoughts spun around the idea that he could possibly die from this. "I... I can't die.... why do I have to die?" His head slumped back as the burning intensified with each breath and he figured this was the end of him.

Suddenly there was a new sensation. It started off as a light tingle that danced across his scales, almost like someone was running their hand across his body. Wherever the sensation moved across, the burning would dull, as if someone had poured some kind of cooling gel onto his flesh. Suddenly there was this odd sensation a cross between the burning and the tingling, although now it felt like his flesh was buzzing. He had only found enough strength to sit up when he cried out as the sensations spread up his arms, which suddenly began to pop and the bones groaned loudly as his biceps started flexing rapidly in the midst of a powerful spasm.

Every movement his arms made felt both painful and almost numb at the same time, as he stared down his eyes widened in complete shock as he found his arms actually growing bigger. They had been so lean before and now the bicep was ballooning like someone was pumping it full of air. One in, then two, then four, suddenly ten whole inches of pure muscle rose from what had once been lean and below average arms. Compared to the rest of his body it looked like he'd been taking steroids, except the growth only happened in his arms, making him look deformed.

When he felt a pop in his chest as he ribs shifted around his oxygen supply suddenly cut off and he found himself trying to gasp futily for air. He had to hold back his tears which threatened to spring up as his chest actually started widening beneath his gaze. It looked fairly strange as the bones shifted and moved under his scales, giving him a very bony and unpronounced chest, when suddenly he felt that tingling again burrowing down into the deepest parts of his muscles. Suddenly those bony pecs were rising up like great hills, expanding and spreading wider as his shoulders worked to adjust themselves to his now very large and throbbing biceps.

His mind couldn't even begin to process what was happening to his body. It was like he was turning into some sort of monster, a seriously buff looking monster. He let out a small cry as he hunched over, his stomach burning painfully, against his now massive chest it felt like his skin was on fire, radiating heat like a furnace and he had to lean back as much as he could before his back rested against a pole that helped steady the dock above the water. His stomach suddenly looked like he had something alive squirming just under his scales.

The idea frightened him to the point he was almost crying before the movements began slowing, the stomach suddenly now sporting a very impressive and hard six pack abs. He hadn't even realized his muscles had been developing through the pain. To anyone else his lower body would appear deformed to the rest of him, like he had been physically disabled from the waist down so his lower half looked frail compared to this hulking new upper body, but with this tingling burning down his legs that was about to change.

Frank tilted his head back, trying his best to keep his breathing under control, but with the burning that grazed his body like molten metal it was almost impossible. He could feel the muscles in his legs exploding with growth, each second his legs twitched and had a spasm as the muscles thickened, his thighs swelling up with muscles that had once been barely lean. As they grew bigger and bigger, Frank felt a very painful constriction on his waist. It was like his body was fighting off this new and amazing change that was morphing his body. He was scared that his body would suddenly reject this change and he would shrink back to how he was before.

When he looked down, he almost felt a smile spread of his cheeks at his own silliness as he realized that it was his swim trunks causing him so much pain. The sturdy fabric wasn't meant to withstand such an immense change in size. These shorts were much too small for this new body, and as his legs suddenly expanded a bit more, there was a large rip as the shorts tore apart. Once that horrible pressure vanished, so did the burning and the tingling that had held his body in it's powerful grip.

It took several minutes for his heart to finally calm down, and a couple minutes longer for him to actually move. This body was so much bigger than his old one. The muscles, especially his biceps, would grind up against his chest uncomfortably and he had to practice walking back and forth along the dock before he could figure out how to walk without rubbing his arms against his body. When he paused to look down at the water, the sight almost took his breath away.

There was no longer a scrawny little gator he was staring it. It was if that kid had never existed. His eyes were still the same, he could see his brown eyes reflecting the light into the water, but it seemed like it was a dream. His body looked... incredible. His muscles bulged hotly even when they weren't flexed. It was amazing. nothing ever felt so strange or so wonderful.
1352.title: Grows to the size of a bodybuilder

13522.content:
It was nice to see himself this way. With a flex of an arm, his bicep rose up greatly and beautifully. Thanks to the swamp, he had the body he had always wished for. All those things he wanted to do as a big, buff alligator, he may very well be able to do them all now! He looks down at his reflection again, and then performs a great muscle pose that involved him having to hunch up his enormous back, lowering both his beefy arms against his chest to flex his bi's and tri's, and let out a proud grunt. Just like one of his big favorite fighters.

He couldn't help but get carried away, flexing only harder and harder, until he hears a tear from his trunks. Or at least, what's left of them. His shorts were about to fall, but he ends up having to hold them. Although it's nice having a stunning, muscular body, he isn't ready to be naked in public. At least not in his underwear. Lucky for him, he didn't live too far from the swamp, and with his enlarged, thick legs, he's sure to make it home in no time.

Frank does just that, and boy did he run. He was sprinting, even though he wasn't aware of it, and before he knew it, he was home. He quickly shuts the door behind him and heads up the stairs into his room. He rips off what remnants of his trunks he had left and tosses it aside. Kind of a waste of a good pair of shorts, but he can always get new ones. He scrounges around his room to find something else he can wear. He apparently had a small assortment of gym shorts and such he thought he would be able to wear after working out for a short period of time. Lucky for him once again, this finally happened. He finds a pair of blue shorts that look like they could stretch if ever he were to grow more. Just as he was about to put them on, he ends up taking a good look at himself in front of a full-length mirror in his room.

Even though he was only in his underwear, he couldn't help but stare into that godly body of his. He looks down at his shorts, and then at himself in the mirror. Hey, why not take the time to see just how big and strong his body is now? He walks up to the mirror, putting on a big grin. No lie he was liking what he sees. Never thinking he could be so big so soon. He remembers a few muscular poses his favorite wrestler did, and decides to do them himself. He gets down on one knee and sets his elbow on the other, giving his big arm a huge flex and making his bicep nearly double in size. "Incredible..." He was also do the same with his legs, his thighs swelling out as if they were overfilling his leg.

Next thing he does is gets back on his feet and rests his hands on his hips. Another pose he remembers quite well is one that involved a proud lat spread while standing proud. Frank does just that, his eyes almost couldn't believe what they saw. His pecs were huge, his lats really showed just as he envisioned, even more so, and he could almost visualize himself standing side-by-side when him, holding the same pose. His lat spread was fantastic overall. For the next few minutes or so, he just flexes his each muscle on his body, seeing just how big he is all over, and getting great results overall.

Another idea popped into Frank's head. What if he were to become even bigger? Frank felt all this power flowing through his body. He admitted to himself he craved more. He wanted even bigger muscles and bigger body. Besides, if he was going to be a fighter, Frank would have to be the biggest, strongest, and toughest alligator around. Also, with his new gym shorts on, Frank should also be ready for any sudden growths he might encounter. It was settled, it was time for another dip in the swamp.

Frank made it there in no time thanks to his powerful and sculpted legs. He thumped his way onto the harbor and looked at his reflection in the water. Frank smiled and flexed a bicep to the lake as sign of saying thanks to it. He then pictured his reflection more bigger and muscular. Without hesitation, Frank jumped into the swamp to achieve his dream in the murky depths.

Frank swam through the water with ease thanks to his size and his species. As an alligator, Frank felt like he could stay in the cool water for hours without going up for air. He swam across the lake hoping to feel something soon besides the chill on his scales. Then, he felt it. Frank felt something cooking inside his core. It was like a volcano ready to erupt. Last time, Frank endured intense pain during his growth. Frank intended this to be different. He was going to enjoy every minute of this new change.

First, Frank felt his bones crack and shift. His spine popped to make the gator look taller, and his arm and leg bones grew longer and thicker to store the power Frank craved. Frank flinched from the slight pain but he knew it was necessary to be the biggest gator around.

Frank held his rippled stomach as if he was just punch there. In response, he just smiled anxiously. The heat in his gut quickly spread to the rest of his body and Frank felt the change happening to his whole body all at once. The first thing Frank noticed was his arms. His already beefy arms grew thicker inch by inch. He counted 3...6...10 inches of solid muscle shoved into his arms. Veins even began to pop underneath his scales pumping blood and adrenaline to feed Frank's growing muscles.

Frank's chest was next. His pecs swelled into even bigger mountains on steel. They even involuntarily bounced out of pleasure. His whole chest broadened and grew more defined as both his pecs and abs grew larger. His abs quickly shifted a new row of muscle giving Frank a solid eight pack. More veins slithered across Frank's flesh with their throbbing synchronizing with Frank's heart beat.

Frank's legs grew even more powerful than before. His thighs pumped up against the blue gym shorts making the shorts look like they were painted on Frank's legs. His calves even plumped to match the strength of an Olympic runner.

After what felt like an eternity, Frank's growth subsided and Frank quickly rushed to the surface to see the bigger, stronger and tougher gator that he is now. Soon as he swam to the harbor he picks himself up out of the water. He nearly stumbled on one of his legs, but that was all part of the experience. It did take a bit, but he was able to stand properly on his substantially thick treetrunk legs. He held an arm up and stares into his meaty bicep. It was even bigger than he could imagine, along with the rest of his titanic body. He didn't even need to flex just to see his muscles rise up and down. He flexed his arms down to make his pecs rise up, and he could feel them plump up beneath his chin. An incredible experience indeed.

He decides to hightail it back home. Getting used to his house was kind of a chore now too, but again, nothing he couldn't handle. He looks right back into the mirror, standing just as tall as it now. Looks like he'll have to get a bigger mirror too. With a flex here, and flex there, his muscles swell out impressively. He turns around to see his back, taking notice of his neck, which was nearly filled with muscle. His back had that rippling V-shape he had always wanted, all between that display of shredded meat. He could help but wag his large tail like a dog's, almost knocking the mirror down to the floor. "Oops!"

After a sigh of relief, he looks at his muscular, godzilla-like self into the mirror and thinks, "What next...?"
13522.title: Grow some more

135221.content:
Morning had come to fruition. Frank would normally start to wake up with his alarm clock, but it seems his excitement got the better of him. His eyes peeled themselves open, staring at the roof of his room. It seems he was starting to outgrow his bed, his lower legs now laying in the air. He gets up on the bed and swings his massive legs to his bedside. He lets out a yawn, a bigger, chest-pumping yawn he has ever let out, and that was what completely woke him up. He jumps out of his bed and heads to the bathroom, not before taking a passing look at himself through his trusty full-length, giving his muscular reflection a quick flex of his bulging bi, and a quick wink.

After washing off a bit and getting himself ready for the day, he heads downstairs and turns on the TV. No doubt Frank was getting comfortable walking his bulging body around the house in only his tight shorts. Hey, even only in his briefs is just dandy. Getting a wondrous, hulking body gave him a huge of confidence he thought he'd never receive on his own. As the daily news went into commercial, there was one commercial that came on. One that he never forgets. It was of a wrestling/fighting tournament that was coming to town. One of the fighters featured was one of his biggest idols.

His name was Bill. His fighter name Bill the Badger. Ever since Frank was a youngling, he always used to watch Bill once a night for years, ever since Bill got his start as a fighter on TV. And ever since then, Bill has only gotten bigger and bigger, until he was the proud pro fighter he is now. He was what made Frank want to start working out in the first place. Even though that didn't work out, he still looked up to him for inspiration, because Bill always played by the book, and always looked up to his fans. Who could want a better idol than that? Later into the commercial, it mentioned there being a starting program for rookies at the gym, where they can also sign up to start fighting with a surprise fighter for lessons.

"Sweet! Hmm... I wonder who the surprise fighter is gonna be?", Frank ponders, thinking about all the possibilities. Noticing his sinewy arm again, he gives it a tightening flex to watch his bicep swell out hugely, "Heh. I wonder what cool moves I can show them." He gets pretty distracted with himself, flexing and pumping his muscles and feeling just how solid and robust they had gotten. The last thing the commercial mentions is that tryouts start today. "Oh shoot! I completely forgot about that!"

He sprints up to his room (thanks to his profound, thickening legs) and quickly grabs his old gym bag that he stopped using. He stuffs a few other gym clothes and some towels inside. He would make himself some protein shakes and stuff like that, but time was of the essence. Plus he can always get some there. Out of his room and down the stairs he goes, but he realizes something just as he was out the door. "Oh, waitaminute.", his eyes glance down, seeing he was only in his shorts, "Maybe a tank-top and shoes would be nice." Frank quickly rushed upstairs and put on a tank-top that hugged his chest tightly and defined his pecs and abs underneath. After quickly putting his shoes on, Frank used his Olympic running legs to get to the gym on time.

The titan gator arrived at the gym in no time. As he opened the door, the smell of sweat and dedication flew into his nostrils. He missed being into the gym training hard like Bill would but he would always get teased and stared at for being so small and trying to pump iron. It was one of the reasons he had to quit his training. Today was a different story. He met other muscular guys working hard for the fighting tournament and now Frank was being stared at for his godly frame. Frank had to blush as he made his way to the sign up sheet. The sheet was sitting on a table next to a muscular lion. As Frank approached, the lion looked up at the alligator completely startled.

"Ca...can I help you?" stuttered the lion.

Frank nodded. "Yes, I'm here to sign up for the fighting tournament." Without saying another word, the lion gave Frank a pen and Frank knelt down to write his name. After he was done, Frank said, "Thanks."

"Good luck, I'm sure you'll be one of the promising ones to win," said the lion. Frank just smiled at the lion and flexed his bicep to him. The lion dropped his muzzle admiring the strength and shape erupting from Frank's scales. Frank left the lion wondering how this gator got so big.

Frank figured that, as long as he was here, he train to find out how much power his muscles had. Before he could even touch the equipment, Frank caught a sight that made his own mouth drop. He saw a giant muscular badger throwing punches and kicks at a punching bag. It was the famous pro fighter, Bill the Badger. Frank couldn't believe it. His hero was here in the gym with him. Frank was completely starstruck. He couldn't move or say anything. Frank just saw Bill's giant muscles throbbing as they impact on the bag.

Bill's muscles put Frank's new body to shame. Bill's biceps were several inches bigger, his chest more ripped and defined, and his legs more chiseled and ready to burst from Bill's shorts. As for his height, Bill was probably at least a foot taller than Frank. If Frank ever got the courage to talk to Bill, Frank would meet him at his bulging pecs.

As much as Frank was happy for Bill, Frank felt a little inferior as if all his muscles disappeared. How could he match up to a guy like Bill the Badger? Would Bill tease him for being smaller than him despite his muscles? Frank felt like the only way for a big star like Bill to notice him was to be as big as the badger...maybe bigger. Frank smiled thinking it was time for a quick "workout session."

Frank quickly left the gym and ran to his secret swamp. As he walked to the harbor, Frank could feel the harbor shaking every time he took a step. He saw his reflection again and gave off one last bicep pose before diving into the swamp. The thought of being a bigger and tougher fighter than his own hero excited him so much he didn't bother taking off his tank top and shoes. He just dove head first.

Frank swam through the murky water excitedly waiting for something to happen. He didn't know when it was going to happen but he knew it was and he was pumped for the change to occur. Then Frank felt the familiar bursting inside of him and he smiled. The growths were getting less painful and more pleasurable. The only pain he still endured was his bones popped and shifted while growing longer and thicker to make Frank look taller.

Frank then felt the intoxicating warmth in his body growing bolder and bolder by the second. His already rippling arms grew more several inches as they soaked in the dirty water. Frank watched his biceps throbbed with his heartbeat as they grew. Beat by beat, his arms grew 5...7...12 inches of raw power.

Frank then focused on the tightness in his chest underneath the tank top he still had on. His powerful chest broadened even more making his pecs look more like pillows and his abs bulged more outward. Frank could see clean cut definition in his chest as if the shirt was painted on him. Finally, his abs formed another row of muscle giving him an incredible ten pack before the tank top burst off his body.

Frank then felt tingling in his legs. His thighs looked more like steel pipes coiled together and shoved into his legs and his calves pumped outward even more giving him the power to kick down anything and outrun anything. His growth even went down to his feet which grew several sizes and burst out his shoes. His growing legs filled out Frank's shorts but no enough to burst.However, they suddenly looked like speedos.

Frank's body finally cooled down and Frank rushed to the surface to see the bigger titan than he was before. Instead of picking himself out of the water, he decides to leap out of it like a jumping fish, but then lands with a loud thud on the harbor. He stands his body up straight, feeling even more pumped than ever as the sun shines its rays right down onto his strapping, robust frame. He looks down to see shoes were long gone, but that's okay, he didn't mind having to walk on his bare, clawed feet. He also noticed his shirt was gone revealing a powerful body just waiting to be flexed.

As for his body, his flexes one arm, and it was as if watching a peaking mountain rise, as well as his immense tri peaking out underneath. He had never seen anything so huge before, other than on his idol Bill. He takes turns flexing and pumping both arms, watching them grow sinewy and hefty one-by-one for dramatic effect. He then flexes them down and then grunts as he flexes them up to make his meaty pecs stick out, and bounces them a few times with great development. Rubbing his thick palm over his enlarged abs, they felt even more defined than he thought, especially for a 10-pack. Grunting again, he gave them a hard flex and could feel them pop out beneath his clawed hand.

The last he decides to check out are his enormous tree trunks he calls legs. Sticking one beefy, bulgy leg out, he was able to stretch it pretty far. For someone as big as he is, he sure is flexible. Guess that's normal for aquatic creatures. Running a hand along his well-built thigh, he didn't even have to flex it to feel the large amounts of blood pumping through, or even the amount of horsepower stored inside that he could reach. It's no use though, he had to see it. It a heave, he flexes his leg greatly, making his quads, hamstring and calf swell and plump to wondrous proportions, looking so striated and veiny, his shorts sleeve looked ready to pop.

"Nice!", he yells proudly, giving his inflated calf a good rub. "Wait till Bill sees me now!"
135221.title: Go to the gym

1352211.content:
Back at the gym, Bill was getting lots of from the many gym-goers around him, signing autographs, showing off his muscles, even taking a few pics. Suddenly he hears a couple gasps around. He looks up and does the same, watching the herculean gator make his way to the front.

Frank puts on a competitive face, "Bill, the name's Frank. It's a pleasure to meet-", he sticks out his shredded arm pretty quick, Bill was too distracted by Frank's incredibly defined chest. It was so clean cut Bill thought it was cut with solid diamonds.

Frank couldn't help but blush, what with the many looks he was getting of his shirtless and ripped upper body from the attendees around him, even Bill, who puts on a look of approval. He then grabs the gator's hand to shake, "Pleasure meetin' ya! Been meaning ta see what big guys they had here in town.", He smirks. Frank chuckled making his gigantic chest puff and ripple with power.

"Very good," said Bill. "I'm impressed! Come on, I got a few protein shakes to spare. Let's talk for a bit."

"Yeah, sure thing," Frank did his best to keep his composure. Underneath that mountain of muscle was a fan screaming his head off. Frank and Bill sat next to a table next to the snack bar and Bill pulled out a couple of protein shakes for the two of them. As Frank took a sip, he felt the protein quickly nourishing his body quickly. He was even beginning to feel stronger than he was before. Frank let out a soft sigh after a gulp.

Bill started, "Frank, you're probably the biggest guy I've ever seen. I didn't think anyone could pack that much muscle." Frank blushed again. He didn't think he'd ever get this type of praise, let alone from his own personal hero. Then Bill asked the question: "What's your secret?" All the blood from Frank's cheeks and muscles flushed out of his body. What in the world was he going to say? Frank couldn't just tell Bill that he took a dip in a magical swamp that made him bigger than him. But at the same time, he hated to lie to him. Frank had to improvise.

Frank started, "I just did my routine, you know, workout. I also had a bit of a growth spurt...A really big one."

Bill chuckled. "Understatement of the year. Regardless, you look great."

"R..really?" asked Frank blushing again.

"Yeah, you got a great body and I think it'll help you fight big time in the tournament." Frank was speechless. He didn't know what to say. Before Frank could say anything, Bill finished his protein shake and got up from his seat. "So, how about showing me what you can do?"

"What do you mean?"

"I mean sparring. Let's see how fight with those muscles of yours." Frank smiled thinking this day couldn't get any better. Frank nodded and followed Bill the ring in the middle of the gym. The two opponents wrapped their hands and feet with bandages to keep them safe from injury. Frank and Bill entered the ring bringing their war faces.

"Don't think I'm going to go easy on you because you're bigger!" said Bill

"Then you take the first move!" replied Frank.

"You know what they say, the first punch always wins!"

"Prove it!" Frank let out a small snarl as Bill rushed in for an attack. Bill first tried to strike Frank by his side. He only ended up hurting his hand. Frank's giant abs protected him from Bill attack. All Bill did was give him a tingling sensation where the punch was. Frank let out chuckle and looked down at Bill. "That tickled." Bill expected as such so he kicked Frank's knee to take the giant gator to his level and set the advantage to himself. However, Frank's knee was even sturdier than Frank's chest. Frank let out another laugh and grabbed Bill by his shirt. Frank lifted Bill up to his level leaving Bill hanging a few feet from the ring. "My turn," said Frank. Frank slammed Bill to the ground and placed his gigantic foot on the badger's chest. Despite the badger's legendary strength, he couldn't lift the several ton of muscle off of him. Frank counted, "1...2...3!" Frank won without breaking a sweat.

Bill manages to sit himself up on the ground, rubbing the back on his head with one hand. "Dang. You've got some real spunk in ya, that's for sure."

Franks kneels down on one blasted leg, holding out his hand, "Need help there?", he grins.

Bill smiles back, getting a firm hold of the giant's massive palm to help him up. "Heh, thanks. Not bad for a firm start. Have you ever wrestled before?"

"A little bit, but I learned from the best.", Frank winks. The truth is he never wrestled much at all, other than those times as a child when he would pretend wrestle with his stuffed animals. If he wants to get better at wrestling he may as well start getting better at it now. "I'm still a little rusty though. Wouldn't mind getting a few pointers from you, if you're available."

The badger thinks a bit to himself, "Hmm... You know what, I like that idea.", he sneers. "But as for today, I was just gonna be working out with some of the gym folk. You should tag along."

Franks wags his tail excitedly, "Sure! I'd like that!"

As they walk out towards the gym floor, Bill gives his best pal a nudge against his thick abs, "Heh. We'll be like a huge workout duo. I'd like to see just how much you can lift."

"Yeah!", Frank screams with motivation. "Uh, me too." Perfect timing. Now he can see just how much he can handle.

Once down at the gym floor it was clear they've been getting some surprised looks from almost everyone in the room. Some of the bigger fellows were just as surprised, but just tried to keep to themselves. Luckily they had the large mirror walls to look back at them. As for the two wrestling buddies, Bill starts himself off with some arm curls. Frank just thought he do the same thing. They are best buds now after all. The badger had a pair of 250's in his hands, but Frank goes for the 300-pound dumbbells. Frank was about to start, while the shredded badger was already getting into it. He made the crowd around him feel mesmerized, just staring at the bulking, hefty peaks that were his guns, and they were about ready to fire after each curl.

Frank was just as impressed, but he knew he can do just as good. The gator got to a slow start but he soon had big guns just like his idol, even bigger as a matter of fact. Bill's arms looked incredibly sinewy and shredded now as his arms were coming to a slowly, satisfying stop, "98...99...100!" The badger huffs his chest, sighing with great relief. "Always great to start off with some good arm curls. He then takes a look at his muscly alligator friend. "Whoa..."

Bill noticed how incredibly pumped and ripped Frank's arms became during the gator's workout. They grew even bigger than before. Bill could have sworn that Frank's biceps and triceps grew between each rep. He was even surprised to see visible veins on the gator's scales throbbing as they pumped blood to supply the giant. Frank paused his workout and looked at Bill. "Something wrong?" asked Frank.

"No.." said Bill. "You're just full of surprises. With those arms of yours I bet you can lift a truck!"

Frank blushed again. "I don't know about that..." he said modestly.

"I do!" responded Bill. "You threw me around that ring like I was a rag doll. You even got yourself lifting 500 pound weights!"

"What?" Did Frank hear Bill right? Frank looked at his weights and looked at the numbers printed on them saying "500 lbs." Frank let out a slight gasp. He thought the weights were lighter. If 500 lbs was light, what was considered heavy to Frank? Not only was he bigger than his own hero but stronger too! "Wow!" said Frank. "Felt lighter than that!"

Bill let out a chuckle. "Guess you don't know your own strength," he teased. The badger then turned to the weight benches. "Come on, let's see what your limit is." Frank put his weights back and followed Bill to the weight benches. Frank was so excited about pumping more iron to his already giant frame that he laid back on the bench to grab hold of the bar. Bill slid some extra weight on both sides of the bar and said, "We're going to try something a bit heavier. Let's see how 750 pounds feels to you." Frank gave Bill a thumbs up and began to press.

Bill saw Frank's arms get pumped even more. Frank felt himself getting stronger after each rep. He didn't feel tired at all, rather energized. Frank did 20 reps after putting it back in place. "How do you feel?" asked Bill.

Frank just smiled and said, "Like I'm getting warmed up!" Bill couldn't believe it. This giant gator could withstand 750 pounds! Even professional weightlifters would struggle to lift that and Frank did it without hesitation. Bill then looked at the other weights and wondered if Frank could lift 1000 pounds. Frank was an unbelievable alligator. "This is going to sound crazy," said Bill, "But I'm going to add up to a thousand pounds on the bar. Think you can handle it?"

Frank was too excited about his strength to acknowledge what Bill just said. The gator just chuckled and said, "Bring it on!" Bill put on the weights and Frank starts pumping as soon as Bill's done adding. The weight was definitely more challenging than the previous weights Frank lifted. Frank's arms bulged out even more under the stress. Frank ran out of breath at 15 reps and stopped. Frank rose up to catch his breath puffing his chest up and down. "That felt...pretty good," said Frank between breaths.

Bill widened his eyes. A thousand pounds was Frank's limit. The badger then imagined what would happen if Frank passed that limit and got even stronger or bigger. He then smiled and laughed. He looked at the giant gator and said, "Frank, you got yourself a future in this field of work!"
1352211.title: Hang out with Bill

choices: Bill asked him how long he been working out
Frank asks bill to teach him some fighting moves
13522111.content: Frank is exited he always dreamed of being a pro fighter like bill but he never thought it would be possible before and now he can he gets up and says to bill. I am going to go onto the leg press now and before bill can respond frank gets up and goes to the leg press and starts using the weights he starts with a 800 pounds veins show across his legs as he starts his workout. After he does 15 reps he increases his weight to 1000 ponds as does those reps he feels a little more weight on them but feels like he can do more. He add 200 more pounds he then felt a lot of pressure on his legs as thick veins started to show on his legs he can fell this is his limit. Hun frank thought 120 pounds is my limit on my legs. He then noticed bill was just there watching.
13522111.title: Train

13522112.content:
Frank felt so pumped. He had a great body, had a great workout, and had great encouragement from his hero. Frank flexed his arms out of all the excitement. His biceps swelled to untouchable peaks with veins slithering from his shoulders to his wrists. Frank even let out a soft growl. Bill smiled and let out a soft chuckle. Frank blushed out of embarrassment and said, "Sorry, guess I got a little carried away."

"No apologies necessary," said Bill. "If I were as big as you, I'd act the same way."

"Do you...do you really think I can be a good fighter like you?" asked Frank.

Bill laughed again and slapped Frank's back. "You already are! You tossed me around in the ring like teddy bear! If you can take on me, you can take on anyone!"

"Take on anyone, you say?" The alligator and the badger turned to see a muscular rhino standing behind them. "You sure it was skill, or was it luck?" Just hearing the rhino's voice made Frank's blood boil. The rhino walked up to Frank meeting him eye to eye and equal in muscle. "I'll be more impressed if he could take on a much bigger guy, like me."

"Is that a challenge I hear?" said Frank.

"It's not a party invitation." Frank curled his hand into a fist tempting to punch the rhino's light out. Bill could see the anger stirring in Frank and got between him and the rhino before anything could start.

"Save your energy for the fight, kid," Bill said to Frank. Bill then turned to the rhino. "You can have your fight, but not today. We just finished training today and if he were to fight now, it wouldn't be fair. We'll settle this tomorrow."

The rhino just scoffed. "Fine, whatever," he then just walked away.

Frank gritted his teeth as the massive rhino was leaving. Bill did his best to calm him down. "Don't worry, kid. You'll get your chance. You can take him down."

"Yeah," said Frank, "No problem. No problem...at all."

Later that day, Frank shakes hands with his idol as they say their goodbyes for the day. Bill takes hi leave in direction and Frank takes his in the other, only it wasn't towards his house, it was towards the magic swamp. In a matter of minutes, Frank was standing at the harbor with his head held up high. He didn't want to waste any time, giving his reflection a quick flex of his bicep before he takes a dip. He bends down, flexing his mega thighs and calves as he jumps high into the air and dives into the mucky swamp. It was only for a few seconds though. After a couple air bubbles float to the top of the swamp, Frank leaps out high and lands on his hands and feet.

Frank was still covered with some swamp water, so he decides to patiently sit on his rump while he lets the swamp work its magic. He holds up his left arm, watching the muscles slightly balloon up, his beefy muscles rummaging against each other more than ever. He could feel the stretching, pleasureful effect taking its course along the rest of his body as it stretches to his other arm. He in turn flexes them both, almost looking like he was a muscled freak with disproportionately, peaking arms as large veins flow around his eye-popping biceps.

He could feel his bones pop to adjust to the rest of his growing body as his back muscles shred incredibly, the V-shape he once dreamt about even more noticeable than before under all that bulk! Feeling his chest starting to pulsate, he brings his arms in for a huge, crowd-pleasing flex with himself, even bouncing his pecs to the growing sensation. As it furthers down to his abdomen, his chiseled abs were just getting filled even more, simply filling up with more blood to accentuate his well-defined 10-pack.

Last to swell out were his legs, and boy did they swell. His once stretchy shorts seem to be reaching their limit as they start to tear on the ends over his enormous thighs. His calves plumped up beneath his thighs, and it felt great. His body must have grown another few inches. Just enough to not make that rhino guy suspicious. "Heh. Just wait till he sees this big guy.", he taunts, raising his arm up against his head so that he could feel his solid bicep meet against his cheek. Another successful growth spurt, he grins. He couldn't wait to get home and see just how big he had gotten.

The next day, Frank entered the gym with new shorts and met up with Bill. Bill turned to see his giant friend and smiled not realizing he grew a few inches. "The rhino's already in the ring. How do you feel?"

Frank cracked his knuckles and neck. "Pumped and ready to teach that guy there's only room for one big guy around here."

Bill gave a thumbs up. "That's the spirit! Go get him!"

As Frank walked to the ring, he saw the rhino already standing ready and waiting for him. Frank just smiled intimidatingly and leaped into the ring. The rhino looked pumped and ready to fight Frank. He also didn't realize the alligator's recent growth. Frank just looked at the rhino with fire in his eyes feeling pumped.

"So you decided to show up? Figured you'd wuss out," said the rhino.

Frank smiled. "Heh, I thought the same thing about you!"

The rhino had a short temper. Without saying another taunting word, he rushes to Frank to tackle him to the ground. Frank did not cower. He kept his blasted legs sturdy and braced for impact. Except, when the rhino grabbed Frank, it was like hitting a wall made of metal. The rhino tried to move the titan alligator with his meaty arms but Frank did not budge. Frank just laughed thinking the rhino's attempts were pitiful. The rhino grew scared as his fighting moves continued to fail him.

Frank figured it was time to end this fight. He grab hold of the rhino and lifted him above his head. Bill and the rhino were amazed by that feat. The rhino weighed several hundred pounds of muscle and Frank had him in his arms like he was a toddler. The rhino felt like he was on top of a skyscraper and the height between him and the ground of several feet scared him. Frank looked up and said, "That's the best you can do? Kinda sad..." With a loud growl, Frank tossed the rhino out of the ring and the rhino landed on the other side of the gym. The rhino stumbled up and ran out of the gym as quickly as he could. The rhino looked as if he just saw a monster, a really big and scary monster.

Frank flexed his arms hard in victory. Bill entered the ring to congratulate him. "That was great, kid! I told you he was nothing to you!" Frank smiled at Bill and continued flexing his godly body feeling like he was the king of the world.
13522112.title: Someone approaches

135221121.content:
Frank continued feeling amazing after his victory over the rhino. He truly felt like the strongest gator in the gym, probably the whole world. To make it even better, he had Bill the Badger right by his side supporting him. Frank let out a giant sigh of pride. "I gotta say, Bill," said Frank, "I feel amazing!"

Bill smiled. "As you should! A victory like this is worth celebrating!"

"How do you want to celebrate?"

"Hmm...how about you show off the muscles of yours? I want to see what kind of show they can put on!"

Frank liked the sound of that idea. He always loved flexing his muscles to himself and he didn't get a chance to flex after his recent growth. Frank saw the full sized mirrors next the weights and grinned. "Sure. Let's see these guns put on a show!"

Frank and Bill got out of the ring and walked towards the mirrors. As they stood in front of the mirrors, Bill stepped to the side and said to Frank, "Okay, kid, show me what you got!"

Frank struck a killer smile at his reflection and raised his arms to flex. He pushed his arms as hard as he could and saw his biceps rose high like a mountain and erupt with power like a volcano. Thick veins rushed through pulsating and synchronizing with his heart beat. Frank felt like he could lift a bus with his arms. Frank's biceps slightly brushed against his cheeks. Frank found that amusing since he was that big. Out of fun, he licked his biceps tasting the power they stored. Suddenly, the taste in Frank's mouth gave him more energy to flex every other part of his body.

Frank gulped a puff of air and pushed his chest forward. Frank's pecs and abs grew more in definition and looked clean cut. He could feel all the blood rushing through to make his chest look powerful. Frank then playfully bounced his pecs and rubbed his abs. He felt so much power in his chest it felt intoxicating.

Frank finally stuck out his legs and made his thigh blast muscularly. He ran his finger through the crevices of his thigh enthusiastically. His leg felt so strong he though he could kick a hole in the nearest wall with it. He then plumped his calf under his thigh and saw it as a clean cut slab of meat, a piece of meat that could help him run like an Olympic athlete.

As Frank finally stopped flexing he saw his muscles still keep their plump shape after relaxing. Frank was thrilled to see his body sturdier and stronger than ever. Bill smiled at each of Frank's poses. "Looking good, kid," said Bill. "If fighting doesn't work out for you, you could have a promising future as a bodybuilder!"

Frank blushed while scratching the back of his head making his arm and chest pump up unintentionally. "Hehe...thanks!"

Frank suddenly hears another another giggle, one that was too feminine to come out of his muscly chest. Looking into the mirror, he spots a beautiful fox doing cardio on a treadmill. She was facing towards the gator, so she got to see the whole show. Bill does the same, taking notice of the lean, orange fox. "Heh. Not ta mention you'll be quite the lady's man too.", he winks.

It was a tad unexpected, a lady falling for Frank like that, but Frank was sure it was nothing he wasn't prepared for, thanks to his large, bulky frame. He raises up one arm, flexing it in the mirror as if he was flexing it right in front of her. She took notice quite well, giggling again as her cheeks turned a tad red. Frank puts on a toothy grin, "I think I'm gonna enjoy this." He sticks out one meaty leg and turns around, strolling right up to the cute fox and setting an arm on the treadmill. "Hello.", he utters smoothly.

"Oh, uh, he-hello.", she blushes, not realizing just how big Frank was up close. "Wow... You're much...much, much bigger than I thought you'd be...", she giggles, nearly tripping on the treadmill.

"Hey thanks. Glad ya like whatcha see.", he smirks tensing his tight pecs a few times, nearly making her trip once again. Frank quickly turns off the treadmill. "How 'bout we talk a little more safely?", he chuckles.

The lean fox blushes more again, "Uh, yeah. Um...so what's your name?"

"The name's Frank.", the expansive reptile grins, holding out his large, meaty palm to her.

The female fox does the same, her hand only about a third as large over the rest of his, "My name is Erika. It's a real pleasure to meet you.", she grins happily. That was probably the cutest grin Frank had ever seen. No one ever smiled at him like that before.

Frank brings Erika's hand up close to kiss her palm, "It's a pleasure to meet you too.", he speaks smoothly. "Would you like I give you a small taste of just how muscular this alligator is?", he winks.

"I'd love to see that.", she answers excitedly. Frank takes a few steps back, making sure nothing or no one was gonna be in his way. He starts off with a simple flex of his arms, slowly pumping each arm against his chest one-by-one, each thick pectoral bulging out accordingly with each other. Next thing he does is set his hands on his hefty waist, then giving her the biggest lat spread she had ever seen. His pecs stretched out beautifully, as well as his wide lats and shoulders. The last would be his legs, though he decides to show off only one. Slipping up one sleeve to reveal just how much thigh meat he was hiding under there. With a mere, simple flex, his quads and calf grew overly pumped, as if it were ready to explode! Erika was flailing at this point, unknowingly pressing a button on the treadmill that sets it into high gear, "KYAH!"

Frank quickly sprints behind and catches her. She couldn't believe how fast he was. Frank smirks, flexing both of his shredded thighs enough so that they were able to hear fabric of his shorts getting stretched. "Them's some strong fast legs, eh?", he winks yet again.

"Yeah...", was all Erika could say.
135221121.title: Show off

1352211211.content:
"So...." Erika started somewhat nervously. "Where are you from? I haven't seen you around here before." Frank rubbed the back of his head trying to come up with an answer that was too bad of a lie.

"Well.. you see I've lived here in town my whole life, but... this is the first time I've been to this gym." Well that wasn't too bad and it wasn't a lie. Erika smiled, her gleaming with teeth reflecting a bit of light off the lights from the ceiling, making her beautiful grin even more dazzling.

"Well where is this other gym you were hanging around at? I've never really seen anyone as big as you are around here it's.. a nice change." Erika laughed as he stepped away from Frank, realizing she was still standing quite close to him. Frank smiled as he tried to change the topic.

"Well what about you? have you lived here very long?" Erika nodded her head as she leaned back against a pillar that stood near where she was.

"Only for about five years or so. I moved here with my parents after my dad got a promotion at work. He was making a lot more money so we decided to try and settle down somewhere different for a time, though I think my parents might end up spending the rest of their life here. Everyone here has usually been so friendly and it just seemed like a perfect place for them."

Frank nodded attentively showing that he was actively paying attention to her story. She looked up into his eyes, a smile started to grow again as she took in his muscles again, although they weren't flexed it didn't make them any less impressive. Frank saw her noticing his muscles again and smiled. "So, you like big muscles?"

Erika blushed deep red. "Umm...yeah. I'm sorry, I don't mean to sound weird."

Frank shook his head. "No, not at all. I like big muscles too." Frank then raised his arm to flex his bicep to her. Erika's eyes widened to see Frank's raw power appear right in front of her. She couldn't believe such power could be on a being. She smiled at the big friendly giant.

Still flexing his arm, Frank leans over and asks Erika, "You want to feel?" Erika just nodded and stretched out her hands. When she placed her hands on Frank's arms, she thought his power was amazing. She could feel the coolness of his scales while at the same time the warmth the bubbled underneath his incredible strength. Erika felt Frank's arm from shoulder to wrist.

"That's...amazing!" said Erika. "It feels like clean cut steel. Incredible!' It was then Frank's turn to blush.

"Well, these aren't just for show!" said Frank. "Want to see them in action?"

"Yes!" said Erika. "I would love to!"

Frank and Erika walked over to the weights. Frank smiled thinking of ways to impress Erika. He couldn't wait to start. Frank pumped his arms to her and said, "Let's get pumped!" First thing Frank comes across is a lat machine. He first sets the weight at an amount that he can withstand. Erika was surprised to see him put 850 pounds of weights on the machine. Frank wasn't even sure if he could lift that much, but he feels he can manage. He sets himself up on the machine and starts pumping in no time. The weights actually felt heavy in his grip, but that's just the way he likes it. He started working his lats at a fast pace, but then slows down enough so Erika could see every sinewy muscle being worked on his body. His lats jutted out so much it was as if they were wings. Before he knew it, he had already done over 50 reps. Now, on to the next thing.

The female fox was pretty excited to see Frank go for the bench pressing equipment. She sees him put almost a thousand pounds of weights this time. Erika couldn't believe it! She had thought Frank would be tuckered by now, but he's not tired at all. Just sweaty. Frank lies back and then lets his strapping muscles do all the work. Taking the barbell off its resting place, he manages to lift the with ease. It was pretty tough at first, but it was like he could feel his muscles surging with power from all the pump he was receiving. And that helped a lot. Feeling his arms stretch and heave, and feeling his mountainous pecs rise up and down beneath his chin was astounding. Erika couldn't believe what she was seeing.

The next workout had Frank doing deadlifts with 500-pound dumbbells in his mitts. He was doing them while standing away from Erika, that way she could get a great view of the gator's rippling back. He even let her feel it stretch and ripple apart while he was in motion. After that was his legs, which he thought were the most muscular and powerful of his whole body. Now is the time to put them to work. What better way than to pump them up with the leg press machine. He first sets the waits, putting them at a whopping 1250 pounds! This was a sight to behold for sure.

Frank sits his tight rump on the machine and gets his legs into position. Soon as he starts pressing his legs, the weights started to feel heavier than he expected, but he didn't want to stop there. Not while she was watching! His first press was slow, but he pushes his legs even further, making them swell up to gigantic proportions. Before he knew it, he was doing faster and faster leg presses in a matter of seconds. His legs burned and ached like crazy but he was enjoying it. He loved the feeling of burning, tensing, rippling muscle being pumped and pushed to its limit. His quads, hamstrings and calves were being blasted so much they were looking quite sinewy and striated all around, with a fair amount of pulsing veins to boot.

In Frank's mind he counts, "...96...97...98...come on...99...RRRGH...100!!" He sets his legs friend, and the weights fall down hard as it makes the floor around them rattle. The tired reptile lounges about, sticking his tongue form exhaustion while he tries to catch his breath.

Suddenly, he feels a pair of long arms wrap around his neck, "Ohmygosh! That was outstanding!", Erika yells, giving Frank's head a hug. "And...you're all...sweaty..."

"Heh... Sorry 'bout that.", he chuckles. They both look down and see Frank's shorts, which were all torn apart at the bottom from all the commotion. His legs ended up being even more shredded than usual, so much that they just stood there watching his legs pulsate beautifully from all the pump. "May uh...need to get a new pair of shorts. Again...", he snickers.
1352211211.title: Get to know Erika more

13522112111.content:
I think im done for the day, frank says to Erica. Erica look disappointed but understanding well okay I see ya later big guy and she winks at him. Bill comes up to him and says she a nice girl. With a knowing smirk.

Frank blushes and says I just meat her. Bill laughed at him. Frank says I'm leaving now it was getting to know you bill. Bill just smiles and says hey come back here tomorrow and I'll help teach you some fighting technics.

Frank goes home and starts to make supper and thinks about how today whent he spend time with his favorite role model, he met a cute girl and he found how strong he was he figures it was a great day and time for some well deserved rest.
13522112111.title: Go home and rest

13522112112.content:
Today was definitely a good day for Frank. He beat up that rhino bully, met a girl he really likes, and got the one of the biggest pumps he ever received, all in one day. He already said his goodbyes to Bill and Erika, now was the time he tended to one pressing matter: New clothes. Not only is it nice to by new clothes to support his new size, he really needs it. After his intense workout, he was left with nothing more than a shredded pair of shorts. He can't just walk into the clothing store in his current getup. Maybe he can find something to wear at home. His father once gave him a couple pairs of shirts he thought Frank would be able to wear, but didn't.

Back at his house, he found the pairs of clothes he was given. The only problem was that they were all polos. "Fine choice of clothing Dad.", Frank remarks to himself. At least they're the proper type of clothes he can wear at the store. He finds a few pair of khakis next. He should have expected this. His dad is a pretty avid golfer. He felt he may as well gotten a few golf hats
