to complete the set. The clothes felt a tad overbearing over his broad frame, but he'll manage until he get his own pairs of workout clothes and whatnot.

On his way to the sporting goods store, he kept getting lots and lots of stares from people walking around him. Mainly because he stood much taller and looked much handsomer to everyone around him. Well, at least these clothes are good for something. Bet his dad was expecting this all along.

He made it to the sporting goods store and already had a basket full of large shirts and shorts that would be perfect for all the workouts he'll be doing. This place also has triple and quadruple extra-large sizes, so that's something he'll have to look forward to. If ever. After about half an hour of shopping he takes his leave with a couple bags being carried around his arms, and not before getting a sweet compliment from the female cashier. It was late into the afternoon, and there wasn't really much else to do. Guess he'll just start trying out these clothes and see how they'll fit on his bulging frame. Let's turn those thought he had in his head of wearing these into a reality.

Frank returned home and quickly rushed to his room. He unpacked the shopping bag and laid his purchases on his bed. Frank felt proud of his clothing choices and confident that he'll look great with them on his meaty body. Frank quickly changed from his father's clothes into his new ones. He slipped a pair of deep blue jeans and covered his rippling chest with a plain red t shirt.

Frank turned to the mirror and saw he became even more handsome. His shirt hugged his bulky frame perfectly. He could see definition of his pecs and abs underneath, but the shirt didn't feel tight or look like it was ready to burst. Frank also had to admit that red was a good color on him. Frank playfully flexed his bicep and was surprised to see the sleeve of his shirt match the shape of his giant arm without tearing. Frank smiled out of confidence and relief. He thought he made some decent choices in clothing.

His jeans were similar to his shirt. They took the shape of Frank's tree trunk thighs and calves and Frank felt like he could still move in them with ease. Frank even tried tensing to see his jeans refused to tear. He finally had some trusting clothes that wouldn't burst off of him every time he worked out or grew in the swamp. Frank decided to put on a private fashion show for himself thinking his clothes looked great and made him feel great. Besides, he had the body of a super model.

Frank tried on everything else he bought: denim shirts, casual shorts and pants, and jackets. But he saved the best for last. He pulled out a blue tank top and black spandex shorts. Frank quickly put them on and smiled at the mirror as if it was a camera. The tank top showed off his beefy arms and his steel plated pecs, just the way Frank liked it. The shorts filled his tendon coiled thighs perfectly without tearing.

Frank took a deep breath and puffed his chest and arms. He saw his whole upper body swell right underneath his new clothes with clean cut definition. He felt incredible vascular power running through him that he felt like he was going to explode, but he didn't. Frank's clothes kept up with his poses and flexes without showing any weariness. Frank felt very satisfied. He could now go to the gym without feeling half naked without a shirt or worry about his shorts tearing whenever he pumps too hard. Not only was Frank ready for the gym, he was ready for the real world.
13522112112.title: Go clothes shopping

135221121122.content:
Frank set down the bags of clothes he had just bought and stopped to look in his mirror. These clothes fitted him so well and made his already massive muscles look even better if that were possible. Everytime his muscles flexed the clothes stretched looking as if they would rip, but they held firm and kept outlined his body so much it could make anyone stare with envy.

He'd be the life of any room he walked into with these massive muscles and he thought he might as well show them off the next time he went to the gym. Maybe Erika would take notice of his new outfit. He grinned as he brought his left arm up in a tight bicep flex, stretching his bicep to it's very peak, he could see the outlines of his veins pushing up against his scales. He pressed his fingers against the veins and he could almost feel his heartbeat thumping as it pumped blood in and out.

As his heart was pumping hard, so was Frank's enthusiasm. He wanted not just to show off his muscles but also his new clothes. He thought about the gym but he figured he spent a lot of time there and wanted to do something different. Frank had to think: what would be a good place to show off muscle while wearing non-workout clothes? Then it hit him: the park. The park was perfect. There was plenty of people there to show off to. Without further delay, Frank quickly changed from his new workout outfit to his new t shirt and jeans. He then rushed out to get to the park.

Frank walked through the park feeling completely refreshed. The air was crisp and clear, no smell of sweat compared to the gym. Birds were chirping in the trees, squirrels were running across the grass, and people passing by Frank couldn't help but stare in awe of the humongous alligator.

Frank got his head out of the clouds when he saw people beginning to notice him. At first, it felt really awkward people noticing his body but he quickly began to relax and enjoy the attention. Other park visitors noticed Frank when his feet caused slight tremors in the ground every time he took a step. He even overshadowed everyone because of his giant frame against the warm sun. People thought it was amazing to see so much muscle on an alligator. They didn't see him out of fear but of envy.

Frank smiled wanting to take advantage of this opportunity. Frank raised his arms to flex to the visitors as if they were his audience. He then puffed his chest to where people could see his pecs, abs, and veins from underneath his shirt. The audience was amazed that his shirt remained intact. Lastly, Frank stuck out his leg and tensed it. His jeans made it look like his whole leg was painted a blue denim color. Even that didn't tear, in fact, it made him feel more flexible. Frank continued his posing show until he saw a nearby tree with a branch close to the ground. He smiled as he got an idea to impress his audience even more.

The proud reptile walks over to the large tree and eyes its largest branch. The small crowd follows. With great ease, he grabs a firm hold of the branch immediately starts pumping his biceps up. The group was amazed to see such blasted arms. They looked so sinewy and large, like a pair of giant hills rising and falling while accompanied by some snaking veins all over his arms. Even his pecs were getting some attention, flexing and puffing out every time he lifts. Frank starts to hear clapping starting to erupt from all around. It wasn't a lot, but enough to keep the exhilarated gator going as he sweats even more, his lifting only getting faster and faster, his huffs growing more and more prominent.

He could go on forever, until he and everyone around him hears a loud crackling noise, making the muscular reptile stop while still holding his body up. "Uh-oh..." In a matter of seconds, the tree branch breaks off, and there goes Frank falling to the ground. He was a little phased, but nothing even a normal-bodied person could shake off. "Ow..."

"Oh my gosh! Frank, are you okay?" That feminine voice sounded awfully familiar. It was none other than Erika, who runs to his side. "You're not hurt or anything, are you?"

"Huh?" He picks himself up, "Oh, no. I'm alright." He gets up on his feet, his shirt now all covered in grass and grass stains. "Aw man..." The group of people then take their leave. "So, have you been watching this whole time?"

"Well, not all of it.", she admits. "I came as soon as I saw you doing pull-ups with that tree. Was that even a good idea?", she scolds.

"Well, it looked sturdy enough.", he defends. "Anyways, did you enjoy the show?", he smirks, showing his beefy arm to her.

"I did. You were really good out there. I never doubted you for a minute. Though, I did doubt that tree.", she remarks.

"Alright, alright, enough with the tree.", he hisses. He does notice how she couldn't keep her eyes off his large, shredded muscles. "Well, since you're here, care to take a feel of this sexy giant?", he winks.

He must have read her mind, 'cause it makes her whole face turn red. "I...I'd love too.", she replies softly. Frank then does the honors of tensing and bouncing his meaty chest, which she steps in to feel. It feel like a pile of metal in her grasp. Next thing Frank does is flex up his bicep, but then bends down enough so she could reach that thick bicep and tricep muscle, as well as thickening out his robust forearm. Erika takes her time feeling all around that rounded mountain o' meat and flesh. Her cheeks only turned even redder. Frank would show her more, but the fox had to take her leave. "Um, that wall all very nice...but, I gotta get going."

Frank holds her hands. "Will I see you again?"

Erika's eyes widen as she stares into the large creatures beautiful eyes. "...Mm... Definitely."
135221121122.title: Show off in new clothes

choices: Grow legs to match Bill's legs
1352211211222.content:
The next day, Frank woke feeling refreshed and pumped for the day. He sat up in his bed making it creak under his massive weight. He then flexed his arm to make it swell in power and strength. Frank was satisfied to see he was still the big and strong alligator that he truly loved. He stretched his arms making them ripple and his chest puff out in definition.

Frank jumped out of bed and made the floor tremble underneath his feet. Frank just smiled thinking it was great waking up this big. Frank walked to the window to see the sun rising in the horizon. Sunlight shined against his scales it felt good on his body. Frank felt the warm sunlight seep into flesh making his muscles feel more energized and powerful. At this point, Frank needed to exert some energy. He didn't care about breakfast, he just wanted to get started on a morning workout.

Frank then saw someone jogging along the sidewalk of his house. The alligator was surprised to see it was muscular badger in a tank top and shorts. Frank's eyes widened when he realized it was Bill. Frank knew he had to catch up to him and join him on his jog. He quickly put on his workout clothes and sprinted out of the house. With his sculpted legs, Frank caught up with Bill in no time.

"Hey Bill," greeted Frank as he began jogging to the badger's side.

"Hey kid!" said Bill. "What are you doing up this early?"

"I saw you jogging by so I thought I'd join you."

Bill smiled out of flattery. "Thanks kid, I appreciate the company. I was thinking about jogging another few blocks and stop by to get breakfast. You wanna join?"

"Y..yeah! Sure!" said Frank excitedly and realizing how hungry he was. "I'm starving!"

Bill chuckled. "I bet you are! Takes a lot of food to keep a tank like you going! I bet you can eat five plates full of waffles!"

Frank punches the air, and then rolls his muscular arm to show off that massive peak of his and pats it with his other meaty palm over the hardened muscle, "Hey, gotta eat big to stay big, am I right?"

Bill grins back at the excited gator. "Right! There's this breakfast place I saw on my trip here. Thought I try it out. Care to tag along?"

"Hey, be happy to!", Bill replies. "Where is it?"

"At the other part of town. Thought I may as well jog all the way there. You up for it?", Bill winks.

"The other part of town huh?" This puts a big grin on the giant reptile's maw, "Sounds like a challenge." Bill nods his head in agreement as well. As the two continued jogging, the badger noticed his running mate was running faster than him. In Frank's defense, he didn't even notice. He just happens to have more immense, well-sculpted legs. Bill took that as a challenge though, putting a smirk on the badger's face. He starts actually sprinting now, managing to catch up to Frank and running past him.

Frank takes notice, not sure of why he was running faster, but decides to catch up too. Frank didn't have to do much except kick up his legs faster, and he was almost neck-and-neck with Bill. Soon as the badger took notice, he actually starts to sprint this ahead this time. That's when Frank realizes that this is another challenge he was given, and starts picking up speed all the same. Even though he was the one with bigger thighs and calves, Bill was actually able to hold his own, making it tough for the massive reptile to even catch up. "Whoa... This guys fast on his feet."

Trying to catch up to the badger was hard enough, but he wouldn't give up that easily. They were really starting to stir up a lot of attention as a lot of bystanders watched the two muscular beasts running block after block for over a mile. Suddenly, Bill comes to an immediate stop, but Frank just keeps going, almost catching up and running past him until, "STOP!!" Frank does just that, standing on one foot, and then a rush of speeding locomotives drive right past him. His toes were actually sitting off of the sidewalk. Frank just stood there with his jaw agape, as if he had seen his life flash before his eyes. Bill then walks up behind him, "Intersection. You should be more careful there, big guy. I see that you're big, but not big enough to get hit by a passing vehicle and live."

Frank just stood there, frozen. "...That was close... Phew, I owe ya one. Hm?"

Looking down at the badger's lower body, he takes notice of Bill's searing, sinewy legs. They looked incredibly tense, shredded, and almost ready to blow under all those veins! "What? See anything you notice?"

"Yeah, those legs of yours. They're all blasted, and huge!", Frank exclaims.

Bill was flattered by Frank's comment, "Heh, thanks! If there's one part of the body a good wrestler needs, it's legs." He spreads his legs a bit and flexes them, almost enough to strain the shorts he wore to their limit, "And these babies have helped me win quite a few good matches."

"Wow...", Frank awes, "No wonder I was havin' a hard time catching up to ya."

Bill grins. "The breakfast place is across the street. Let's go eat!"
1352211211222.title: See Bill again

13522112112221.content:
Frank and Bill finally stopped in front of a small diner. The muscular duo squeezed through the door and were met by a female raccoon waiter. She was amazed to see huge guys entering the diner, but she was also excited. She knew right away they were going to eat a lot of food, which meant a lot of money for her. Bill looked at the waitress and held out two fingers in front of her. "Two seats, please," he said.

The waitress smiled and said, "Right this way!" She guided Frank and Bill to the front of the diner where a series of metal stools sat across a little bar. The two sat on the stools next to each other and the stools held their giant weights very steadily. There was little chance they would break under them.

The waitress came to them behind the counter. "Welcome fellas."

"Hello," said Bill. "My friend and I are ready for a hearty breakfast after a good morning jog. Got anything that fill us up?"

The waitress nodded. "Yes sir, and lots of it! Say, aren't you Bill the Badger?"

"Yes?"

"Please excuse me. I'm a big fan! I've watched your fighting career with great interest!"

Bill felt flattered by the waitresses's kind words. "Why, thank you."

The waitress could barely keep her composure. "I'll tell you what, for all you do, you guys can seconds for free!" Bill and Frank were excited to hear that. The next best thing about breakfast was a free breakfast.

"That would be great!" said Bill. "Thank you!"

"So what can I get you?" said the waitress.

"I'll have eggs, bacon, sausage, and toast," said Bill.

"I'll have what he has plus waffles!" said Frank. The waitress recorded their orders and walked back to the kitchen.

Fifteen minutes later, the waitress returned to Bill and Frank with heavy plates with mountains of food. The two didn't hesitate and started eating right away. Frank started putting as much food as he could in his mouth. As he swallowed and the food ran down his throat and into his stomach, Frank felt so relieved. He felt like he hadn't eaten in ages and he was still hungry. If what Bill said earlier was true, Frank was no where near done eating.

Bill finished his plate of food and went on to his second one. As he was eating, Frank was already on his third plate. Frank wasn't aware how much he was eating. He just knew his body wanted more. It was strange, each bite that Frank took seemed to make him stronger. He didn't know why nor did he really care. Frank just kept eating until his stomach was content.

Bill just finished his second plate and smiled at Frank. "I told you that you needed a lot of food to keep you going!" said Bill teasing.

Frank felt embarrassed while wiping his mouth of food. "Sorry, guess I didn't realize how hungry I was."

Bill chuckled, "It's fine. Eating like that means you enjoyed a good meal. Besides, it looks like it did you some good." Bill then pointed at Frank's bulgy arm and Frank looked at it in amazement. His whole arm grew more defined and slightly bigger! Then Frank realized that his chest and legs felt a little tighter against his clothing. As he looked at the rest of his body, Frank saw his body looked a little bigger! He even felt a little stronger than before! It was so strange. Frank felt bigger and stronger without going into the swamp!

"Looks like all that food got you all pumped up for today!" said Bill jokingly. Frank grinned as he brought his arm up in a spectacular show of a bicep flex, he could hear the shirt stretch a little as he hugged his bicep so well. It was almost like a second skin to him.

"More than pumped up!" Frank took in a deep breath as he turned to look at Bill, his shirt suddenly becoming tight as his chest swelled up, becoming thicker and more pronounced under that thin shirt. To anyone else Frank would have looked quite intimidating, his muscles bulged in ways that very few could obtain. Bill let out a small whistle as he gazed at the almost monstrous biceps straining to burst free of the shirt.

"I feel bad for anyone that goes up against you. you could really do a number on them." Frank laughed as he brought his arm up, rubbing his flexed bicep against the side of the head.

"That's the plan. I don't plan to lose ya know." Bill gave a big laugh as he patted Frank's back, giving a teasing squeeze to feel out the tight unyielding muscles underneath the shirt.

"With an attitude like that you better not!" Frank grinned as the female raccoon from before came back to them with a bill in hand. She paused as he saw the little show Frank was putting on and a blush spread across her furred cheeks.

"I... I uh... y-your receipt." She nervously outstretched her paw, paper in hand as Bill reached out and grasped it, oblivious of the state she was in.

"Thanks. the food was amazing I'm definitely coming back here again." Bill reached into his wallet and slid out a crisp pair of bills and handed it to the still awestruck raccoon who took a minute to realize what he was handing her before she grasped it.

"G-glad you enjoyed it. I'll give your compliments to the cook.. please come again soon." With that the raccoon turned around and sped away, trying to resist stealing glances at the handsome pair of large men sitting there.
13522112112221.title: Eat breakfast

135221121122212.content:
With their bellies full, both Frank and Bill decide to walk it off as they head out. Bill lets out a sudden belch. "Pardon. Knew that place was good. Their meat is pure grade, tell ya what."

Frank does the same, only his was a tad upbeat. "Excuse me. So, where ya headed now?"

"Ah, just wanted to head back to my place. Need to let all the food settle." Bill turns to look at his best pal, "Say, are ya busy? Would like to come over?"

"I-I, I'd love to.", Frank replies excitedly. He felt it was a high honor, of some kind. Getting to come to your idol's house for a visit, that just sounds too good to be true. "Hey Bill, would ya like to race there?"

Bill hesitates for a moment, "Eh, I don't think that's a good idea. Wouldn't want all that food to come back up."

"I'm kidding.", Frank snickers. "I don't even know where ya live."

~~~

Frank's eyes were wide gawks with his mouth gaping open at what he sees in front of him. "Is that...your place...?"

The house was practically a mansion, only have the size. Bill pats his friend on the shoulder to snap him out of it, "Hey, it's just a two-story house. Not an estate." Bill walks up to open his front door. "Come on, I'll show ya inside." First room the gator gets to see is his living room, and it was much larger than his. Even his TV was bigger. There were even some pictures and medals hanging on the wall. Pictures of his wins and prized moments, and medals as prove of his wins. "Whatcha think?"

Frank takes this time to wander about Bill's place a bit. He even slides his large, meaty palm over one of the badger's couches. "Well, it's...definitely roomier than my own home."

"Come on, I'll show you a few of the rooms." One room in particular was his weight room, which he only briefly talks about since he and his friend are still too full from their breakfast. There were weights and everything inside, that's for sure. The next room he shows was his most favorite, his fighting room. Basically it's a room that has a couple weights, a big and small punching back, plenty of mirrors, and a large ring for him to practice wrestling in. "Whatcha think?"

They both talk a walk inside. "This place is amazing! Do you...ever get anyone to practice with you?"

"Heh...uh, rarely. You're one of the view that I think I'll actually a fun time fighting with. What do ya think?", Bill asks bashfully.

"Are you kidding? I'd love to!", Franks screams. "Er, maybe a little later. Until I'm not so full."

"Great! Guess I'll get that rematch with ya after all!", Bill replies proudly. He then tugs off his shirt and walks up to on of his many mirrors, one that reflected his entire bulging frame. "Hey, yer not too full to flex a bit, are ya?"

Frank starts wagging his tail, "Not at all!"

Frank walked up to the mirror right next to Bill. Frank then stripped off his shirt to reveal his broad and rippling chest. As Bill looked up at Frank, the badger admitted he looked at the alligator's chest in envy. Frank took up most of the mirror as he raised his arms to inflate his biceps and triceps like balloons. The alligator then raised his arms above his head where his biceps rubbed gently against his cheeks.

Frank then put his arms on his waist and began to bounce his pecs playfully. He even bulged his ten pack abs and rubbed them with his giant hand. He gave a soft growl feeling the warmth and power of his chest with his fingertips.

Frank then lifted a leg and then blast it incredible definition. Crevices of his thighs and calves sunk deep into his flesh making his thick tendons look coiled and swollen in power. Frank's legs felt like iron pipes that could stomp a hole in the floor. Frank was incredibly satisfied with his pumped body.

Bill smiled and gave a whistle to Frank. "Still can't get over that giant body of yours, kid." said Bill. "You got power and you know how to use it!"

"Th...thanks, Bill."

"Heh, I have to say, with all your flexing you almost got me jealous of your muscles. I wish I could be as big as you." Frank felt a little flattered. His personal hero wanted to be like him? How cool is that?

"Well, I'm sure you will if you keep training hard," said Frank encouragingly.

"Yeah, maybe. So what do you want to do now?"
135221121122212.title: Go someplace else

choices: Bill tries out his new strength
1352211211222121.content:
Bill walks up to the large sandbag, "I don't know about you, but I'm ready to train. And train hard.", Bill winks. "You're free to train all ya want as well."

"It'd be a pleasure.", Frank, the muscular alligator, grins. Bill was starting off slow, with simple punches against the sandbag, but then really turned it up. He starts punching the bag harder, making it fly away with every hefty punch he threw at it. He even starts using his shredded legs, kicking the sandbag back and forth. Frank knew they were big and strong, but watching them flex and ripple apart against the sandbag was a real treat! His kicks seemed to be even stronger than his punches. "Wow! You go, dude!"

Frank wanted to do something that wouldn't take too much attention away from the badger in action. He finds a blue jumprope on the ground. Perfect! He could watch his biggest inspiration AND workout his own legs at the same time. He picks it up and immediately starts his own training. Fifteen minutes into their training, Frank was feeling really good. Nothin' like a good workout to pump you up and make you feel exhilarated. He had been watching punch out that bag for that long as well, the burly, shredded badger not giving in. Say, maybe he can take a crack at that when he's done. Seemed like Bill was about to get a short break anyway.

Bill sat on a bench to catch his breath. Judging by the look on his face, Bill looked a little discouraged. Frank noticed and went over to help his friend.

"You okay, Bill?" asked Frank.

"Yeah..." replied Bill. "Just a little tired. I...I think I'm getting too old for this."

Frank's giant heart dropped when he heard those words out of his hero's mouth. "What? What are you talking about?! You're at your prime!"

"That's what I keep telling myself," said Bill. "I'm not as young as I use to. I was able to get bigger and stronger every day. I trained the very best way I could. Now, it seems my body just reached it's limit. My muscles got as big as they could and I can't get any stronger. But I hope you can carry on the legacy, Frank. With your strength and power, you'll be the best fighter in the world, maybe better than me."

Frank got up and looked down at Bill. "That's enough! That's quitter talk and I know from watching you while I was a kid that you are not a quitter! You are a legend! You know a fighter like you never goes down! They get stronger!"

Bill chuckled and said, "Yeah? Then how come I can't get any stronger. I've been this way for about a couple years now and no changes."

Frank sighed and thought of ways that could lift Bill's spirits. Then it hit him: the swamp. If it could make Frank big, why not Bill? But would Bill believe him? Only one way to find out. "I have an idea," said Frank. "Follow me."

Frank guided Bill to the magic swamp. During the trip, Frank told Bill everything about it, how it made him grow, how swam in it, everything. However, Bill was a bit skeptical. They stopped at the small harbor of the swamp.

"You serious?" asked Bill. "You expect me to believe you got this big by taking a dip in this place?"

Frank nodded. "Look, I know this sounds crazy, but it really does work! Just take a quick swim and you'll be bigger and stronger than you ever were!"

Bill just chuckled. "Look, kid. You maybe comfortable in swimming in dirty water, but I'm not. No way am I..." Before he could finish his sentence, Bill was pushed into the swamp by Frank creating a big splash.

Bill kicked and struggled as he had sucked down a swallow or two of water before his head managed to break the surface sputtering and coughing loudly. Water spat out of his muzzle
and he coughed hard, the taste of the swamp water almost pungent enough to make him gag. The smell alone already had him trying to swim for shore, to get out of this foul liquid.

"W...what the hell Frank? W-Why'd you do that?" Bill wrapped his fingers around the wooden beam at the end of the pier and started trying to pull himself up. He almost lost his grip a few times because of his wet fur and a bit of slime from the water lapping at the wood for so long. Finally after a few minutes Bill managed to haul himself out of the water and he laid there breathing heavy, his fur and clothes sopping wet. His eyes looked up towards Frank, a very unhappy glare burning right into him.

"Are you insane? I could have drowned! Why would you do that to me? I already said this water isn't magic, now I have to walk home dripping the whole way." Bill shifted forward and sat up, eventually moving up onto both feet and started walking away. Behind him Frank's smile had already worn away as he looked more and more upset. Why hadn't the water worked? He watched with a strong amount of guilt weighing on his chest as Bill was walking down the pier. when he was about to step off the wooden pier he stopped and made a very strange noise, almost like he was choking on a breath of air.

He clawed at his chest as he sank down onto his knees. His entire chest was burning like it was on fire. Bill's immediate thought was that he was having a heart attack, that the shock from falling into the contaminated had caused his heart to have problems. The burning grew more and more intense and he turned around trying to call out to Frank for help, but he couldn't get his voice to work.

With each passing second the burning grew far more intense and it began spread down throughout his body, from his chest it spread up to his shoulders and down his arms, it pooled in his abdomen and spread down through his legs to his feet. The burning became so excruciating that Bill's eyes started blurring with tears before he felt his spine popped and suddenly, as if suddenly rediscovering his voice he cried out in pain.

He hunched forward as he fell onto his hands, his arms quivering like they did after an intense workout, but this felt much more extreme. Suddenly he was aware of his muscles going through powerful spasms, inflating to their peak before shrinking back down, inflating again then shrinking over and over. The last time they inflated, it would like someone had punctured his biceps with an air pump and just kept pushing down on the level to add air.

One inch, then two, then six, then eight massive inches exploded from his biceps. His eyes almost bulged out of their sockets as they gazed at the change happening to his body right before his very eyes. The growing didn't stop there, even as he drew his next breath he could see his chest starting to expand. Every time he left out a breath, his chest grew a little more, straining against the clothes he wore which now felt like they were far too tight for comfort.

With his shirt sticking to him so closely, he could see almost seen the veins in his chest popping right out of the skin beneath his fur. It was a breathtaking sight for sure. He never thought anything were possible, especially to him. When he felt that burning suddenly double in intensity in his gut and he pulled up his shirt so he could see his stomach and he almost fell over from the shock of watch his stomach contort and his abs writhing beneath his fur.

Up, up, up went his abs as a new solid row of abs emerged from what was one smooth flesh and fur. The ridges between each row of abs grew deeper and more defined to the point he was sure he could actually grinding something to pieces against his stomach. It had been a long time since his abs had been that hard. The feeling of his immense power was exhilarating.

When the burning started bubbling up hotter than ever in his legs he had to lean fully on his new beefier arms for complete support. Even putting a little weight on his legs caused an intense amount of pain and he gasped out loud. His legs began to swell, slowly at first almost as if the change was testing his body to see how far it could go, before suddenly his thighs flared up and the muscle exploded in size.

There was a loud ripping sound as his pants started tearing apart from the growth. With his pants starts to fall off onto the wood below he could clearly see his now magnificently swollen thighs and calves. He didn't think he would ever manage to get them this huge, but there they were throbbing as the veins pumped blood through the grown muscles. As soon as the growth waned in his legs the burning stopped almost altogether and he fell forward, barely managing to roll himself over as his chest heaved in and out with great gasps of air.

This new feeling was intoxicating, he could feel the hum of his muscles down to the very last striated band in his body. When his eyes gazed downward he spotted Frank grinning at him with one of the toothiest smiles he'd ever seen. He almost felt like giving him a punch for what he'd done, but in light of the changes that had just happened. he was willing to let this slide.

Frank approached Bill cautiously, even though he was happy to see his idol bigger and stronger than ever he was worried Bill might still be mad at him for pushing him into the water. When Frank stood directly over Bill his eyes widened as he took in the new muscles up close. It was far better than he could have ever hoped for. He looked bigger than he ever did before, even when he was younger.... wait.

As Frank took a closer look, he realized that a lot of signs in Bill's body of age had disappeared, from the slight grey in his hair to the slight wrinkles he'd seen at the corners of his eyes, they'd completely vanished. Replaced with a lustrous shine in his hair and a wily look in the eyes of the Badger that he hadn't seen before. It was if the water had not only made him stronger, but it made him younger too.

"H-How are you feeling Bill? A... are you ok?" Bill's eyes met his and for a long time he didn't say anything. Frank felt those nervous feelings starting to bunch up in the pit of his stomach before a smile spread over Bill's face and he laughed, a deep hearty laugh that sounded richer and more youthful than before.

"I feel great kid. Like a million bucks."
1352211211222121.title: Have Bill grow

13522112112221212.content:
Bill needed to take some time to look himself over. Every muscle that he had hoped to pump up on his own actually became bigger after all. In fact, even larger and heftier than he ever imagined! Just watching his muscles pulsate and throb from their recent growth spurt really excited the ol' badger. He raises one arm and flexes it, making his ubber bicep explode right before him. Frank was just as proud and happy for his best friend, seeing him flex and pose as many muscles he could. It was a quite a show, and Frank enjoyed it very much. "So Bill, what do ya think?"

Bill pumps his beefy arm one more time before turning back towards the gator. "Frank...this is incredible! I've never felt so built and strong in such a long time! I feel just like I did when I started going into the pro league." The bigger beast then wraps his arms around Frank's expansive frame, "Thanks Frank. I can't thank you enough for this..."

Frank shrugs his broadened shoulders, "Hey, I just can't bare to see my biggest idol be all sad and depressed like that."

Bill backs away from their hug. "Heh. You're the only I ever came out to about my age and conundrum. Soon as I saw a big fellow like you enter the gym, I knew you had to be the guy who would take my place someday." He blasts his immense bi once again, "Now that you introduced me to this, it may likely take much longer than ya think now.", he chuckles.

"That's all good with me. I'm just happy to learn from the best.", Frank grins. "So...what would you like to do right now? Wanna head back to your place?"

Bill rubs his meaty paw over his mountainous pecs, "Well, I am curious to see just how strong I am now. I'd love to punch that sandbag across the room, but I wanna make sure I can handle it."

"Oh, I'm sure you can handle it.", Frank encouraged. "Though, if you want to make sure, there's a junkyard not too far from here. Maybe you can test out your strength there."

"Sounds good ta me!" Bill holds up his fist, and then Frank does the same, bopping fists with each other. Minutes later, they entered a junkyard that was just chalk full of heavy metal. Metal from automobiles, scrapped buildings, you name it. To Bill, this seemed like the perfect spot to lift, and lift hard. "Wow. Just look at all this junk." He performs a double-bicep pose for his friend, "Can't wait ta see how much this body can take!"

Bill first noticed a pile of I-beams sitting next to a broken down truck. Bill cracked his knuckles and knelt down to pick up the metal beam. Normally Bill would not even think of lifting something like an I-beam because he thought he was too old or not strong enough. With his new strength, Bill lifted it above his head with ease. He even tossed it from one hand to another. Bill even bent the beam against his huge and massive thigh. So far, his strength was unbeatable.

Bill dropped the beam and then noticed the truck. He smiled thinking that truck would be easy to lift. Bill grabbed the bumper of the truck and began pulling it up against his massive chest. The truck was more challenging than the beam, but Bill managed to tip the truck over. He flexed his arms in victory.

However, his victory party was short lived when a broken down train cart caught his eye. As Bill made his way to it, Frank knew what he was trying to attempt. "Uh...Bill," said Frank, "Are you sure you can do that? I don't think even I could lift something that big!"

Bill didn't even acknowledge Frank's comment. He was too determined to move this train cart. Bill bent over and grab hold of the cart. The train cart was clearly the heaviest thing Bill ever tried to move. Frank saw Bill's arms swelling and throbbing under the stress. His biceps looked like they were going to burst but Bill continued trying to lift the cart. The two muscle men hear a slight creak from cart as Bill finally got the grip and leverage to tilt the cart slightly. After an incredible feat, Bill dropped the cart and then his giant body.

Frank rushed to aid his newly muscled friend. "You okay, Bill?" asked Frank.

Bill was on his back chuckling. "I'm doing great, kid. I never, ever, thought that I would be able to lift a train cart before. Guess I overdid it a bit."

Frank shook his head. "No, you did great! It was stuff like this that made you my hero! I...I'm proud of you, Bill!" Bill felt flattered but was too tired to blush. He just needed to lie where he was for a little while.
13522112112221212.title: Bill tries out his new strength

135221121122212122.content:
Frank offered his giant hand to Bill. The badger gladly accepted it and the alligator pulled Bill's giant weight with ease. "You okay, Bill?" asked Frank.

Bill nodded. "Yeah, I'm fine. Just overdid it." Bill looked at the train cart again. "It was so great I could lift that up some! Would be even cooler if I could lift that thing up above my head!" Bill let out a chuckle. "Can you imagine?" Frank then smirked at Bill. Frank had an idea that could make Bill lift that cart and give himself a nice "workout." Frank pumped his arms in excitement.

"We can go back to swamp if you want," said Frank. "Another dip in there and you'll be the strongest badger ever! Besides, I feel like I feel like being pumped again!"

Bill's eyes widened with happiness. "Really? We can grow more?" Frank nodded. Bill said, "Well, as long as we don't look too big. I don't want to look like a giant muscle monster."

"You won't as long as you don't stay in there for too long," assured Frank. "I promise. Come on, I'll race you to the swamp!"

The two tied as they raced to the swamp with their sculpted legs. They walked to the swamp along the harbor, making the wood tremble underneath their steps. Frank and Bill then looked at themselves in their reflections in the water. Bill couldn't believe how much muscle he had on now. He even let out a bicep flex to pleasure himself. "Okay, on the count of three, we'll jump in and get out real quick so we'll grow only a bit more," said Frank. Bill nodded agreeing. "One...two...three!" The two jumped from the harbor and made giant splashes in the swamp.

Frank and Bill felt the coolness of the water as they dove in and quickly raised themselves to the surface. The two then swam quickly back to the harbor. "So, when does this start?" asked Bill.

"It takes a while," said Frank. "Give it a minute for your body to soak up the water. You'll get used to it. It's worth the wait. Besides, the growth itself feels pretty good!"

They then felt it, the warmth deep in their cores that slowly grew intense and spread to their muscles. Bill knelt over while Frank continued standing ready to embrace the power growing within them. They felt their bones crack and shift making the titans grow a few more inches. The veins on their arms pulsated faster as their hearts raced. Their biceps grew stronger and powerful as the inches went by 2...4...7 inches. Their chests then broadened and widened making their pecs and abs thicker and bulgier. Both Frank and Bill could feel their pecs almost touching their chin. As their legs grew thicker than tree trunks, Bill grunted, "You're right...this...feels...pretty good!" The warmth slowly diminished and Frank and Bill regained their composure.

They both slowly got back up on their feet, and then look at each other just to see how big they got. It wasn't a huge difference, but it was there. Their muscles all over had grown and look bigger, as well as gained a few more inches in height. Bill couldn't help but smirk at his pal, as well as at his own muscly frame. Bill raises one arm and flexes it, seeing his enlarged bicep sear up and rise with power. "Incredible...", Bill remarks at his bulging bi.

Frank walks around to feel the badger's flexed bicep. "Feels great, doesn't it?", he grins brightly.

"You have no idea.", Bill replies. "Hey, let's head back to the junkyard!" Before Frank could reply, Bill already speeds off on his own.

Frank chuckles to himself, "Hey, wait up!" Getting back to the junkyard from the harbor took less time due to their stronger, thicker legs. Once Frank caught up to Bill at the junkyard, Bill was already trying his body out with the train cart, slowly lifting it off the ground. "Whoa, Bill, be careful."

Frank's jaw suddenly drops, as he watches Bill's pecs and arm muscles pump and plump out with sinewy power as he lifts it up even further, up to his neck height as a matter of fact. If Bill was wearing a shirt over his beefy frame, it would have ripped right off his shredded body. "Don't worry, I got this now.", he winks.

With another good heave, the badger's legs start to fill out underneath and surged with great strength, while the ground beneath his feet starts to crack under all that weight. His shorts looked literally painted on now over his strapping thighs. Frank grew a little concerned though. "Bill...?"

"NNG... I told you...I got it.", Bill assures, trying to insert a weak smile in there. And then, with one more great heave, Bill manages to lift his sinewy arms up, and lifted the train cart over his his head, "YEAHHH!!", he roars.

Frank couldn't believe it. Seeing his idol in all his glory, lifting something he would have never imagined any could lift was a real treat! "WOW! Way ta go Bill!", Frank cheers. After almost of a minute of basking in his glory, Bill throws the train cart back and drops it to the ground. The bulging badger drops to his knees, feeling really exhausted. Frank ran to his side, "Hey, you okay?"

Bill tries to smile at his best pal, "Heh. Yeah. ...Maybe I wasn't big enough to lift that whole thing."

"Hey, you just rest. You did an awesome job.", Frank grins. The pumped gator then gets up to crack his knuckles. He hasn't necessary had his chance to show off and feel how much stronger he got.
135221121122212122.title: Train

1352211211222121221.content:
"So kid," said Bill between heavy breaths after his incredible feat, "How strong are you now after our little swim?"

"Not sure," said Frank. "I was too distracted by you to test my muscles out, but I'm ready to find out!" Frank cracked his thick neck and smiled at Bill. Bill smiled back in approval waiting for Frank's next move.

Frank looked back at the train cart Bill just lifted. Frank was slightly bigger than Bill, so Frank assumed he would have been able to lift the train cart as well. However, he wanted to try something new, something different, something that would blow Bill's mind. Frank then saw the train cart was connected to another train cart right next to it. He then smiled knowing exactly what kind of mind-blowing feat he wanted to do next.

Frank took the link between the carts and rested it on his neck. The alligator could feel the combined weight on his shoulders. The weight felt intense against Frank's body but that wasn't going to make Frank give up. Bill noticed this and figured out what Frank was trying to do. "Umm, kid," said Bill, "I know you're a bit bigger than me but don't you think that's a little too much for you?"

Without looking back at Bill, Frank hollered back, "Don't worry, I got this." Frank then squatted to the bottom of the carts and placed both his hands underneath them. Frank began to pull, harder than he ever did before. The weight of two carts was clearly the heaviest Frank had ever lifted but refused to stop. Frank could feel his arms burn under the pressure. His biceps swelled larger and larger with veins grew thicker and thicker. He even felt burning in his vascular legs as they kept Frank's body stable under the intense stress. They also grew massive as Frank's clawed feet sunk slightly under the ground. Frank let out a soft growl and attempted a heave only to have the carts move upwards slightly. He kept pushing the carts as high as he could making his chest more defined and bulged. Frank began to growl louder.

"Kid, it's too much! You're going to hurt yourself!" said Bill.

"I...can...do this!" Frank did one final heave and yelled, "Urrraaagh!" With all the muscles in his body swelled to new peaks, Frank lifted the two connecting train carts above his head. Frank saw this incredible feat he performed and smiled happily to himself. He just did the impossible. He felt like a super powered gator! After holding it for a few more seconds, Frank let go of the carts. Despite his amazing performance, Frank only felt a little worn out, not as exhausted as Bill was after his lift. Frank pumped his arms in victory and pride and returned back to Bill. "So, what do you think?"

Bill had his mouth open the whole time. Who eyes couldn't believe what they had just witnessed. It was incredible! Especially seeing the gator's muscles noticeably bulge and throb out on his shredded frame. Frank was waiting patiently for a reply, but got nothing but awe and surprise. He then walks over to the badger's side, Bill's face still frozen as he watches the muscular behemoth sit right beside him. "Ah..."

Frank closes the awestruck badger's mouth, "Come on man, can't stand watching you stare at me like that.", he snickers uneasily.

Bill then wraps his hands over Frank's still-pulsating arm, primarily his bulky bicep and tricep. "Dude... You sure you're not made up of metal or something?"

Frank smiles, "Nope!" He then flexes for his immense arm for his idol, "All natural. Aside from the swamp of course."

"You are one crazy musclefreak, bro.", he laughs. "Honestly, I didn't think you were gonna make it. Then I'd end up having to clean you up from under then."

Frank nudges Bill against his sides, "Hey, told ya I can do it!" He then pumps his other arm to watch it swell with power, then gives his peaking bi a kiss. "I'm not even that tuckered out."

"What? Really? Heh." Bill crosses his arms over his thick chest, "Think you can impress me some more?", he challenges.

Frank hopes back up to his feet. "Sit there and watch." Doesn't look like Bill could do much else anyway. Frank walks up to a nearby wrecked car. It was pretty average sized, but good enough for what Frank wanted to do next. The energized reptile holds up his rugged arms, and then throws them down to sinks his fingers into the roof of the car. Sinking his thick clawed-toes into the ground as he gets into position, his muscles all shred and expand from the calves up to his neck. He starts ripping the junked car apart with his arms, while giving the badger a good show of his chiseled, flexing frame. His pecs swelled out and shriveled apart with his pulsating arms and shoulders as the car was almost in two pieces. His thick tail even seemed to start throbbing, and manages to flex it like it was a third arm. Frank's growling and gritting of his teeth only got louder and more intense, until he gives his rippling body a good heave and... "RRRAUGH!!!" The car is now in two pieces, being thrown away from each other in response.

Frank pants a bit, letting his beef-up body breathe for a bit. "Ugh...YEAH!", he roars proudly, thumping his chest with his fist. He then sits himself to Bill's side once again, even sweater than he was before. "Okay, now I'm tuckered out."

Bill frowns. "......Okay, NOW you're just showing off."
1352211211222121221.title: Test Frank's strength

choices: Frank learns new moves from Bill
13522112112221212211.content:
Frank sat down on the ground feeling exhausted now. Bill sat down next to him comforting his friend. Although Bill was very proud of Frank and his incredible performance, Bill couldn't shake off the sense of jealousy in the pit of his gut. Bill was able to lift one cart above his head but that alone was a challenge. Frank, on the other hand, lifted not one but two carts as if they were nothing. Frank even had enough energy to tear a car apart. Bill may have been happy for Frank but the badger craved even more power, enough power to be as strong as his young gator friend.

Frank let out a large yawn. "You know, I think's time we call it a day and get some rest."

Bill nodded agreeing. "Yeah, I think we all could use some rest, that is, if your is big enough to sleep on."

Frank got up chuckling. "Yeah, right. How about we train tomorrow at your place? I don't think people are ready to see a massive gator and badger yet!"

"Probably so. Okay, sounds like a plan!" The two walked out of the junkyard and went their ways to their homes. However, Bill had one more errand to make before he went home: the swamp.

Bill found himself once again walking along the harbor towards the swamp. He didn't waste any time. This time Bill just rushed to the end of the harbor and jumped into the water. Bill swam through the murkiness for a solid 5 minutes before pulling himself up back to shore.

Then came the worst part: waiting. Bill anxiously tapped his foot waiting for the intoxicating sensation to occur. Just when his patience was about to run out, Bill felt the familiar warmth in his gut and smiled. Even though the change was intense, Bill didn't feel any pain; he just felt power pouring into his body. He remained standing as his growth began.

Bill's heart began to pump rapidly as his bones shifted and cracked to make him taller and make room for more muscle. He felt his heart beating through his veins as his biceps grew even larger and rounder. Bill didn't know how big they were getting but he assumed another 10 inches. He then puffed out his chest as his pecs were growing bigger than pillows and almost touching his chin. Below them his abs swelled more outward. Bill could even feel another row of abs forming giving him a ten pack. As for his legs, they grew stronger than redwood tree trunks. As his thighs and calves expanded into even larger proportions, Bill stomped his foot on the harbor out of pure pleasure making the harbor shake underneath him.

Bill then felt his body cool down and he smiled looking down at his muscled body. He flexed a bicep that grew to a peak similar to Frank's. He then rubbed his pecs and abs to feel the warmth and power that slept inside. Bill was now at the same size and strength as Frank. After a few poses, Bill said, "I think I'm ready for a rematch!"

---

The next morning, Frank felt very energized and well-rested. He wasted no time getting to Bill's place for another day of training in his tight tank-top and shorts. He knocks on the door (even though his knocks sound like pounding now), and awaits for his badger friend to answer. As soon as the door swings open, he holds up his hand to greet his friend, "Good mornin' Bill! ...Huh?"

Bill, wearing only a pair of shorts over his plump thighs, does the same to greet the once-bigger reptile. "He-hey, morning big guy." Bill puts on a big grin. Frank couldn't help but the badger's size into question. "What? Notice somethin'?", he snickers, lifting up his bulky arm to flex it.

"You look...a little bigger than when we took off yesterday." Frank then frowns. "Did you take a dip in the swamp with my knowing?"

"What am I? In court?", he chuckles. Frank crosses his arms. "Alright, yeah. Ya got me. I was a little jealous, alright? Just wanted to be as big as you." Bill shows the gator inside, then closing the door behind them. "Come on, let's head to the training room."

Upon entering inside, Frank sets his gym bag on a bench. "You could have told me you wanted to grow again."

"Why? So you can grow again too? I think you've done enough 'growing'.", he smirks.

"I should say the same to you.", Frank pouts.

"Anyways, there was another reason I wanted to grow too.", Bill adds.

"Oh? And what's that?"

Bill then walks up to the alligator, looking him in the eye, "For a rematch."

That was kinda unexpected for Frank, but he like the sound of that. "You're on!" They both sprint to enter the ring. Bill stands on one side while Frank stands on the other, and then tugs of his tank to toss aside out of the ring. They both stared each other down, but Frank rolls his beefy arms and then pumps his pecs. "I'm ready when you are, old man."

Bill snorts, not liking the sound of that. "Alright kiddo. ...DING-DING!" Both muscle monsters run towards each other, interlocking their hands and fingers the moment they make contact. Their arms expand and shred from the amount of strength power out of each other's veins. "Heh... Now THIS is what I call an even match!", Bill grunts. Now it wasn't a matter of strength, but skill. Bill manages to turn Frank's hands downwards to the floor as he gains the upper hand, then throws Frank's arms aside as he's left with an opening to Frank's abdomen. Bill rummages towards Frank as he wraps his rippling arms around Frank's stomach and slams him back against a pillar of the ring. "Hah!"

"Oof...!" That hurt. Not much, but it was enough to leave Frank immobilized for the moment. "Ow..."

Bill then wraps an arm around the gator's neck in a hulking sleeper hold. It wasn't Bill's official hold, but one that could keep Frank from doing anything to free himself as Bill's thickened muscles flex and pump around Frank's head. "Heh. How's this coming from an 'old man'?" Frank tries his best to free himself, but felt as if he were to pass out. He then pounds his hand against the ring floor, showing he was giving in. Bill soften his grip a bit, then gives his young friend a noogie on his head. "Alright, alright. Don't be calling me an 'old man' again, or else I'll put you to sleep for sure."
13522112112221212211.title: Only Bill grows

135221121122212122111.content:
Bill helped Frank back up after the gator's defeat. "Okay, never call you 'old man.' Got it," said Frank. Frank rolled his massive arms and cracked his back after his sparring session.

"You okay?" asked Bill. "Didn't hurt you too much, did I?"

"Naw, I'm fine," said Frank. "Just not used to losing with this body."

"I know. But losing is a big part of being a fighter. In fact, losing makes you stronger than winning...that and a magical swamp!" The two had a good laugh and Bill placed his hand on Frank's giant shoulder. "Come on, let's relax a bit at my pool. After growing, lifting, and fighting, I'm ready to take it easy."

Frank nodded. "Yeah, I could use a swim in non-magical dirty water." The two headed into the backyard where Frank saw a massive pool full of clean and crisp water with a decent sized hot tub on the side. Bill smiled as he saw Frank's mouth drop at the size of the pool and hot tub.

Frank started to make his way to the hot tub and Bill followed. As the two dipped themselves into the boiling warm water, they took a deep breath out. They could feel the water seeping into their flesh without worry of growing any bigger and all their other worries disappeared. Frank just sunk down to where only his head was visible. Bill laughed at the site. "Feel better, kid?" he asked. Frank just nodded in approval.

After a few moments just soaking up the water with their gigantic muscles, Bill decided it was time to talk. "So, kid, tell me more about yourself. What were you like before you found the swamp?"

Frank sat back up a little surprised. Nobody ever asked him for personal information before. Nobody ever wanted to talk to him. Frank took some pride into that now that he was big but would Bill still like him after telling him? He wasn't sure, but Frank has been honest with him so far. It wouldn't be fair if he stopped now. "Well," Frank started, "I was...a bit of a wimpy loner. I didn't really have any friends while I was growing up. To be honest, the only thing I liked about my life, was you. Ever since I saw you fight for the first time, I thought you were amazing. I never missed a fight. I even wanted to be like you. So, I trained to be a fighter like you."

Bill's eyes widened not realizing how big of a fan Frank was to him. "Really? I'm flattered. What happened?"

"I don't know. I trained as hard as I could by myself but couldn't get any results. I was always down on myself. The only thing that made me feel better was a swim through the swamp. Everyone thought it was weird but it just felt so natural to me. I can't explain. It's funny though. Before, the swamp didn't make me grow when I swam in it."

"Really? How does it make you big now?"

"I have no idea. I never found that out. Though I'm not complaining." Frank flexed a meaty bicep to Bill playfully. "So what's your story, Bill?"

"Don't you already know that?", Bill jokes.

"I meant with you became a fighter and all that.", Frank clarified.

Bill laughs. "Ah, how I came to be you're asking. I'd have to say I kinda started out the same way you did. I had a beloved wrestling idol of my own. His name was Albert "Finn" Hyde. The Finn was his wrestler name because he was well-known for being a top-notch shark with a killer trademark move that he uses his fin for."

"I...think I've heard of him once. I think from my dad. He used to always talk about wrestlers from the old days, and I think his name came up once or twice.", Frank adds.

"You don't say.", Bill replies. "Well, I fell in love with the guy and his moves when I was very young, because he played by the rules. Just like me! Even back then there was some no-good, two-timing wrestlers who played dirty, but he was always there to set 'em straight. I met him only once in person. I was just a kid entering my teens, and I managed to save up so my parents could take me to a wrestling match between him and another wrestler for the final match of the season. His opponent played it rough throughout the whole game, and I was always there yelling back at him. At one point in the match, just as his opponent was about to knock him out with a chair, which wasn't allowed of course, I ended up screaming at the top of my lungs, 'LOOKOUT'.", Bill suddenly screams.

"Sorry. Ahem. He must have heard me, caused he dodged the chair like a bullet, and then managed to punch his opponent's lights out with a good punch to the face. And he won. The crowd was leaving and so were my parents, but I wanted to stay. I wanted to take in as much time I could just sitting in awe of my greatest idol. Suddenly, he turns to look at me, sitting by myself in the stands, and walks over to greet. He asked if it was me who called out to him, and just nodded my head, because my voice was kinda gone after that. He even thanked me for that warning, 'cause he would have been hurt really bad if not for ducking that chair. He also gave me his autograph on a picture we took together after the match. And to this day, it's what gave me the confidence to train hard and become one of the best, honest wrestlers today. The swamp is just an added bonus.", he chuckles.

"Wow...", Frank awes, loving the story. "You still have the photo?"

"Of course! It's right there.", Bill points out to the wall behind Frank. In the middle of a few photos and other awards he won, was a framed photo of him as a youngling being picked up by Albert as they both smiled for the camera. And on the bottom was Albert's wrestling signature. "Brought tears to my eyes that night, tell ya what. Hm? Are...you crying?"

'Sniff' "I, just got something in my eye!"
135221121122212122111.title: Relax

1352211211222121221112.content:
Frank then pictured what it must have been like to see Albert fight. He knew the shark was a good, even legendary, but Frank never knew how he fought. He had to admit, it would have been interesting to have seen that fight with Bill. Frank then remembered all the fights that Bill was in and how great it was. Bill must have felt like Frank when Bill watched Albert fight. Frank was curious. He wanted to know more about this fighter.

"Say, Bill," said Frank, "How was Albert as a fighter?"

Bill then went into every detail on everything there was know about his personal hero, his fighting style, his strength, his honor, and his moves. Frank could see Bill was very excited to talk about this amazing shark. Frank could relate. He knew he would do the same thing if someone ever asked him about Bill.

"If you want, kid, I have some old videos of Albert's matches," said Bill. "I can show them to you if you want." Frank thought that would be interesting. Seeing a fighter that even Bill looked up to must be good. Frank agreed excitedly.

The two got out of the hot tubs and dried off. Frank took a spot on Bill's giant couch as Bill made his way into the kitchen. Bill sat next to Frank on the couch with a bucket of popcorn. Frank looked a bit puzzled and Bill said, "Trust me, the show's worth it!" The badger then got out an old video and put it into the TV. Bill smiled anxiously waiting for the video to start. Frank couldn't help but chuckle a little thinking Bill looked like a kid in a candy store.

The video started out with a giant ring and two fighters in opposing corners of it. One fighter was a giant muscular shark and the other was big strong hippo. The fighters glared and gritted at each other as if they were going to strangle each other until the bell rang. The two ran at each other and locked hands. Almost immediately, the shark grabbed the hippo and lifted him up in the air above the sharks head. Both Frank and Bill smiled excitedly at the scene and their grins grew wider as the shark slammed the hippo to the ground. The shark won the match instantly. Frank admitted to himself that Albert was a really good fighter, probably one of the best right next to Bill.

Frank dipped his hand down and grabbed some popcorn, tossing it into his mouth without even looking. His eyes were glued to the television as the next match was about to start The camera shirted towards the left as Albert began making his way across the walkway that led up to the mat accompanied by a roaring crowd cheering for him and chanting his name.

When he stepped into the ring the camera swiveled around to the other side of the arena as the announcer started announcing his challenger. Immediately Bill grabbed Frank's arm as the name was called out. "This is one of my favorite matches!" Frank almost laughed at how childlike Bill seemed now. It was so much different to how he was before. Not only did he look younger, but he acted like it too.

Before Frank could think more, Bill shook his arm and pointed as the second wrestler came out. This wrestler was a very muscular Lion who had quite a few fans of his own in the arena who were screaming out his name in excitement. The way he walked you could tell he was very confident he would be victorious. He took his time, strutting forward, the lights shining down on him as his fur gleamed with a light layer of sweat that made his large muscles seem even bigger.

The lion took the opportunity to stop and give a bicep flex with his left arm as he looked up at Albert a grin on his face as if he knew he could beat Albert. "That guy is always a showoff no matter who his opponent is." Bill had a big grin etched on his face as the lion climbed into the ring and took his corner.

When the bell rang out the shark and the lion ran head on for a collision. Albert went in for a headlock while the lion wrapped his mighty arms around Albert's waist, prevent him from getting a real grip on his neck by making him on able to bend over to hold him. This power struggle continued on for a couple more minutes until Albert let go of the lion's neck, only to push the lion's hands down and to wrap his arms about the lion's waist and lift him upside down.

The crowd went ballistic as the lion struggled to get free as Albert body slammed him into the mat with a loud resounding thud. The lion's body went rigid as he swept his feet against Albert's leg before he managed to get up and shove him down onto the ground, trying to pin the shark's arms down so he couldn't break free before the countdown was up, but Albert wasn't going down that easy.

With a swift jerk of his arms he caught the lion off guard, knocking him flat on his back as Albert sprang up on his feet just as the bell sounded for the end of the first round. Each wrestler went back to his corner to towel off and get a drink of water before turning back to face his opponent. When the bell sounded they went at it again. Their arms locked, biceps and triceps exploding with vascular definition as each one tried to gain dominance over the other. Frank could only watch with a growing excitement as the two struggled and fought.

He could see why Bill held Albert in such high regard, in addition to be extremely muscular, one of the biggest wrestlers out there, he was also extremely skilled with his wrestling techniques. It wasn't until the third round did Albert finally get the upper hand over the lion. You could tell this was a hard match for both of them. Their chests were heaving in and out as sweat gleamed over their bodies as they charged at each other again. This time the lion was the one who tried for the headlock, but Albert wasn't having that at all and he immediately wrapped his arms around the chest of the lion.

For a moment there it seemed like they were going to struggle for dominance again, but Albert took a different stance than what the lion had before. Sliding a leg between the lion's legs and he lifted back, using the Lion's forward moment as he pushed against Albert to lift him up into the air and flip the lion behind him, body slamming him right into the mat and this time the lion did not move, having struck his head against the mat first, he seemed very disoriented and wasn't able to get back up this time. Albert whirled around as he pinned the lion down with his knees and held down the lion's arms as he feebly tried to push Albert off. Each second passed by so slowly, Frank and Bill were practically on the edge of their seats as they watched the video along with the crowd who'd been there waiting with bated breath.

When the bell rang at the count of ten, the entire arena erupted into a roar that could have blown out the speakers on the tv. It was loud enough to actually rattle the glass on the windows as Bill hopped up cheering with as much gusto as the people who were at the arena when that match had happened.
1352211211222121221112.title: Watch old fights

13522112112221212211121.content:
Frank was filled with adrenaline after match. Even if it was on the TV, and recorded in the past. "That was awesome!", Frank yells. I didn't even know a few of those moves.

"I can teach you them, if ya like.", Bill smirks.

"You can? Great!" Frank hops right out of his seat, excitedly punching the air a couple times. Bill was pretty impressed with the alligator's passion for wrestling. "You wanna get started? Sorry if I'm rushing you."

Bill gets up out of his seat. "It's fine. That was a relaxing watch, so I'm ready for some muscle-pumping myself." With that, the two weight-lifters made it to Bill's training in no time. First thing they both did was step inside the badger's training ring. "Now, I may be easy on you the first few times, but I'm actually gonna put ya down hard if you don't pay attention after."

"Thanks for the heads up, but I can handle.", Frank grins.

"Alright." For his first move, Bill spreads his legs and his arms as he readies his stance. "Now, come at me."

Frank blinks his eyes. "Just, run up towards you?" The badger nods his head in response. "Well, alright." The bulging gator takes a few steps forward, and then throws his arms at Bill's so that their fingers and palms interlocked. Their arm muscles started to bulge out and expand as they were trying to hold one-another down. "Nng... You know Bill...nng...I kinda already know about this move."

"Not his this. This!" With that, Bill suddenly rolled Frank's palms upside down, catching the enlarged reptile by surprise. "You were focusing too much about holding your opponent down. You gotta be ready for when they can turn your moves against you. Like so." Bill turns Frank's palms back around and pushes them down. Frank lets out a disgruntled roar of pain as he drops to his knees. After a moment, the badger lets his upstart free. "There you go. Sorry if I was too hard on ya."

Frank puffs out his rippled chest. "Nah, it's cool. Just left my hands twinging. That was a good move though."

"Just remember you gotta think about yourself, not just your opponent.", Bill winks.

"Gotcha," said Frank. "Any other moves you can show me?"

Bill smiled. "Yeah, I got one more. Come at me again!"

Frank once again spread out his arms and legs in a wrestling stance and let out a soft growl to Bill before charging him head on. As Frank was running, Bill didn't do anything. He just stood there as if he was waiting for the monstrous alligator. Frank wrapped his rippling arms around Bill's thick waist. Frank smiled think he got the upper hand. "Looks like I got you!" said Frank.

Bill just chuckled under Frank's grip. "You sure?" Bill wrapped his own arms around Frank and heaved him up in the air. The giant badger then titled back where the two met the ground. Before Frank could recollect what just happened, Bill turned him over. Frank was now on the ground with Bill pinning him there. "It's called 'the grand amplitude throw.'" said Bill.

"But..you hurt yourself...to get to me?" asked Frank.

Bill nodded. "Yeah, sometimes you need to beat yourself up in order to win. It's important that you use your size and weight to your advantage. Focus on yourself. Remember that."

Frank felt even more excited than when he first started his training. With these new moves he thought he could take down any fighter and he was ready for anything or anyone that could come his way. "Yeah, I understand," said Frank.
13522112112221212211121.title: Train

135221121122212122111212.content:
Frank scratched at his muzzle as the car hit a jolt and he grabbed the arm of the seat. "When are we getting there?" Bill chuckled as he spun the wheel while they rolled down a spiraling road that led off the highway.

"We'll be there soon! don't get your tail in a knot!" Frank huffed loudly as he closed his eyes, trying to drown out the spinning motion. He never did like riding in a car, he always got sick watching the scenery speeding by so quickly. When the road finally straightened out Frank took in a sigh of relief before he felt a large hand pat his shoulder. "You ok kid? You don't seem like you're feeling too good. Do you want me to head back? we can always go another time."

Frank shook his head before he gave his stomach a small pat. "I am ok. It's just I get car sick easily. Honest I'll b e okay when we get there." Bill nodded his head as he popped on his turn signal and began making his way off the main road and down a side road, stretching out for quite a ways on both sides sat a white sand beach with a beautiful blue ocean. Frank's eyes were glued to the water, his tail thumbing against the back seat, making Bill laughing out loud.

"You're really excited huh? We'll be there in a couple minutes, just try to control hat tail of yours!" A small blush spread over Frank's cheeks as he gave a sheepish grin, trying to stop his tail from thumping the back seat too hard.

"Sorry about that" Bill only shook his head, the smile not leaving his face as the car swung around into a large parking lot with quite a few cars already parked. As Bill turned in to one of the few spaces left, Frank was already fumbling with the car door to get out before Bill grabbed his shoulder.

"Easy champ! Or you'll rip the door right off! The ocean isn't going anywhere." Bill chuckled as Frank smile abashedly as he unlocked the door and stepped out, stretching his arms up behind his head, feeling the stiff joints slowly stretching out and working themselves loose.

"If we get any bigger you're gonna need another car. I felt really cramped in there." As bill slid out of the car he nodded, patting the hood of the car.

"Yea. Well it was just the right size for me until you came along, now i'm a few sizes bigger. so it might be time to get a new car for sure, but I can worry about that later. For now let's head out to the beach. I am excited to take a dip."

The two musclemen make their way onto the hot sand. Seeing the amount of beach-goers was pretty nice. They were already catching eyes of a couple folks as they walked straight towards the water. The moment the waves hit their toes, they both look at each other and then the small group of people watching them from behind. Most of them were astounded by their muscular size; Bill's mainly since he was thought to be smaller than he is now. Frank pats Bill on his broad shoulder, "Hey, how about a quick dip first?"

Bill shrugs his shrugs his shoulders, "Hey, fine with me. Won't wanna keep these guys waiting too long."

The two pals run into the water, until their enormous calves were covered by the water. They then take a giant leap into the water, leaving a huge splash in their tracks. They both merely lay around underwater for a short moment, letting the water soak their sinewy frames as they relaxed. After a minute, with the help of the swamp increasing their sizes of course, they both reappear over the open waters, and then swam back to shore. The moment their beefy bodies reemerged out of the water, the people watching them were even more surprised with what they see. After a glance at each other's smirking face, they both start displaying their veiny bods for public eyes to see, each doing their own bodybuilding poses.

The group of people weren't just impressed, they were overwhelmed with excitement for the flexing duo. Frank and Bill rolled their bodies into distinct positions to make their muscles look like pulsating boulders. As the muscle men tensed their bodies, the audience awed to see their muscles swell to massive proportions. They never saw muscles look so big and strong. Frank looked at his bicep and admired the strength inside it. He felt like he was in the swamp again as he tensed harder to make it bigger. To Bill, the show reminded him of the his early years as a fighter. He would show off to people after he would fight and now he's doing it again, bigger, stronger, and better than ever before.

Frank and Bill finish their show with an epic pose leaving the crowd going wild. They then relaxed and walked to find a spot on the beach. "I see why you like the beach," said Bill smiling. Frank didn't say anything. He just blushed while rubbing the back of his head.

"That was quite the show!" The muscle duo turned around to find a well muscled orca whale standing in front of them. The whale was about a foot shorter than Frank and Bill with a six pack on his chest. Clearly he was no where near as strong as Frank and Bill, but Bill could see the whale was still very strong and had well-shaped muscles to prove it.

"Thanks," said Bill. "Glad you liked it. By the look of it, I'd say you like to show off yourself."

The whale chuckled a little. "I guess. I just work out because I want be a big bodybuilder. Clearly I still got some way to go!"

"Don't worry, kid," said Bill, "Just keep at it and you'll be as big as us. I'm sure!" The badger then held out his meaty hand to the whale. "I'm Bill. The gator over here is Frank."

The whale took Bill's hand and shook it. "I'm Lucas. Nice to meet you!"
135221121122212122111212.title: Show off

1352211211222121221112121.content:
The young whale couldn't but be lost in the titan bodies Bill and Frank had. He had never seen anyone that big before and it motivated him even more to train harder so he could get bigger and stronger. Lucas reminded Frank of himself before he grew the first time. Lucas looked like they could be the same age but was able to build more muscle than Frank could before the swamp. Just by looking at his body and behavior, Frank knew Lucas was a decent fellow.

"Well, if you guys want, I packed a few extra snacks at beach spot," said Lucas. "You're more than welcome to join me." Bill and Frank had to admit they were a bit hungry after their swim and show, so they happily joined their new friend.

Lucas led the two giants to a big blue towel laying on the sand with a cooler on top of it. Lucas took a seat and pulled out a couple of drinks for Frank and Bill. Frank and Bill took a seat on the towel making the ground shake underneath Lucas. He was a bit surprised but also amazed. The whale couldn't help but be envious their incredible muscles.

"I have to say, you two are something!" said Lucas. "I never thought anyone could get this big!"

Bill took a gulp of his drink and chuckled. "You can with the right motivation!" He then flexed a bicep to Lucas. The bicep swelled with power ready to perform an incredible feat of strength as if it was teasing Lucas.

"Speaking of motivation," said Frank, "What's your story, Lucas? Why did you become a bodybuilder?"

"Well, I still got some years of training left before I start competing in bodybuilding competitions. But what really got me started was watching the best bodybuilder of all time: Reginald Thompson."

"I think I heard of that guy," said Bill taking another gulp. "He's that giant bear that tilted a tank over, right?"

Lucas nodded. Frank widened his eyes. A bear tilting a tank over? Reginald would have to be a big strong bear to do something like that. Frank was impressed to hear such a feat was accomplished. Lucas continued, "Yeah, he was my hero when I was a kid. So, I decided I wanted to train hard be as big as he is...maybe bigger."

Bill chuckled. "That's the spirit! I like it! Say, I know a few pointers myself and I've been sharing them with Frank. If you want, I can help you with your training."

Lucas eyes and mouth widened. "Wh...what? Really?!"

"Yeah! It'll be fun!"

"That would be amazing! I would love to! Thank you!"

"Come on." Bill walks over into a white square with certain weights and equipment in the middle, Frank and Lucas following behind.
