The first thing the badger picks up is a rather large dumbbell, 250 pounds to be exact. Lucas was amazed how easily Bill was holding the two weights up in his arms. "I usually start with working out my arms. The idea is to start slow until you can get into pain-and-gain mode.", Bill grins. Lucas watches eagerly as Bill starts slowly pumping his shredded arms with the weights. It wasn't long until his biceps were just searing up with blood and veins. Frank was pretty impressed himself, watching Bill's arms being pumped to the max. After his fiftieth rep Bill slowly lowers his shriveled arms, "Ahhh... Feels great. Whatcha think?"

"I...I just don't have the words. Your arms just look amazing!", Lucas yells.

"Well there's some.", Bill chuckles.

"Oh man... I'm just hyped up ta see what you'll do next!"

The next thing Bill eyes is a benching equipment. "Well, here's an idea." Bill simply walks up and lies on the benching equipment and places both hands on the bar. "Same process, just watch." The badger gets started without hesitation, lifting the bar off its resting place and slowly starts pumping his chest and arms. Lucas was in utter shock at how much Bill's pecs were rising up and down, and how his arms plumped. He never checked, but the badger must have been lifting at least 600 pounds. Bill's pumping speeding was starting to increase a bit, "Yeah...!", he grunts. "The moment you get comfortable with your body and the weights, it'll feel like you're getting even stronger from within."

The fish just kept his mouth agape, staring intently into Bill's 35-inch pythons. Frank snickers as he slowly inches his maw close to Lucas's, "He's already at his 30th rep by the way."

"Seriously?!"

It took only a few minutes more for Bill to reach just over fifty reps. The throbbing badger sets the bar back into its resting place with a loud grunt, "AH! There we go... How was that?"

Lucas wipes his mouth. "Sorry man, I'm drooling. I think that says it all."

Frank looks up behind them, "Hey, look who it is."
1352211211222121221112121.title: Hang out with Lucas

13522112112221212211121211.content:
Frank smiled and wagged his tail slightly to see a familiar female fox in front of him alongside a female wolf and rabbit whom Frank never saw before. "Erika!" said Frank. "It's great to see you!" Erika couldn't help but blush at the sight of a giant alligator talking to her, not to mention having other muscular guys standing next to him. Frank just smiled knowing Erika was shy but happy to see him again.

"Hey, Frank," said Erika, "I thought it was you so I thought I'd come and say hello. Is it my imagination or did you get bigger the last time I saw you?"

Frank chuckled making his chest ripple which made Ericka's face redder. "Yeah, well, I've been hitting the weights harder than usual thanks to my buds here." Frank then teasingly flexed his bicep to Erika. Erika was amazed to see his arm swell to a size bigger than her own head! She could also see veins throbbing across his arm that feed his body more power. Without even asking permission, Erika placed her hand on Frank's bicep and rubbed it. She could feel the warmth of his strength emitting from his scales as if Frank's bicep was a volcano ready to erupt with power. Erika then realized what she was doing and quickly brought her hand back to herself. Frank, and Erika's friends couldn't help but laugh. "I'm...I'm sorry,"

Frank waved his hand. "Don't worry. I was about to ask you if you wanted to feel!"

Bill leaned over to Lucas, who was admiring the girls talking to Frank about his muscles, and said, "Now that's how you pick up girls!"

Bill and Lucas walked toward the crowd and the girls were even more excited to see more muscular guys coming to see them. Frank introduced them to the girls. "Nice to meet you guys," said Erika. She pointed to her wolf friend, "This is Leah," then pointed to the rabbit, "And this Becky." Bill approached Leah talking and showing off to the wolf girl and Lucas talked to rabbit trying to impress her with the muscles he already had.

Frank smiled at Erika and then to his muscle friends. "Say guys, I think these fine ladies came by to see a show. Why don't we give them one?" Bill and Lucas grinned at the idea of posing show for the ladies. Lucas was exceptionally excited because he wanted to practice his bodybuilding routines more and women always made the perfect audience.

"Sounds great!" said Bill

"Let's do it!" said Lucas.

The three manly fellows stood proudly as if they were in a bodybuilding competition. Frank goes first, lifting both his lengthy arms up against his head, letting his guns show off how large and solid they were. He even shows off his chest and abdomen as he gives a wink out to Erika. Bill kneels down on one knee and then flexes one arm up and flexes the other arm down while puffing out his chest. Lucas stretches out one leg, swelling out his quads, and then does a side chest while swelling out his pecs as well. Their three-count audience were indeed happy with what they see.

Lucas let's a proud smile, showing off his sharp teeth, and then goes to his next pose, flexing one arm out and raising his other arm behind his head to make his lats stick out. Bill and Frank looked at each other, and then decided to follow sue. Seems better if they did the same pose together. Lucas turns his upper body around to do a back double-bi, and watches how the three ladies enjoy the show, not even noticing that his two pals were doing the same. He was about to perform another pose, but then finally takes notice of the two and how they were playfully mimicking him. "Whoa..." He saw know that the girls seemed more enamored with how Frank's and Bill's muscles rippled apart with their bulky, brawny frames.

Lucas decides to do one more pose, and it was a most muscular. The muscles on his back and arms swelled apart fairly well on his shorter frame. Definitely impressed Frank and Bill both, as they watched how hard his body was being flexed, how thick and meaty his arms were getting with his pulsating veins. He got a lot of attention from the three ladies too. Frank and Bill looked at each other with smiles on their faces, and then they lift up their beefy arms to do the same. If they were wearing a tank top it would have torn right off their overly-muscled frames, as their rippling back and traps rose up, their shoulders and arms swelling out greatly, their chests and legs filling out down below to make their herculean frames really show off their stuff.

The ladies clap and yell out proudly. Erika runs up to hug Frank's head, "Wow! That's amazing!"

"Glad ya liked it.", Frank winks, relaxing his throbbing frame.

"That was so much fun! Thanks you two for the show. Oh, and you too Lucas."

The orca puts on a weak smile, "Yeah. Sure thing."

Erika and her friends take off but not before waving their goodbyes to the muscular trio. Frank nudges Bill on his side, "I think Leah was starting to like you."

"Heh. Yeah, sure.", Bill laughs. He then looks over to Lucas, "Nice job back there, man. Hm?"
13522112112221212211121211.title: Meet Erika

135221121122212122111212111.content:
"Yeah," said Lucas weakly, "I was okay, I guess." The muscular whale slumped his giant shoulders and looked down at the ground.

"What's wrong, bro?" asked Frank. "You did great out there! Bill and I were following you every step of the way!"

"Yeah, but what about the girls?" said Lucas. "You saw them. They were more focused on you guys because you're twice my size." Frank looked back and remembered the girls looking at him and Bill and no eyes on Lucas. The whale was right.

"I'm sorry, bro," said Frank. "We didn't mean to hog all the attention."

"It's not your fault," said Lucas. "You can't help yourself being big. I...I just got a long way to go till anyone notices me and my muscles."

"You'll get there," said Bill with his hand on the whale's shoulder. "We all did."

"Yeah, but it'll take me years to compare myself to you." Lucas took a deep breath. "I'm sorry. I'm just a little frustrated. I've been training for a long time now and it seems like it's not enough despite the results I have now." Lucas sighed depressingly.

Bill walked over to Frank and whispered, "Think he needs a dip in the swamp?"

Frank's heart sunk. Was Bill serious? Another person knowing the swamp? Bill had to be kidding. "What?" said Frank. "You want him to use the swamp? We just met the kid! How do you know we can trust him? What makes you think he won't tell anyone about it?"

Bill smiled and said, "Because he reminds me of you." Frank then looked back at Lucas. Bill was right. Lucas tried so hard to improve himself finding little to no results from it, just like Frank did before the swamp. Frank sighed and agreed with Bill.

"Say, Lucas," said Bill, "I forgot to give you one more pointer. Follow me and I'll show you." Frank and Bill then led Lucas out of the beach and brought him to the swamp. During their trip, the muscle duo told the young whale everything about the magic swamp. At first, Lucas didn't believe them but his curiosity was still lingering on how they got so big. Maybe he gave them a benefit of a doubt because he hoped it was true. Before too long, Frank, Bill, and Lucas walked on the harbor of the swamp and looked down at the water.

"So...you guys got big just by swimming in this dirty swamp?" asked Lucas. Frank and Bill answered with a nod. "No offense, guys, but this is a little too hard to believe. I draw the line in swimming in a swamp. I don't want to get sick or..." Before he could finish his sentence, Lucas was picked up by Frank. Lucas felt incredibly light to Frank but Frank knew it wouldn't be the case for long. Frank raised Lucas over his head and tossed him into the murky depths of the swamp.

Due to Lucas being an aquatic creature, he swap back up in no time. "What the heck Frank!?" He then swims up to the harbor and picks his mucky frame out of the water. "Yuck... This stuff is gross..."

"Feel anything yet?", Bill asks, lowering his head in front of the whale.

Lucas just wipes the swamp water off of his body, "No. Except, my arm is starting to hurt a bit." Actually his arm was starting to tense, and grow! His eyes open wide as he watches his left arm twinge and expand right before him. "Urgh..! What in the world...?", he grunts as his arm bulges out even more. His other throbs out too, starting to inflate and swell out with his growing body. His pecs blast out next, filling up more and more to match his arms. His abs start to pop out by row on his stomach, even giving the fish a fourth set of abs. His bones starting popping and growing to add height to his figure. His back ripples apart and makes the V-shape appear more prominent and defined with his body. He stumbles up to his feet, feeling his upper body muscles pulsate nicely as he held out his veiny arms. The last of course where Lucas's legs, which started to inflate and turn his thighs into tree trunks. His calves explode out underneath to finish off his growth spurt, though the pleasurable sensation Lucas got in return still stuck around for a bit. "Nng...!", the enlarged well grunts, "This...this is incredible!"

Frank walks up to pat Lucas on his broadened shoulder, his muscles still throbbing from his growth, "told ya. What do you think of your new body now?"

Lucas watches as he flexes his arm, watching it rise higher than he ever thought before and feeling pumped with power. "It's, this is, it's great!" Lucas proudly sticks his arms out in one direction, felling his plump muscles swell out with his body. "I never thought I'd get this big."

"Our pleasure.", Bill replies happily. He even rubs down Lucas's bicep as he flexes his arm for show once again.

"Guys...I don't know what to say..."

Frank pats Lucas once again, "You don't have to say anything, long as you keep this a secret and just between us."

"Yeah. Don't want the public taking notice of this special swamp.", Bill adds.

Lucas just puts on a big grin. "No problem!"
135221121122212122111212111.title: Lucas feels depressed

choices: Frank and Bill don't join competition
1352211211222121221112121111.content:
Lucas couldn't believe what just happened. He just took a dip into a swamp that gave him the body he worked so hard to achieve. He felt stronger and powerful than he ever felt before. However he looked at Frank and Bill again. The gator and badger were still bigger than the young bodybuilding whale. Lucas hated to admit it but he wanted more power. He wanted to be as powerful as Frank and Bill.

"Guys," started Lucas, "This is truly amazing and I appreciate you doing this, but would it be okay if I tried getting as big as you?"

Bill laughed out loud. "I knew that was coming! Of course, man! You're more than welcome to go in again. Just don't get too big...or else Frank and I will try to match you!" They all laughed.

"Okay," said Lucas. "Wish me luck!" Lucas dived into the waters again. After about half a minute, Lucas jumped out of the water and landed on the harbor. Instead of washing off the water off his body, Lucas embraced it hoping every ounce of water got soaked up in his muscles. Then he waited. "Waiting's the worst part," he said to Frank and Bill.

"I know!" said Frank, "But it'll be worth it!"

Then Lucas felt a punch in his stomach. Something felt warm deep in his core and began to spread to the rest of his body. Lucas smiled but he quickly got on his knees because this growth was more intense than the previous one. He felt his arms pulsate quicker and harder as they swelled into new godly proportions. It was as if someone was shoving diamonds into his body giving him strength and invincibility. His pecs and abs then inflated and broadened outwards making his chest more ripped and powerful. Lucas could even feel another row of abs forming underneath giving him the same ten pack Frank and Bill have. His legs grew wider and longer than tree trunks; they became more like mountains that could support any massive weights set upon it. Lucas then felt himself getting taller as bones shifted again and his back broadened more giving a more defined v shape. The growth finally cooled to a halt. Lucas rose back up to his feet and took a deep breath that puffed his enormous chest. He then looked back at Frank and Bill who were now at eye level to him. Lucas was finally at the same size as them and had the godly body he always wanted. Lucas flexed a bicep and said, "What do you think?" in a deeper voice.

Bill flexes his beefy over his mountainous pecs, "You look great! Now it looks like you can give those hardcore bodybuilders run for their money."

"You know, I've always had an interest in bodybuilding. Maybe I can run up against Lucas someday.", Frank laughs.

Lucas walks up to the alligator. "Yeah, maybe someday." He then wraps his shredded arms around Frank's waist, hoisting the reptile up so that he was picking Frank up over his head. Lucas snorts, "Yeah! I can finally pick YOU up now!"

"Whoa, watch it man!", Frank cries. "Okay, I'm sorry, you got me. Put me down!"

Lucas and Bill laugh out loud, the bulging whale then gently setting Frank down. "Sorry man. Just be sure to ask next time instead of just throwing me in."

"I did!", Frank cries. "You said 'no'!"

"I think he means you could of just lowered him down into the swamp gently instead of throwing him.", Bill chuckles. "So Lucas, what are you gonna do know?"

"Well, I'm definitely considering to take part in that bodybuilding championship now." Frank and Bill look at him, puzzled. "What, you guys didn't know? There's gonna be a championship to see who's the biggest and strongest guy out there. There were posters everywhere."

"We were just interested in swimming and showing off.", Frank replies.

Lucas swells out his pecs, almost able to feel them rise up beneath his chin. "With a body like this, I don't think anyone else'll stand a chance. Unless..." Both Frank and Bill raise an eyebrow at him. "Hey, would you guys wanna enter? It'd be nice to have some competition."

The gator and badger look at each other, and then think about it for a moment.
1352211211222121221112121111.title: Lucas grows more

choices: Frank shows off for a bit, then showers before sleeping.
13522112112221212211121211112.content:
The whole tournament sounded like a great idea, but Frank and Bill both were aware of another competition they wanted to keep their eyes on. Frank had to let the orca down, "That sounds great and all, but me and Bill are thinking about entering a different tournament."

"Oh...", the fish replies sadly.

Bill pats Lucas on his shoulder, "But hey, me and Frank'll be there to watch you win. We promise."

That did help bring Lucas's spirits up. "Really? Great! By the way, what tournament are you guys taking part in?"

"It's a wrestling tournament.", Bill replies. "Me and Frank have been training for days. We even thought about teaming up together."

"Hey, you think you can watch us fight during the tournament?", Frank asks excitedly?

"Yeah, I'd love to. Be great to see you guys in action." Lucas then walks up to his new best buds to give 'em a hug. "Thanks for telling me all about his swamp. I promise I won't tell anyone about it." They then break from their quick hug.

"No problem, friend!", Bill replies happily. "Well, I it's time me and Frank start heading out. You need me to give you ride home or anything?"

Lucas nods his head, "Nah. I think I'll be fine." Lucas then stretches out one leg, thickening out his humongous thighs and calves. "Nng! Besides, I've got a beefy new bod that I'm just itchin' ta try out!", he winks.

Frank and the badger smile back. "Glad to hear. You take care."

Frank and Bill start walking away, Lucas waving off as they go. "You too! See ya's!"

---


Later that day, Bill drove his pal Frank back to his place. Frank still felt really uncomfortable sitting in Bill's car, but he promised he'd get a bigger vehicle really soon. At least Frank made it back to his place without losing his lunch this time. "See? Told ya you'd be okay.", Bill smirks.

The rugged gator manages to get himself out of Bill's car. "Ugh... Yeah, yeah."

Bill laughs. "Well, I'll be seein' ya tomorrow then?"

"Sure. You don't have to pick me up though. I can walk to your place."

Bill raises an eyebrow. "Oh? You sure?" Frank responds by stomping out a clawed foot, swelling out his own tree-trunk thighs, and bulging calves. Frank then smirks while sticking out his tongue, as if Bill even had to ask. "Alright, alright. You take care then, Frank."

"You too! See ya Bill!", Frank smiles. Bill then drives off. Frank watches his car drive away for a brief moment, and then he takes in a deep breath, puffing out his meaty pecs, and then exhaling to bring it in. "Ah..." It wasn't necessarily close to sunset yet, and Frank's muscular frame was still pretty energized. Maybe he can workout a bit on his own with the weights he has in his basement.

The exhilarated reptile runs straight for his house and down to his basement. Just a quick workout will do for now. Frank first walks up to a rack full of dumbbells just like the ones Bill was working with at the beach earlier. Only difference this time is that he picked up a pair of 300-pound dumbbells, and then stood in front of the full-length he had. Frank starts pumping his arms in no time, and his immense peaks just exploded as they earned some nice snaking veins. His beefy arms were getting worked hard, but he adjusted to the weights, only wanting more and more power to be pumped through his veins. After about 15 minutes of arm curls, he drops the weights and proceeds on the bench. After first setting up the weights, a little more than Bill had once again, he lies down on his rippled back and takes a deep breath before he starts his workout with the bar. Only his first rep was the hardest, because the tensing and straining from his bulging body brought even more strength to proceed on. He lets out a proud grunt as he reaches his 50th rep in no time. He drops the bar into its resting place, and then sits back up, feeling as if his entire upper frame was about to blow. Not that it was a bad thing of course. The last were his legs, and he knew just what to do with those; leg squats.

He puts more weights on the bar, and then manages to hoist it up with his back. He starts squatting in no time, blasting out his enormous quads and calves in on time. The warmth and power he was receiving just felt great, as well as the pain and blood rushing through his veins. He lets out another proud grunting noise, his monstrously thick back and unattainable legs flexing incredibly to his advantage. He never felt this good before. Maybe except the time he grew into the strapping alligator his is now, but continuing on, Frank reaches his 50th rep as well. "Nnaugh!!" He drops the bar to the floor with a loud 'Thunk!' and then walks his bulging frame in front of the mirror once again.
13522112112221212211121211112.title: Can't Join

choices: Go to Frank and Bill's wrestling tournament
135221121122212122111212111122.content:
A quick workout gave Frank a “pumped” look and sensation. Frank smiled looking at the giant gator that stood before him in the mirror, standing several feet tall with muscles that made him nearly invincible. Frank lifted his arm and flexed hard to see his bicep erupt with veiny power. He put his other hand on the scales covering his arm to feel his bicep. It was harder than steel, just the way Frank liked it. Frank then curled his arms downwards to puff up his chest where his pecs slightly touched his chin. He finished by sticking out his blasted leg and tensed his thigh and calf to mass proportions.

Frank then took a deep breath and stretched his massive arm in the air. “Big and strong, just the way I like it!” He realized his quick workout and show drained all the energy that remained in him. It was time to take a relaxing hot shower and head on to bed. Frank did as such and slept like a peaceful giant.

Frank woke up completely re-energized and ready to start the day. He agreed to meet up with Bill at his place to have a hearty breakfast. Frank quickly got out of bed, put on a pair of stretchy spandex shorts, and rushed out of the house. Frank was in such a hurry to eat, he forgot to put a shirt on. He shrugged at the thought. He thought he looked better without a shirt covering his shredded chest. Frank then started a light jog to Bill’s place.

As he jogged, Frank felt the burning his thighs and calves thinking they felt good and strong. He turned his head and stopped jogging to see a familiar face. He saw a hugely muscular orca whale flexing in front of a female rabbit. Frank recognized the two as Lucas and Becky, one of Erika’s friends that he met at the beach. The gator chuckled and made his way to them.

“Hey, Lucas!” greeted Frank waving as he walked to Lucas’s position.

Lucas smiled seeing Frank. “Hey, Frank! Getting a jog in before breakfast?”

“Yep! I was actually jogging to Bill’s place for breakfast. You’re welcome to join us if you want to.”

Lucas’s eyes widened. “Yeah! Sure!” He then turned to his rabbit friend. “Care to join us, babe?”

Becky blushed while still clinging onto Lucas’s bicep. “Um…I don’t think so. I think Erika and Leah might get jealous if I did that. I don’t want to make them mad.”

“I understand,” said Lucas. “I’ll see you soon, babe.” Lucas winked at Becky and Becky blushed harder. The muscle whale and gator waved goodbye to their rabbit friend and jogged to Bill’s house.

The two made it to the house in no time. Lucas could hardly believe the size of Bill’s house. “This is where Bill lives?” Lucas asked.

Frank nodded. “Yep! Being a professional fighter pays a lot!”

Lucas chuckled. “So does bodybuilding…maybe you two should give it a try sometime!” Frank repeated Lucas chuckle, stopped at Bill’s front door, and knocked on the door loud and hard with his incredible strength.

Bill opened the door and saw Frank and Lucas standing. Bill teased, “When my door sounded like it was about to be bashed into, I knew you guys would be here!”

Frank rubbed the back of his head. “Sorry…”

“No worries!” said Bill. “Come on in. I got breakfast ready!” Frank and Lucas entered the house and followed Bill to the kitchen. Bill had a whole buffet table of food waiting for them. There were plates across the table holding piles of various foods, pancakes, bacon, eggs, sausage, fruit, even steak. Frank and Bill’s eyes widened to see such amazing food waiting to be eaten. Lucas couldn’t help but drool a little. “So what do you think?” asked Bill.

“I think we should dig in!” exclaimed Lucas. The trio didn’t hesitate and began their meal. They all ravenously shoved food into their mouths to fill their endless appetite. They stopped until every scrap was in their chiseled abs. Lucas rubbed his ten pack in satisfaction. “That was great, Bill!” said Lucas. “Thanks…say, doesn’t anyone feel a little more energized…maybe bigger?” Lucas noticed that his muscles looked bulkier and stronger than before, which satisfied him but drew his curiosity.

Frank smiled. “You’re right! It’s a side effect of the swamp. Whenever you eat a lot of food, your muscles get a bit bigger but it wears off after a while.” Lucas eyes widened again and smiled. He got bigger just by eating a ton of food? It was a dream! With a body like his, Lucas needed a lot of food to feed his muscles but didn’t think he would be rewarded for it. Lucas flexed a bulky bicep to himself with pleasure with Frank and Bill chuckling.

Bill finished his last bite and said, “So, what’s our plan for today?”
135221121122212122111212111122.title: Frank shows off for a bit, then showers before ...

choices: Celebrate Lucas's win with the girls.
Have fun spending Lucas's prize money.
1352211211222121221112121111221.content:
Frank thinks to himself for a bit, but then comes to a realization. "Say, the bodybuilding championship is about to start isn't it? I say we should see Lucas show his stuff. His competition is starting up first after all."

Lucas liked the sound of that. "Oh yeah, sweet! And I'll be sure to see you guys as well!", he replies excitedly. He gently picks himself up out of his seat, bends on one knee, and arches his upper body to the side while he flexes his meaty arm once again with such muscular grace. "I'd say I'm 'bout ready to put my muscles on display, and show those other guys who's the biggest and strongest."

Bill and Frank were happy to hear that from their recent friend. They couldn't wait to see Lucas perform on stage. The badger holds up his hand, "Oh, wait a sec." He walks up out of his seat to grab an empty fruit basket and puts a couple different types of foods inside. He then walks up to hand it to Lucas, "Here. Be sure to eat up every once in a while. Me and Frank wanna see you at your biggest, like you said.", he winks.

"Hey, thanks!", the whale replies happily. "I'll be sure to do that. But uh, not during the strength testing round of course, if there is one."

---


A few hours later, the bodybuilding competition was just about to start. Frank and Bill had front-row seats thanks to Lucas. Frank happens to scan to seats behind him, and spots Erika and her friends were watching from a few rows back as well. "Heh.", the gator chuckles.

Bill looks over to Frank, "What is it?"

"Erika and her friends are here. Becky's gonna be so stoked.", Frank snickers.

The announcer calls upon the contestants (five in all), the last one being Lucas, who proudly walks up to stand alongside the others. There was only one person who was still Lucas's height, but the rest of them was pretty close too. Frank and Bill noticed the orca's frame was still bulging out wonderfully just as before, and was getting a lot of attention from the crowd as well. The first round is of each contestant just showing off their stuff. They began by doing some simple poses, pumping and flexing each and every muscle group they could think of. Lucas seemed to be getting a lot of praise, but so did the large eagle who's build and size nearly matched his. The large avian looked pretty intimidating, but he did like the whale's massive build so it was okay.

While holding his pose, the eagle says to Lucas, "You got some good moves, big guy. Think you can win this?"

Lucas looks back to the eagle and smiles. "Yeah, I do. I still got one more trick up my sleeve." Lucas released himself from his pose and wrapped his thick arms around the eagle. With little effort, the whale heaved him up to his chest and above his head. The audience gasped at the sight while Frank, Bill, Ericka, and the others smiled excitedly. Lucas finishes his feat by letting his arm down leaving him holding the eagle in one hand and flexing his bicep to the crowd. He smiled as a finishing touch.

The audience went wild thinking they had found a winner for the competition. Frank and Bill clapped and cheered wildly for him. Frank leaned over to Bill and said, "He's a bit of a show off, isn't he?"

Bill chuckled, "He's a bodybuilder, what do you expect? Besides, wouldn't you if you were on that stage?" Frank agreed and continued cheering his whale friend on.

Lucas puts the eagle down and the eagle still kept a look of amazement on his face. "Told you I had one more trick," said Lucas. "Sorry for surprising you like that. You okay?"

"Y..yeah. I'm fine," said the eagle. "Wow! That was awesome! I don't think even I could do that!"

The overall show finally came to a close. All of the bodybuilders all lined up for the announcement of the winners. The host of the show got up in front with a trophy as big as Lucas sitting next to him. He called for the top three competitors. "For third place....Mike!" a rhino about half Lucas's size came up and was awarded with a medal. "For second place...Ronald!" The eagle Lucas picked up stepped forward and was awarded a medal and a big check. "And for first place...Lucas!" The audience cheered and clapped as Lucas walked up while flexing. He shook hands with the host, was given a big check, and lifted the big trophy with one hand effortlessly. This was the best day in the young whale's life.
1352211211222121221112121111221.title: The Bodybuilding Championship

13522112112221212211121211112211.content:
Frank, Bill, and the girls meet up with Lucas later after the competition. They all get together as soon as the large whale steps out of the locker, he receives a big hug from Becky to show how proud she was, even though she was barely able to hug half of Lucas's body. "Wow! Way ta go Lucas! I'm so happy for you!"

Lucas nearly fumbles his trophy, but sets it down safely to hug the rabbit back. "Heh, thank Becky." He looks around to see everyone else, "You guys enjoy the show?"

"Sure did!", Bill roars with pride. "You did a great job up there."

"So whatcha gonna do now?", Frank asks as he walks up.

"Well, I was thinking...of having a party! And you guys are invited." The girls cheered loudly, excited to attend a party with an up-and-coming bodybuilding universe winner. "Hey, why don't you gals head to the snack shack. Gotta talk to Frank and Bill for a bit." The three jumpy bunnies do just that. Soon as they were out of earshot, the proud whale walks up to the croc and badger. "Hey, can you believe it? I won! That swamp was a great help. It even brought back my confidence in bodybuilding."

Frank smiles, "Hey, that's great. How's your workouts been?"

Lucas raises his massive, shredded arms to flex, stretching the sleeves of that tight shirt he was wearing to its limit. "RRGH! Great! I can work out nonstop for hours without breakin' a sweat. Hey, so you guys coming along? I invited the other competitors to come over too."

Bill shrugs his humongous shoulders, "Eh, ain't got nothing better to do."

"I'll be there too.", Frank adds. "I'd like to see just how big those other guys are."

Frank, Bill, Lucas, and the girls walked along the sandy shore of the beach. The muscle trio were wearing speedos to show off their incredibly sculpted muscles and had their ladies by their side. They were later greeted by other muscular guys whom Lucas recognized from the competition. All the party goers brought food, music, towels, even a net and ball for volleyball. It seemed like the party was starting strong.

"So," said Lucas turning to his friends, "What should we do first?"

Frank said, "I don't know about you guys but my muscles are itching to some action. How about we play a game of volleyball with the competitors?"

Bill swung his rippling arms and flexed them. "Sounds like a plan! Let's do it!"

Frank, Bill, and Lucas set up a three versus three match. They were on one team while a tiger, a dragon, and a bull from the competition were on the other. The other team served the ball first and the game was on.

The ball jumped from one side of the net to the other. The other barely kept up with Frank, Bill, and Lucas who were working very well together. The muscle trio passed the ball to each other and spiked several points ahead of the other team. Their muscles made the ball go super fast so points were scored in no time. Bill passed the ball to Frank and Frank jumped to it with his amazing legs and spiked the ball hard to the other side of the fence. With that last score, the match was decided. Frank, Bill, and Lucas won the match. They were cheering as the other team congratulated them following their lady friends.
13522112112221212211121211112211.title: Celebrate Lucas's win with the girls.

choices: walking over to them amazed at their bodies, and their castle.
being bullied by 2 guys bigger than him, who were smashing his castle.
135221121122212122111212111122112.content:
Frank, Lucas, and Bill all smiled as their fans congratulated them. The volleyball game had been fun, but the 3 didn't want to completely show off, and discourage the others. "Hey guys" Lucas said to Frank and Bill, "Is there something else we can do? I wanna do something that's a real challenge for us" Bill nodded "me too, it feels like everything we do is too easy. We need some sort of competition where smaller guys have an advantage."

They looked around the beach for another activity. Bill thought about surfing, but there weren't any waves to surf on. Then Frank tapped the others and they saw he was starring at something. They followed his gaze to see a little wolf pup making a sandcastle.

They all broke out in a grin. "That's just the thing! Building sandcastles will be tricky for us with all our added bulk" Frank said.

"But hey lets give it a try. Lets all work on one together" Lucas said. The 3 fist bumped as they got to work. As ordinary spades and pails were too small to be used by them, They grabbed big shovels and a barrel. They all scooped sand into their barrel, then Lucas used his whale blowhole to spray water and get it wet. "Sory guys" he blushed as he saw he sprayed the other 2.

"Don't worry about it, its awfully hot" Bill said. Sweat was pouring down their faces, their backs, and even into their jockstraps. But they dipped in the water once in a while to deal with it. Frank heaved a barrel of heavy mud like it was nothing, and turned it upsidown making a big pillar. Then he set the barrel down.

"Ok I think we got a good start" Frank said as they looked over the 4 big turrets they made. "Next, the walls." Bill said. The walls were definetly trickier for them, as they couldn't use any sort of mold. The gator, whale, and raccoon all tried to put them up, but it was slow work as sand kept crumbling. Soon however they managed to get the walls up connecting the turrets. "Ok, whats next?" Bill said looking over it. The turrests were 4 feet high, and the wall was 3 feet high.

"Hmm..' Lucas said looking over it, "It needs an entrance" The whale closed his hand into a fist and before the other 2 could say anything, he punched straight through, leaving a hole a foot wide. Frank sighed with relief that it didn't collapse. "ok, CAREFULLY, remove sand to form an arch, and make the entrance."

The huge guys continued on, the biggest trouble now was staying calm enough for their tails to not wag. By now lots of people had noticed them and were walking by to see, Some were even getting pictures of the studs playing in the sand. But they didn't care. Frank was now working on details. He used his claws, as well as his tail to carefully carve out shapes on the wall to make it look better. Then they all heard a noise

"HEY!"

The three of them looked up to see that wolf pup they saw earlier. he was....

His pecs bounced a little when he thought he could test how fast he was with his new legs. With that thought in mind he bolts out to do just that. While he's jogging...

14.content: Which bird do you wish to follow?
14.title: Bird

141.content:
Michel walked across the street feeling depressed. He just came back from the military recruit center. The lieutenant in charge of the center said the young eagle was in no shape to be in the army because he was too small. Michel wouldn't last a second on the battlefield according to the strict soldier. The eagle didn't know what else to say or do except leave.

Michel made his feathers droop. Ever since his father told him stories of being in the military, Michel always wanted to be a soldier. He studied hard and worked out as hard as he could. For some reason, he couldn't see any results. Michel trained for a very long time and could not get his muscles in the big strong shape he needed to be a soldier. He didn't know what was wrong.

Michel then stopped in front of a tattoo shop. He made an appointment to get a tattoo for his arms as a reward for getting into the military forces, but now that he wasn't going to be, he wasn't sure if he still wanted the tattoos. Michel reconsidered thinking the tattoos would make him tougher and give him motivation to train even harder, so the young eagle went inside.

As the eagle went inside, Michel could hear the buzzing of needles in all corners of the room. He was greeted by a lean hyena.

"Can I help you?" asked the hyena.

"Y..yeah, I have an appointment. Name's Michel."

The hyena went through the computer at the front desk and found Michel's name. He then said, "Alright. Right this way, please." The hyena led Michel to the back where he took a seat right next to the hyena, who appeared to be his tattoo artist.

"So what'll it be today?" asked the hyena.

"Well," started Michel, "I was thinking some type of band around my arms, like something that stretches over and under my biceps."

"Sure, no problem," said the hyena. "What kind of band do you want?"

"Well, I always liked griffins. How about griffins that go down my biceps and their wings go around them?"

The hyena's ears perked and his eyes widened. "That sounds pretty cool! I like it! Let's do it!"

Before the needle began to buzz, Michel braces himself for the pain. He knew that getting tattoos was never easy. Once the needle hit underneath his feathers, Michel grunted slightly and waited patiently for the pain to stop, even though it wouldn't for quite a while.

After about an hour, the needle finally stopped. "All done," said the hyena. "What do you think?" Michel raised his arms and widened his eyes. He saw majestic mythical creatures laying peacefully on his arms. As he rolled his biceps, Michel could see the creatures' wings stretch all around them. The griffins on his arms looked brave and powerful, qualities that Michel envied. With all the incredible details, the griffins looked like they were almost alive.

"These looks great!" said Michel. "I love them! Thank you so much!" Michel went back up front, payed at the front desk and left the tattoo shop. Even though he didn't get into the military, somehow, Michel thought, with his tattoos, things were going to get better.
141.title: Michel the Eagle

1411.content:
First thing Michel wanted to do was head home to check out his new tattoo. He was so excited to check it out he actually ran home to see it. In a matter of minutes, he was inside his house and ran up to his room. He then tugs off his shirt and tosses it aside so he won't have to pull his shirt sleeve up to see his tattoo clearly. He really liked it. It looked really awesome on his feathery skin. That tattoo artist should be getting awards for how clear and realistic these tattoos look. On the downside though, it doesn't seem to support his average frame. He flexed his arm a bit, but it didn't seem to do much with the tattoo. He bets if his biceps were much larger, then his tattoo would wrap around just the way he wanted. He does so by imagining it, being so strong and muscular. Then he'd show that recruiter just how tough he is.

All of a sudden, he sees the griffon's eyes start to light up in the mirror. "Whoa! What the...!?" It didn't seem to do much except emit a bright, yellowy light as it shines in the mirror. "What's going o-...AH...!", the eagle grunts. A sudden twinge of pain starts to erupt all over his body, making the avian drop down to his knees. He slowly lifts up his arm to see the griffon, still with it's glowing eyes. The pain was getting pretty intense, making it hard to tell whether or not his arm was starting to stretch and grow right before him. He was. His arms started to tense up, his forearms, biceps, triceps, and shoulders shuddering and inflating with bulk.

He could then feel his pecs start to rise below his chin, and feel his chest and lats stretch out between his arms. His neck and back muscles start to take off, growing much more pronounced and rippled all behind him. "NNGAH...!", he grunts again. Although the feeling was intense, it was quite gratifying to his growing frame. His once-flat stomach starts to tighten up underneath his thick pecs, forming a chiseled set of 6-pack abs. Michel was awestruck at the growing figure in the mirror, even though it was him. He couldn't believe this was happening to him, in a good way, as he manages to rub his meaty palm over his well-defined abdominals. "URRGH!!"

The next part was pretty painful, his bones. They started to elongate and pop to support his growing frame. His wings started to stretch out further on his back, only to support the shooting pain. Luckily it was over before he knew. "Ow..." The last was his legs, which were covered by his back denim jeans. His pants were quite loose, and he needed the support of a belt to wear it. Soon as he felt his hips start to widen out, he quickly loosens his belt and slips it off. He then waits patiently as he felts his thighs and calves start to fill out his once loose pants. He sees it was over as soon as his clawed feet started to swell and lengthen out a few inches, until it was over.

He heaves a bit for the next couple minutes as he waits patiently for anymore shooting pain. Looks like it was over.

Michel took a deep breath out of relief making his pecs and abs ripple with power. All of a sudden Michel was full of energy and he became even more energized when he saw his reflection in the mirror. He saw a big muscular eagle standing right where Michel used to stand. Michel dropped his beak to the floor. Could that giant muscle eagle be him. Michel raised his arm and flexed hard making his bicep rise to a fantastic peak with veins pulsating on the top. His reflection did what Michel did. No doubt Michel was now the big eagle.

Michel rubbed his bicep with his feathery hand feeling the warmth and power it contained, but he still had no idea how he got so big. He was so excited about his change he never stopped to think about it. Michel then noticed his tattoos. The eyes of the griffins weren't glowing anymore. With the glowing happening before his growth and stopping after, Michel assumed that his new tattoos had something to do with it. He had no idea how, nor did he really care. Michel was just thankful that he now had the body he needed to start his military career. All he needed to do now was to go to the recruit center again.

Michel waited a few days to go back to the recruit center because he didn't want the lieutenant to be suspicious of him when he returns. Michel entered the center with his new strong body. The lieutenant, a large muscular lion, saw Michel with great interest.

"Welcome, young man," said the lion, "You interested in joining our nation's forces?"

Michel nodded. "Yes sir. I've been wanting to join since I was little and I'm ready to report for duty, sir!"

"You got spirit," said the lion. "I'll give you that, but it'll take a lot more than that to go far in this career choice. You have to make some tough choices. Are you ready for that?"

"Yes sir!" said Michel with no hesitation.

"Very well," the lion handed him a pamphlet. "If you're determined, training begins 6 months from now. Be ready!"

Michel looked at the lion with a grin of excitement. Michel's dream was finally coming true. All he needs to do now is wait 6 months till his training begins. He could hardly wait.
1411.title: Grows a little

14111.content:
Michel was so psyched! He crumples the pamphlet in his hand without noticing as he pumps both his arms in excitement, "YES!" His dreams of becoming a army recruit are coming true! He then turns to walk along with pride, kicking his legs up as he walks to head home. One thing suddenly crosses him though, and he ends up stopping right in front of the place that caused it. His slips up his shirt sleeve over his bulging bicep to see the tattoo he got printed all around it. He was so caught up in all the excitement, he didn't realize that it's not normal for a tattoo to grow, or induce muscle growth.

Looking through the window, that hyena fellow was still inside. It'd be nice to get an explanation from him. Michel swings the door open, the bell ringing from above to give notice to the hyena. "Oh, hey there buddy. Welcome back."

"Hm. So he still knows who I am, but I wonder if he notices anything different.", Michel thought. "Hey." The enlarged bird leans in to set his beefy arms one the counter. "So, you remember me from earlier, right?"

"Of course!", the hyena replies gladly. "I see you're much, MUCH bigger than last time. That was quite a growth spurt you must of had." The hyena just kept smiling, almost as if he were in denial.

Michel had to raise his tone, "Don't just smile at me like that. Something's up with this tattoo and I'm sure you know all about it.", he asserts.

"What? You don't like it?", the hyena frowns, but then it comes back again, "If you want, I can always take it off."

"No, I like it!", he assured. "Although, that's really good to know. Anyway, exactly what kind tattoo did you give me?"

"I do believe it's one of my best designs yet.", the hyena smirks. "I'll introduce myself. My name is Oregan. I'm actually just a normal, well-known tattoo artist, who just so happens to have found a way to make magical tattoos grow a person.", he winks.

"Wait, so I'm not the only one?", Michel speaks up.

"Actually, you're one of the very few. I've done thousands of regular tattoo designs, but yours is quite magical indeed.", he assures. "How do ya like it?"

"I...well, I love it. Very much as a matter of fact.", Michel replies. "But, why me of all people?"

Oregan shrugs his shoulders, "You seemed to be down on your luck. I saw you enter the recruiting center not too long ago, only to see you come back here looking all sad and depressed. I thought a little touch of magic would help cheer you back up."

"Uh...", Michel didn't really know what to say, except, "...thank you."

"Ah, don't worry about it.", Oregan grins. "You woulda done the same for me."

"Uh..."

"Forget what I said. Now, there are just a few things you should know about. You can grow more, but since you only have two tattoos, you won't grow as fast. Now, if you were to get more, your growth would erupt much faster, and at a 50% discount. My tattoos also come with a guarantee. If ever the customer isn't satisfied with his tattoo, or just wants to turn back to normal, he/she can always come back and I'll remove it free of charge.", he proudly grins.

"Say, now that you're here, why don't you show me what you got?" asked Oregan.

"What do you mean?" asked Michel.

"Well, your muscles aren't just for show! You've also gotten a lot stronger! Do some push ups and show me how strong you are now!"

Michel wasn't sure about doing push ups in a tattoo shop but he could feel his muscle itching with energy waiting to be exerted. Besides, he was curious himself on how strong he was now. So, Michel went down on all fours and started pushing himself up and down against the floor.

Michel could feel the burn in his arms and he learned to love it. In fact, it felt intoxicating to him. Oregan watched as Michel's tattoos swelled in detail as well as Michel's biceps between reps. His arms plumped as Michel pushed up and still kept their strong shape after going down to the floor. Michel lost count at 50 but still continued until he got bored.

Michel rose back up still feeling energized. Even after doing several push ups, Michel felt like he could bounce off the walls all day. Oregan was pleased. "You seem to have a lot of power within you. I'm glad I was able to help you."

Michel nodded. "Thanks. I can now pursue my dream because of what you did. Thank you!"

"Don't mention it! If I can be of any more assistance, let me know!"

"I will!" Michel said goodbye to Oregan and left the shop thinking about what to do now since he still has plenty of energy to burn off. Michel thought the possibilities were endless.
14111.title: Trains

141112.content:
Michel left the shop feeling like he needed to test his new strength more. Push ups did nothing but make him want to exert more energy. He needed to burn off some steam and he knew just the place to do it: the gym. It would be a perfect place to see how strong he really was and maybe even make him stronger. Besides, if Michel was going to military training in 6 months, he needed to start training immediately. Without further delay, Michel rushed to the gym.

As Michel arrived at the gym, he quickly made his way to the weights. Before starting, Michel took off his shirt since it was not a workout shirt and didn't want it to get it soaked with sweat. Michel then smiled at his chest feeling satisfied with his solid 6 pack. He was ready for anything.

Michel first saw the weight bench and knew that's where he wanted to start first. The eagle saw the bar weight 200 pounds. It sounded heavy to Michel but he was willing to see how much he could take. He lied down and gripped the bar. As he lifted the bar off it resting place and began his reps, Michel felt the weight was challenging. The bar was heavy but enough for Michel to bear.

Michel gritted his teeth trying to make it to his fifth rep. After doing so, the weight somehow began to feel lighter. After each rep, the bar went from a ton of lead to a single feather. Michel didn't know why it was feeling lighter to him suddenly. He figured his body was finally warmed up for the rest of his training.

Michel then decided to try out the leg press machine. He set the machine to 250 pounds since 200 was getting easier for him. The eagle took his seat and began working his legs. This workout felt more intense than the weight bench. Michel pressed his legs and he felt nothing but tough pressure in his thighs and calves. He then began feeling a burning sensation, but that didn't stop him. In fact, he liked the feeling. After doing a few more leg lifts, the sensation ceased and the weight began to feel light also. 250 pounds felt like nothing to Michel now.

Michel paused his workout all puzzled. He didn't know what was going on. His workouts started out hard at first but then they suddenly became easy. Michel became more puzzled when he saw himself in a nearby full sized mirror. Michel saw himself more pumped than when he first came in! His biceps were larger and rounder, his legs were thicker, and his chest was more defined. Was it his workout regimen, or something else? Michel didn't care. He loved this new pumped up body of his. As he flexed a bicep to himself, he saw the tattoo griffins on his arms glow dimly in their eyes. Michel then knew they were the cause of this new pump. Michel quickly covered the eyes of the griffins with his hands and rushed to the bathroom to investigate the situation further.

Luckily, no one was inside, except his reflection in a full-length mirror. He sure liked what he was seeing overall. He uncovers the griffon tattoo, and its eyes were still glowing. He wasn't sure what to do at this point, hoping no one comes in anytime soon to see Oregan's tattoo. On the other hand, he couldn't help but give his arm a light flex, watching it swell before him quite nicely. "Hey, nice.~", he smirks. It's sure the biggest he has seen thus far, and it was getting bigger. "...Wait, what the-!?" To the eagle's surprise, he witnesses his own bicep throbbing up more and more, like blood was being pumped in to increase the mass of his muscles. The same effect spreads down to his tricep, and then up his forearm and shoulder. His arm was feeling heavier, but it looked and felt incredible.

He lowers and gives his flexed arm a rest, and then raises up his other arm to give it a hard flex. The enticing magical effect from the tattoo does the same, and he watches his muscles fill up right before him in the mirror, and until his arm matches up with his other. Next thing Michel does is raise his arms up and sets his hands on his head, making his chest, lats and back muscles feel a twinge as he flexes them out. He suddenly starts to feel his pecs, lats and upper back rise up beneath his beak. His neck was also being affected with that warm, growy feeling, and it was almost like his head was starting to be engulfed into his body. Soon as those muscles match his enlarged arms, he moves down to his abs.

He didn't really have to do much, simply tensing them up to make them bulge outwards. The felling then sinks in, making his chiseled abs swell up and lengthen a bit more over his midsection, even getting a fourth row of thick abs added in between there. He almost looked like a muscular cartoon character at this point. You know, big body, small legs. It gave him a light chuckle, but he wanted to even those out as well. He stands his legs up straight against each other and sets his hands against his thighs as he gives them a simple, leg-rippling flex. His quads plump out as each rugged muscle gets shredded to show themselves, as well as his throbbing calves. The griffon's eyes glow still, his legs start becoming like large, sinewy treetrunks. His calves even peaked inward some more as they start pushing against each other spread his legs some more.

Michel felt very proud of himself. He looked almost like a heavyweight bodybuilder now!
141112.title: Don't get another tattoo

choices: There’s nothing he can do about it.
1411122.content: Michel decided to see how much stronger he was now, heading back to the main room with the weights. He added another 50 pounds to each side, now being able to easily lift 350 pounds. Another 25 pounds were added on each side, and he finally found his limit for the time. He was lifting 400 pounds now with over 5 months left till he joined the military, already lifting double what he had been doing just hours ago. Almost comical considering he wasn’t even 6 feet tall yet. However...

14111222.content:
Michel had already went home, and quickly went and showered. He went to look in his mirror, and looked back at his reflection. His arms were nearly 30 inches around, and his legs were equally massive. His chest helped to form a nice y-shape with a nice 8-pack. “Let’s see how that hyena likes this.” He said with a smirk.


Michel reached the tattoo parlor fairly quickly, watching with a smirk as he watched the hyena gape at him. “What, you like it?” Michel asked. The hyena seemed to ignore him, only saying “What, changed your mind about another tattoo?” “Yeah, actually,” Michel told him, “Got anything to make me taller?” “Yes, in fact.” the hyena told him, grabbing the tattoo pen, “It’ll work similar to the other tattoos you have.” He started etching another tattoo, this one along his shoulder. After around a half hour, it was finished. “This one will activate in around 10 minutes or so, I’d take this time to get home, and apparently that isn’t hard for you now.

10 minutes passed, and Michel arrived at home seconds before it began. He ran to reach his mirror, and saw it begin. He was 5’10” before the growth, and he watched as he went from his clothes being tight-fitting, to ripping off halfway through the growth. He couldn’t fully fit in his mirror any more, and saw as his clothes were completely torn off him. He was 6’7” now, and he watched how he loomed over everything in his house. He hit his head on the doorframe as he walked out of his room, rubbing his head and smiling.
14111222.title: He could get another tattoo...

Miche goes home and decide to eat he as it’s around lunch during this time. As he setting up the table he suddenly feels increable pain and falls over little did he know that the ways of his tatoo were glowing.

suddenly he feels his body filling with energy as his chest suddenly puff up to look like they belong to a profession body boulder. He falls down as his arms expand rapidly looking like somesone shoves two base balls inside of them. He suddenly feels his stomach start to quench as he feel his stomach start to fore a very tight six pack that stuck out a little his legs then start to change they buff up to look like logs to hold up his mosterous frame.

He then hears cracking all over his body as his bones break grow to grow to 7 feet tall lucky this part was quick he then gets and runs to mirror and see his body and stars in shock he doesn’t now what to do.

15.content: Which mammal do you wish to follow?
15.title: Mammal

152.content:
It was a sunny day. The sunlight shines down a large patch of forest trees, their leaves fluttering in the breeze. Lying against one of the trees was a brown-furred bear, wearing a red lumberjack shirt, blue pants, and brown shoes. He was just lounging about, minding his own business. Until someone drops a small stack of logs right beside him, the thumping sounds making his body jump in response, "Hey! I was napping!"

A rather dark-brown-furred, studly deer in matching clothing (except with a brown shirt), was the perpetrator. "Come on Burton, it's time to get some work done."

The tired bear wasn't too buff himself. In fact he seems a little more on the heavyset side. He just turns and faces away from his supervisor, "Mm... Anthony, do I have to?"

"Yes! You want that college credit, you gotta push your own weight arond here." Anthony sighs. "You've only been here a day. Why would you even sign up for a extra credit course like this?"

Burt pouts, "I didn't! That's the thing."

The deer crosses his rather thick arms, "Well, if you had been paying more attention in class, you would have paid more attention at what you were actually signing up for beforehand."

The bear does his best to pick himself up, "Is it too late to sign up for something else?"

"No.", the deer replies. "But it's required that at least one student signs up for every course. And you're the only one here, so you're outta luck." Anthony picks up two axes, holding one for his student, "Now come on." Burt let out a loud sigh as he dusted off the dirt from his pants and the back of his shirt before reluctantly grabbing the axe.

"man this isn't fair..." The deer gave a small snort as he set the axe he was holding over his shoulder and began walking towards a large copse of unchopped trees with Burt following behind.

"Life isn't fair. Better get used to it" Burt almost let out a deep grumble of complaints under his breath, but his bit his lip and simply held it in. It was no used trying to fight something out of his hands. Unless another student picked that course there was no way he could leave. He was stuck and no matter how much it sucked, this is what he was stuck in until he got his college credit.

More than an hour later Burt was barely able to remain upright. His upper body was practically drenched in sweat as he took one last swing as the tree he was working on fell with a thunderous clatter and he let out a deep sigh of relief. Six trees cut, down not bad at all. As he set the axe down he heard a laugh behind him and he slowly turned around.

"Six trees only? If you want that college credit you need to work much harder. I won't even consider this day finished until you chop down at least another four or more." Burt almost snarled at the smug looking deer behind him as he tried to stretch, but winced at the aching sting of his overstretched muscles. Another four? what was he? superman? He couldn't even lift that axe again, let alone chop down another four trees.

"F-Four? are you crazy?" As Burt lifted his head up to look Anthony in the eyes, who only had an almost taunting smile on his face as he shook it head.

"No I'm trying to whip your lazy butt into shape and really make you sweat for that colege credit. And if you start complaining I'm going to make you cut another five on top of the four you still have to do." Burt sucked in a breath to let loose a very hateful retort at him, but he squelched it down and swallowed his anger.

"Can.. I at least.. take a break? I am about to collapse from exhaustion." Anthony let out an exhasperated sigh before he reluctantly nodded his head.

"Fine, take your break, but you only get a forty minute break. For every minute you are late getting back to work I am going to tack on another tree for you to cut down, so I suggest you spend your break wisely and get back here as soon as you can." Burt had to dig his claws into the palm of his paw not to snarl at Anthony before he gave a small nod.

Burt walked in aches all over his chest and arms. He never exercised that intense before. He walked to the edge of a river too tired to admire the rushing water. Burt was tired of feeling weak all the time, tired of being heavy, and tired of people like Anthony picking on him. Burt wanted it all to stop but felt powerless to change anything about his life.

Burt turned to his left and noticed a small cave peeping out on the side of a hill. He found the cave intriguing. Somehow, Burt felt like he could relate to the darkness inside the cave by being alone and isolating himself from the world around him. Out of curiosity, Burt walked into the cave to see what he could find. Besides, he had another half-hour in his break.

Burt could feel the dampness and humidity in the air of the cave. He even heard the occasional dripping of water from a random stalagtite. The darkness cleared with sunlight coming from a random hole above him. In the light, Burt noticed capped yellow mushroom with red spots. There were dozens of them scattered over the cave ground and walls. Burt never saw mushrooms like these before. He picked one up from the ground to observe it. His stomach then rumbled. Burt was starving after the intense workout. Burt knew eating random things in nature wasn't a good idea but after the day that he had he didn't care. The bear popped the mushroom in his mouth, chewed, and swallowed. The rumbling in the bear stomach ceased but Burt began to feel a little strange. He didn't know why.
152.title: Burt the bear

choices: Burt eats a little more of mushroos
Burt eats a lot more of mushrooms
1522.content:
Burt felt like he was getting a stomach ache. Definitely a bad idea to eat random things in caves. Suddenly, the ache turned into warmth in his stomach and it somehow started to spread all over his furry body. Burt was feeling warm in his chest, arms, and legs. He didn't know what was going on. He needed to see a nurse to be sure that mushroom wasn't poison.

Burt ran out of the cave to rush himself to the nurse's office at school campus. He then passed the trees that he was supposed to chop. Burt's heart dropped like a stone. Burt knew Anthony would let him have it if he just left without finishing. He could fail the course! Burt saw the axe nearby. He felt like his stomach settled and should be fine for a bit. His plan was to cut the trees quickly, head to the nurse, and come back before Anthony ever noticed he was gone. Burt grabbed the axe and starting cutting a tree as rapidly as he could.

Burt sunk the axe deep inside the trunk of the tree. He thought it was bit strange that he enough strength to do it but he assumed that he recovered from his break. He continued his fast pace to make it to the nurse. Within a few seconds, the tree came crashing down and Burt moved on to his second tree. The same results happened: a few chops and the tree came down. Burt then finished his third and fourth tree shortly. Overall the job took only a few minutes. Burt thought to himself, "I guess it wasn't as bad as I thought it was going to be." He then dropped the axe and continued his rush to the nurse.

Burt sat himself on a doctor's bed, holding his stomach while fearing the worse. A yellow lab soon enters inside. "Hey, aren't you that one guy that actually signed up for Anthony's course?"

The bear frowns, "What if I am?"

The yellow canine starts laughing hysterically. "You really signed up for that?! I'd have felt less bad if you selected randomly, but nope! You actually signed up for it." He starts speaking in a baby voice, "Aww, what's the matter? You get splinter?"

Burt looked unphased, "...Are you really the school nurse?"

"No. I am." To Burt's surprse, the school nurse was a well-muscled bengal tiger, who is just about Anthony's height. "And I'd appreciate it if my intern didn't make the hurt feel worse. You'll have to forgive Mike. He hasn't been doing very well today."

The lab bows his head, "Sorry Joel."

"Anthony's a good friend of mine.", the tiger continues. "Hopefully he didn't work you too hard."

"No, he did.", Burt replies. "But that's not why I'm here."

Joel crosses his over his broad chest, "Oh? Then why are you here?"

It took a moment for Burt to answer. "I...I think I ate something I wasn't supposed to."

"Really?" The large feline bends down, "So how does your stomach feel?"

Burt held on to his stomach, rubbing it once or twice. "It feels...", Burt's eyes lit up, "...tight."

"Stomach cramps?", Mike proposed.

"Well, no. Just...tight.", Burt adds.

"...Oookay. So, no stomach ache?", Joel asks.

"Not anymore. ...I guess."

The happy tiger pats Burt on the back, "Good! Glad we could help."

Burt frowns again, mumbling to himself, "Yeah. Even though you didn't really do anything."

Joel laughed as he patted Burt's shoulder. "Better you come in and we not have to do anything than to perform surgery or pump your stomach. wouldn't you agree?" Burt shivered at the idea of them cutting his stomach open and he nodded his head.

"Y-Yea." Joel gave Burt a lookover once more before nodding his head.

"You seem okay now besides the tightness in your stomach, so I say try to drink some fluids and rest as soon as you get home, but for now you're free to head bed. I know Anthony isn't one to take tardiness, god knows the number of students I've had to bail out because he pushed them so hard that they hurt themselves trying to meet his expectation. Burt gave a very audible swallow at the thought.

Joel gave a reassuring smile before he patted Burt's back. "Relax, i'm being dramatic, only one kid who to be bailed out that way and it was only because he swung at the tree with the axe head facing the wrong way, he sprained both his wrists because he jarred them so badly. After that most kids avoided his course like the plague, but it's fine". Burt nodded a little more relaxed now as he stood up.

"Thanks. I hope i dont have to come see you again for anything serious" Then Burt began making his way back towards the woodcutting site. Despite what the nurse had said, Burt still really disliked Anthony. He was very abbrasive and outright mean. As he got closer to where he was supposed to be working he saw the familiar form of Anthony standing there. Even from here he could see that he was more than a bit irritated and when he spotted Burt coming in He could almost hear Anthony taping his foot in anger.

When Burt finally came within eartshot boy did he want to go back to the nurse's office. "Where the heck have you been? I didn't tell you that you could leave the area." Burt flinched as his ears almost flattened against his head.

"I'm sorry. I wasn't feeling good.. I just went to see the school nurse."

"What are you five? can't you handle feeling a little sick until you finish your work?"

"B-But I did finish my work! I cut down four more trees just like you said."

"That is crap! as slow as you were going before no way you managed to chop them down in such a short time."

"I did!" Burt pointed to the trees nearest to Anthony. I cut those for right there before I left!"

"I still don't believe it!" Anthony handed an axe to Burt. "Cut that tree over there and let me see what you did!" Burt didn't want to start an argument or make things worse so he went to another tree to chop. Burt felt like he had energy again. In fact, he felt like he had a lot of energy. Burt felt really good. Without wasting more time, the bear started chopping. Just like last time, his axe ate through the trunk of the tree. Within a several strokes, the tree came tumbling down.

"See?" said Burt to Anthony. "I cut those trees like I did with this one!"

"That's..." Anthony didn't know what he saw. It shouldn't have taken Burt that short amount of time to chop a tree compared to his earlier performance. It was impossible. Anthony immediately suspected of cheating but he knew he'd get in trouble without any proof. "That's fine," said Anthony. "We're done. Get out of here!" Burt didn't know what he did but he was glad he got Anthony to cut him loose. He ran out of the deer's sight before he could change his mind.

Burt went to the bathroom to look at a mirror. He reflected the whole day back to himself. He gave a big sigh. "What a day," he said to himself. Burt still felt the tightness in his stomach. "What is going on with my stomach?" He lifted his shirt halfway and noticed there was less fat around his waist. Burt's eyes widened. He knew he was heavier earlier today. Was it the workout Anthony forced him on? Couldn't be. No one can lose that much weight so fast. Burt then remembered the mushroom he found. He remembered he felt the tightness shortly after he ate it. Could it have been the mushroom? How? Burt knew he needed to get to the bottom of it.
1522.title: Grows a little

15221.content:
The next day, first thing Burt had in mind were the mushrooms he ate. Though, it ain't like Anthony wasn't gonna work him hard throughout the day again. He started out with a little breakfast, and got straight to tree chopping with his teach. It was excruciating. It's like Anthony is giving him overtime because of yesterday. Looks like he wanted to make sure of something too. One thing Burt did notice was that all though the work was hard, in fact harder than yesterday, he didn't feel as tuckered out as he normally would. Still, it was hard to get up on his feet, as he lies sitting against a cut tree. "Ugggh...", he groans.

All though that deer was tough, he's started getting a little impressed. He walks up to Burt with his bulging arms crossed over his chest, "Hey, I like how you did. Twice as much as yesterday too. It's still not much, but I'm sure half the forest'll be gone once I'm done with you."

"What!?" Burt looks around once. He must have spotted over a hundred trees from where he sat. "Are you kidding me?"

"Yep. If you don't want an A, that is.", he adds, looking down on the tired bear.

Burt groans. "What'll get me a D?"

"Oh, I don't give out in-betweens.", Anthony replies quickly.

"WHAT?!", Burt screamed.

"Hey, you should be happy. I'm actually starting to whip that body of yours into shape." The deer kneels down beside his student, and then pulls up one sleeve of his sweater. "Wow. I didn't know your arms were that big."

It wasn't much, but Burt was definitely getting some definition in his arms. This came as a surprise to the bear too, since his arms were flabbier just yesterday. "Uhhh...neither, did I?"

The studly deer stands himself back up, "You're on your way.", he winks.

"... Whoa. Is he...actually proud of me?", Burt thought.

The deer ushers with his bulging arm, "Come on. Let's go grab a bite to eat."

Which reminds Burt, "Oh. Uh, I gotta go do something first."

"Ok sure. But hurry back!"

Burt turned from Anthony and made his way to the river cave with the mushrooms. Burt retraced his steps to the entrance of the dark cave. He took a deep breath and said, "I must be out of my mind." The husky bear went into the darkness once again. He walked through blackness until he reached a ray of sunlight beaming from the ceiling. The sunlight shined on the mushrooms Burt tried the other day.

Burt squatted to the ground and picked a few mushrooms. He looked at them in his paw and sighed. "I hope I don't regret this," he said. Burt opened his mouth and swallowed the mushrooms. At first he didn't feel anything. Then he felt a familiar stomach ache like the one from the other day. The pain was like a stubborn cramp. Burt covered his stomach with both his arms. He suddenly felt a strange warmth coming from his stomach. Burt could discribe it but it was like the pain when from unbearable to soothing. As his paws were still on his stomach, Burt felt something very strange: his stomach was shrinking. The fat around Burt's waist was melting until Burt's arms ran all around the waist.

Just as mysteriously as it appeared, the pain was gone. Burt had no idea what happened. He felt completely fine now. Burt stood up completely puzzled. He then realized his sweater was feeling a bit loose. Burt could have sworn it fit him perfectly just this morning. He lifted the tail of his sweater and shirt. Burt was baffled. There was no fat on his waist anywhere. Lean and slightly defined muscle took its place. Burt placed his paw on his stomach to be sure if it truly was his own body. His jaw dropped. He covered with his shirt and sweater again. "These...these mushrooms," Burt started, "They...they somehow made me stronger, made me build more muscle!" Burt then rolled up his sleeve to show a bit more defined arm than the one Anthony showed him. The bear curled his arm to bulge a slight bicep. It wasn't much but it was enough to make Burt smile.
15221.title: Burt eats a little more of mushrooms

choices: Grows to the size of a fitness model
Grows to the size of a bodybuilder
152211.content:
Man.. what way to start the day. As Burt stepped outside the cave he took a minute to lok back. From this far away he couldn't see the mushrooms growing, but they were still on his mind. "oh wow... if they can melt fat like this off anyone. I wonder what would happen if I ate more?" Before burt could ponder that a bit further he looked at his watch and almost gasped. He was going to get chewed out by Anthony again if he showed up late to lunch. That was something he wasn't eager to do. and just when he was starting ot get some respect from him too.

In a quick burst, Burt began sprinting back towards the area he'd been before. No doubt Anthony would be waiting still.. at least Burt hoped he was. He didn't fee llike getting yelled at again. Burt didn't now why that guy was so full of himself. It really ticked him off, but what could he do? This guy was his boss until he was given the college credit for the course. As he came close to the woodworking site. He was relieved to see that Anthony was still hanging around.

As Burt came in close, Anthony waved his hand and gestured for himt o come close. "Your eady to go? What took so long? I almost thought you'd gotten lost." Burt frowned a bit. Man even when he seemed ot be joking he was a bit of a jerk.

"Come on Im not that bad. It's not like I haven't been outside before." Anthony had a big smirk on his face and he shook his head.

"Could have foled me. With that pudge on your gut, It doesn't look like you ever really set foot outsaide except for school." Burt almost felt like punching Anthony.

However, Burt restrained himself and followed Anthony to the food. Burt and Anthony made their way to the cafeteria, got their own trays of sandwiches and sat at the same table. Anthony was chugging his food down while Burt barely touched his. Burt was still contemplating on what happened to him back at the cave. He grew more scared sitting next to Anthony worried that he might find out his secret.

"You okay, Burt?" asked Anthony.

"Oh, um, yeah," stuttered Burt. "I'm fine."

"Then you better start eating. When we're done here it's back to work." Burt gave out a puff of air. Anthony added, "And if you give me an attitude I'll add more work for you. Got it?"

"Yeah."

Burt tried taking his time eating but he could only stall for so long. Anthony gave him a time limit to finish his lunch or work hungry. So Burt finished and headed back to the woods with Anthony. Anthony gave Burt an axe and said, "You know what to do." Burt followed Anthony's orders.

Burt gripped the axe tightly. It felt lighter to him since he last ate the mushrooms. Burt felt like he had more energy than before. He just hoped that it was enough to get Anthony off his back. Burt took a swing at a random tree trunk and he was amazed to see the axe sunk halfway through the tree! He pulled it out with ease and struck again. The tree came crashing down. Anthony was amazed to see Burt cut a tree so quickly but he assumed that it was the result of pushing Burt. Burt continued chopping the wood at the same steady yet quick pace. At the end of the day, Burt cut seven trees. Anthony was very pleased.

"Very good work today!" said Anthony grabbing Burt's shoulder. "See what happens when you stick with me?"

"Umm...yeah..." said Burt. "I guess."

"Don't be modest! You did a good job today! I'm impressed!"

Burt couldn't believe what he was hearing. Was Anthony actually proud of him? "Really?" asked Burt.

"Yeah! I know I push you hard but look where it's getting you! We'll make this cabin in no time!"

Burt turned his ears. "What?!"

Anthony chuckled. "You didn't think I was making you cut this wood for nothing, did you? We're going to build a cabin with the wood at the end of the course. We almost have enough thanks to your hard work!"

"Oh, um, thanks." Burt didn't know what to say. A cabin? How in the world was he going to build a cabin? Burt was too scared to think about it. He just wanted to be done. "So...am I done?"

"Sure, you can go!"

As Burt walked away from Anthony, he couldn't help but be amazed on what he did and what Anthony said (apart from the cabin). He was getting strength and praise from eating a few mushrooms. Burt wondered what would happen if he ate more.

Later when it was night time, Burt walked into the mushroom cave carrying a flashlight. He reached the mushroom stash which were revealed in the moonlight. Burt place the flashlight on the ground and took off his shirt revealing a tank top that he kept at the back of his closet. Burt reached down and grabbed another handful of mushrooms. He smiled and said, "Let's see how big I can really get!"
152211.title: Go back to Anthony

1522112.content:
Burt gobbled down the handful of mushrooms he had in his paw. Shortly after he swallowed, Burt felt a familiar tightness and burning in his chest. This time, it felt more intese than the last time.
