Burt knelt on his hands and knees over the pain. He growled slightly as his chest began to fill his tank top. The fat on his waist was quickly melting away. His pecs began to thicken as a six pack began to emerge right below them. His arms swelled to a new size and grew more defined and vascular. Veins began to slither across his arms to deliver blood and power to his new strength. Burt's legs grew to the size huge pythons. The tendons in his legs thickened and coiled as his thighs were shaped into perfect tear drop form. His calves plumped to a new peak. Burt could feel power running through him. He could also feel his bones shifting as if he was getting taller. Burt stood up and let out a grizzly roar at the climax of his growth. After what felt like forever, Burt's transformation was done.

Burt took a deep breath of relief and another one in awe as he saw his body. He looked down to his chest and saw clear pec and abs definition underneath his tank top. He looked down further to see his legs grew longer and stronger. They reminded him on the trees Anthony forced him to cut down but Burt's legs were indestructable. Burt then saw how big his arms got and smiled. He raised his right and flexed hard on his bicep. His bicep grew to the size of a melon. Burt's smile grew wider seeing the power he now held inside his body.

"This is so awesome!" Burt said. "I feel incredible! It looks like I'm about the same size as Anthony! Wait till he sees me like this!" Burt turned back to the mushrooms. A thought struck his brain: why should Anthony see him as the same size when Burt can grow even bigger with the mushrooms. Burt smiled. There was no question. He had to be bigger than Anthony. Burt figured it was time to see how Anthony felt like being the small one. Burt grabbed not one but two handfulls of mushrooms! He licked his lips and said, "Let's see Anthony pick on me now!" He then jammed both handfulls ravenously into his maw and swallowed them whole.

At first nothing happened. Burt waited for one minute.. then two.. then ten. Maybe the mushrooms could only do so much. Burt sighed softly in a bit a bit of disappointment. He had been loking forward to really sticking it to Anthony and showing him that he wasn't a bear to be messed with, but he supposed this size was good enough to prove his point. Even without growing any bigger, he was still a very big bear now. Burt grinned as he brought up his left arm and flexed, giving the bicep asqueeze before he decided to go on and leave. As he was walking away from the mushrooms he was struck with a sharp pain in his stomach that caused him to stumble and fall to his knees with a loud cry. It was like someone decided to grab his intenstines and twist them all into balloon animals. His hands pressed hard against the ground, his teeth clenched tightly as he tried to calm down, but each breath brought on a fresh wave of pain.

"Oh god, did I eat too many? Are they going to kill me?" Burt had to hold in a scream as the pain spread down to his fingers and toes. It was immense and he wasn't sure how long he could take it before he passed out. The pain had begun flaring up into an intense heat. It burned his body like he'd decided to press himself against a heated furnace. It burned intensely and a gutteral cry of pain ripped itself from his vocal cords before he felt his bones and joints popping and heard them cracking loudly. As he clenched his eyes, he was aware on a very basic level that his clothes had begun feeleing tighter. Through his blinding paina nd agony his body had actually begun growing. It started in his legs which began swelling up to peaks of unbelievable heights of raw power. The muscles rippling and throbbing, every eartbeat that passed his legs were swelling up like balloons. Unlike balloons though, these legs could kill if he kicked someone hard enough. The raw power and the vascularity would make other men stare in envy.

When the growing began slowing in his legs, it began picking pu in other areas. His abdomen throbbed and coiled, the muscles moving almost like there was something squirming around under his skin and fur and a whole new row of abs formed, giving his a solid monstrous looking Eight pack of abs. Thick snake like veins snakes their way down the abs. You cvou;ld see every heartbeat as the vein vibrated with every pump of his blood from his heart. His pecs almost doubled in size as they were flooded witht he intense energy that was making his bodsy grow. Puffing out, this muscular veins spider webbing across them as they grew into almost pillow sized Pectorals... well if there were such a thing as spider web pillows. His arms were the last to grow, but the change was explosive. The biceps pulsed and flexed of their own accord. Each flex they actually began getting bigger. Swelling up, gaining inch after inch of pure muscular thickness. Ther was not an ounce of fat to be seen on those muscular arms.

Once the growing had begun slowing the pain began dying down. Burt remained on his hands and knees, panting hard when a loud wild roar erupted from his lungs. He sounded and felt like a wild animal. It took several minutes before Burt wqas able to finally stand up again. He was sweating profusely even as he tok his first step towards the outside of the cave. Witht hat first step came another... and then another. One by one until his paws touched the cool grass and rocks just outside. He breathed heavily for several minutes afterward. Sucking in as much air as he could each time. It was like his body was trying to adjust to taking in enough oxygen for such a massive body now. As he looked down he realized he wasn't wear his tanktop anymore. A look back intot he cave where he'd been collapsed revealed the sweat covered shirt, completely torn apart by his growing muscles without his knowing. As he slowly took int he sight. He found himself having issues moving because the pants now hugged his legs so firmly. It was like having a second skin over his fur.

Burt took in one more deep breath of air as he Brought up his left arm and flexed. As that massive mountain reached it's peak, the familiar snakes that were his veins popped out of the fur. It was an incredible feeling as he used his right hand to squeeze and rub this new monstrous bicep of his. He didn't know that the mushrooms could have such immensely potent results. He'd even managed to get even taller than before. Al int he name of his muscles needing to fill out into a body that worked best. A great big toothy grin spread over Burt's face. "This is amazing! There is no way Anthony would ever mess with me again."
1522112.title: Grows to the size of a bodybuilder

15221122.content:
Burt was filled with happiness and power. He flexed his arms in several different poses and pleased with each result of big thick muscle. Burt couldn't stop but feel his arms and his chest with his gigantic paw. Not only did he look strong, he felt strong. Burt let out another roar of happiness out of his lungs. "This is so incredible!" said Burt in a new deeper voice. "All this from mushrooms! Who would've thought!" Burt's muscles burned with energy. The giant grizzly thought he could wrestle a giant animal...or a particularly large deer. Burt thew a fist into his hand and said, "I can't wait to see Anthony's face when he sees me! He'll never tell me to pick up another axe again!" Burt really wanted to find Anthony and teach him a lesson but Burt had no idea where he could be at night. He then shrugged. There was plenty of time to find Anthony. Right now, Burt thought it was time to have fun with his muscles. Pictures ran through Burt's head: working out at the gym with slightly smaller jocks, flirting with the girls, performing impossible feats of strength, the possibilities were endless for Burt. He didn't know where to start. Then it hit him. Burt remembered that there was going to be a party at the lake near the school. Normally Burt wouldn't go to a party because no one would either talk or look at him. He figured that was going to change with his new size and shape.

Burt thought it would be fun to take a swim in the lake, flex for some girls, and maybe even challenge some of the bigger guys. Burt's smile grew along with his excitement. As he took his first step to the lake, he had another thought: what if he encounters another guy that maybe bigger than him? Burt couldn't let that happen. He had to be the biggest, so he ran back to the cave and packed a few mushrooms in his pocket. "Just in case," said Burt. Burt then rushed his new muscled body to the party.

Burt ran to the top of a hill that overlooked the lake. As he looked down, he was almost overwhelmed. He heard loud music all the way from where he was standing, saw several people talking and playing, and smelled food cooking on grills. Burt took a deep breath. The old him would have turned around and went back home. Not tonight. This was the night of the new and improved Burt. He flexed a bicep in confidence and walked down the hill to the party. The music grew louder as he got closer and people looked out to see something big and hulky was coming towards them. They were all amazed to see a giant shirtless bodybuilding sized bear approach the party. No one had any idea who Burt was. Burt assumed no one would recognize him since they did not acknowledge him to begin with. He just smiled waved at some of the party goers.

Burt looked around to see everyone was having a fun time. Some were swimming in the lake and talking to each other on land. He was ready to be part of the fun. Burt looked around and saw a group of three girls sitting next to their own grill. They were a tigress, a lioness, and wolf. Burt smiled thinking, "Surely they would want some meat from these bones!" Burt cracked his knuckles and made his way to their position. The girls were lost in their own conversation until a shadow blocked the light from their grill. They all went from fear to awe as they saw a giant muscular bear approach them. The girls looked up and down Burt's body and loved the results: thick strong arms, rippling chest, and powerful legs. "Mind if I join you?" asked Burt with new found confidence.

"Of course!" said the tigress. "Please have a seat!" Burt did as he was told and sat on the ground next to the tigress and wolf.

"I see you workout some," said the wolf.

"Eh, it's was mostly a growth spurt," said Burt. He then raised his arm and flexed a big bicep for the girls. They were truly amazed by this powerhouse bear. They could Burt's bicep rupture right out of his fur with veins snaking across his whole bicep. Burt smiled and continued, "A really big growth spurt!" Burt let out a loud laugh and the girls followed. Burt still held out his arm and said, "Anyone want to feel?"

"I do!" said the lioness. The lioness got to Burt's side and placed her hand on his gigantic arm. Her hand covered merely a small part of his bicep but it felt interesting to her. It felt soft and cool with his fur but his muscles felt warm and hard. She stroked feeling every vein and crevice that made it so vascular. Burt thought the lioness's hand very soft against his arm. He never thought a girl would show affection like this towards him. The lioness even tried squeezing the bicep to find that it was hard as steel. She couldn't find any hint of fat anywhere on his arm or anywhere else on Burt's body.

"Your arms are incredible! You must go to the gym a lot to get arms like these." A soft red tint spread over Burt's cheeks as he smiled and shook his head. Even if he told the truth, no one would ever believe him about the mushrooms. So he decided to let them believe what they wanted to.

"Well it was a painful process I'll tell you that, but the results were worth it." Burt gave the lioness a grin as he flexed his bicep even harder than it was one. Thick vascular veins exploding like netting all over his muscles. "Wouldn't you agree." It took a few moments for the lioness to collect herself. She was almost in a daze as her paws slid up and down the bicep. Burt had to admit he really loved the feel of this girl's hands on his biceps. Feeling it as if were some amazing treasure rather than the result of some rather potent mushrooms.

"It's so amazing..." The next hour or so passed by in a blur for Burt. It seemed there was always someone who wanted to come feel his muscles or admire them. Whether it was girls or guys. Some just wanted to feel those muscles, others wanted to stare in awe at their power. At least a couple times Burt found himself chatting with a couple other males who were rather muscular themselves. It was such a blast receiving so much praise for them. Burt could really get used to all the attention. However before long he began to get a bit tired. Such a drastic transformation had given him some energy, but most of it had been used up with the growth and he excused himself to head back to his dorm room, much to the disappointment of more than a few ladies.

As Burt was heading back a Familiar shape heading towards the party. Strong muscular body, that face.. oh great it's Anthony. Burt bit his lip nervously. So far he'd been pok because no one he knew had been at the party, but if Anthony recognized him, he was really going to have a hard time explaining what happened to him.
15221122.title: Show off

152211222.content:
As much as Burt would love to show off to Anthony, the giant bear knew it would be hard to explain. Burt turned the other way and took a detour home. Burt squeezed into his dorm feeling absolutely incredible. He had a new body, some new friends, and a new life. He couldn't wait to see what tomorrow held. Since tomorrow was Saturday, Burt had all weekend to hang out and show off. He was looking forward to it. However, Burt's sleepiness overpowered his enthusiasm. It was time to call it a night. Burt stretched out his arms plumping out his biceps and triceps to mountainous peaks. His chest also puffed up from a big yawn. Burt took off his shoes and pants (leaving his boxers on) and went to bed to sleep soundly.

Sunlight from his dorm window hit Burt's eyes and shined on his fur making his muscles look even more defined and chiseled during the day. Burt woke up feel even more energetic and powerful than last night. All he needed was good night's rest after the intense transformation he took on. Burt got up from bed and looked through his closet for a pair of pants. Most of them wouldn't fit his new thick legs now but he managed to find a pair of elastic gym shorts. It wasn't much but it would have to do. Burt put them on and thought they looked really good on him. The elastic band of his shorts was able to wrap around his waist perfectly. The legs of the shorts filled his ripped thighs completely. Burt could still see tendons and crevices bulging through the clothing. As for a shirt, Burt didn't feel like he needed one. He thought everyone needed to see his great body with no shirt to cover them. He then got on his shoes, grabbed the mushrooms he packed from last night, and walked out on the hunt for some fun.

Burt walked outside feeling pumped. His muscles were begging for let out some energy and Burt was ready to see what he could really do. He thought what better place to test his strength than the gym. With his new size and strength, Burt knew he could lift a heavy amount of weight. If he couldn't, he always had the spare mushrooms that he brought. Without question, Burt headed off to the gym.

Burt walked in smelling the masculine scent in the air: sweat and hard work. The big grizzly cracked his knuckles ready to take on some weights. He confidently strolled into the weight room ready to use and show off his muscles. Burt looked through the equipment and tried to figure out which one to try first. He then turned to see a rack of various sized dumbbells. The weights went from ten pounds on one end to a thousand pounds. Burt knew he could handle a good amount of weight but he didn't know how much.

His eyes looked at the three hundred pound dumbbells. He figured that would be a good place to start. Burt reached for them and pulled them up to his chest. He was surprised how light they felt. For three hundred pounds, the dumbbells felt nothing to Burt. He smiled feeling satisfied that he could easily lift three hundred pounds. The dumbbells were put back because Burt didn't think they'd give him a decent workout. He wanted something more challenging. Burt then looked at the five hundred pounds. As he lifted them up, Burt thought they were just right. They were heavy but enough do a good number of reps with.

Burt loved his workout. He smiled seeing both his veiny biceps swelling and relaxing between each rep. After Burt's fifteenth rep, a burly and muscular tiger entered the room. Burt recognized him as Joel, the nurse. Joel turned and was surprised to see a hulking bear sitting on bench lifting weights. Joel was impressed. He also went to the dumbbells and picked up the seven hundred pound weights and sat next to Burt. Burt was a bit nervous. He was scared Joel might recognize him. Burt didn't know what to say or do.

"Haven't seen you before," said Joel. "You new here?" Seemed like Joel didn't recognize Burt after all. That was good. Burt decided to play along.

"Um...yeah," replied Burt. "I've heard good things about this gym so I thought I'd take a look."

"That's cool," said Joel. "I know it did some good things for me!" Joel put down a weight and raised his right arm to Burt. As Joel flexed, his bicep grew into an even bigger mountain than Burt's. Veins coiled around the tiger arm pumping blood and adrenaline to give Joel more power. The size of the bicep was phenomenal. It was much bigger than Burt's bicep. Then again, after close examination, Burt saw Joel was bigger than him. A seed of jealousy was planted into Burt.

"You look like a big strong tiger!" said Burt trying to be polite.

"Well you look like a big strong bear!" replied Joel. He then handed out his paw out to Burt. "I'm Joel."

Burt froze for a second. He couldn't give Joel his real name. He had to think quick. Burt reached Joel's paw and said, "I'm Grant."

Burt continued to workout with Joel. They both enjoyed each other's company. However, it irritated Burt how Joel overpowered him in every way. Joel lifted more and he stood at least a foot taller than the muscled bear. However, Burt did what he could to hide it. After about an hour, Joel said goodbye to Burt and left the gym. Burt huffed a breath. He thought he was the big guy in town only to be proven wrong. Burt then remembered the mushrooms he brought with him and smiled.

Burt rushed to the shower room. He looked around and saw no one was there. For safety, Burt squeezed into the shower stalls and closed the curtain. He then pulled out the mushroom he plucked last night and smiled. "I'm going to be the big guy here!"
152211222.title: Avoid Anthony

1522112221.content:
Burt chewed on the few mushrooms he carried with him. Despite the results, he hoped that this change won't be as intense as the last one. In retrospect, Burt remembered he ate a lot of mushrooms then. He figured that the amount of mushrooms you eat reflects on how much you grow. Since he only ate a few, Burt thought he wouldn't grow that much but enough to beat Joel's size and strength.

Burt waited a few minutes and still didn't feel anything. He knew it would happen; he just needed to be patient. He didn't dare move out of the shower stall. He was afraid that someone might walk in during his growth. Burt couldn't risk his secret being exposed. He didn't want to think about what would happen. Before Burt could think any further, he felt his stomach growing upset. He smiled thinking, "Yes!" The change began slow and gradual. As he took in each deep breath the stomach cramps began lessening in pain. Becoming a strong heat that slowly spread from his abs all down from the tips of his fingers and toes to the strands of his hair. As the heat increased over time Burt had to lean against the wall. Each growth spurt took a lot of energy as his body worked to feed it into his muscles and bones to make them bigger, stronger, tougher. As he took in a deep breath, he let out a sharp groan of a pained cramp and a tad amount of pleasure. He was starting to enjoy these growth spurts. Feeling his muscle grow to new peaks of power. At that moment that began happening. His legs, which had already been massive to begin with were now growing even thicker, slowly stretching as he grew taller with it. Sharp cracks as his bones moved, slowly growing thicker and further apart to take in the new height and muscle density.

Even while his legs were still growing, the effects had begun spreading up his body. His abs began flexing on their own, thick veins popping up and moving like the twisted winding roads in a countryside all of the rock hard ridges of his eight pack as they grew even larger. Each row looked as chiseled as stone. Burt was almost tempted to see what he could do with his abs with them flexed like this. He'd love to see how hard a hit he could take with this almost steel like wall of muscle. His pecs began growing as well, although this only grew a little it still was fairly significant. They began puffing out further than before. They didn't look like a woman's breasts though. There was not an ounce of fat in each once as they looked more oval shaped than the roundness of a woman's chest. And these were solid muscle. As he took in great breaths those pecs filled out even more, bulging pythons that were his veins snaked across each one before spreading across his shoulders and down his biceps. As his heart pumped his growing body harder and harder, his biceps begin swelling up. They were big before, but.. dear god.

Even as Burt managed to stand up, his biceps continued growing, pushing one inch.. then two.. then four.. than a solid seven inches higher than their previous height. He was a true monster of a bear now. There was no one on campus who could compare to these massive guns. Even as his body began slowing down, Burt let out a growl of pure happiness. Bringing up his newly pumped up arms to his chest and flexing them hard, his body practically exploded with the raw definition. He looked like a true god of muscle. He bet he could easily pump those weights he'd been lifting earlier and then some.

Burt squeezed his godly frame out of the shower stall still a bit wobbly from his growth. He noticed a full sized mirror between the showers and the lockers and rushed up to it. Burt's mouth dropped but quickly brought back up with a grin almost as big as his new muscles. Burt could see clean cut defined power on every inch on his body. His legs looked stronger and tougher than an iron pillar. Because of his leg's new size, Burt's gym shorts looked almost like a speedo. More muscle to show off, Burt thought. Burt's chest, however, looked more defined and bigger than ever before. His washboard abs looked like an indestructible wall with thick veins stretching from his waist up to his pecs which were like thick boulders shoved into his chest. Burt rubbed his pecs and abs feeling the warm new strength they now contained. His thick fingers followed the bulge and crevice of his chest. Burt pounded his chest with a fist feeling satisfied with his new powerful rock pile of a chest. He then raised his right arm in front of the mirror. Burt pushed his arm as hard as he could and smiled with glee as his bicep grew to a new incredible size. If Burt did his measurement correctly, his bicep now stood at a peak of thirty two inches. He saw how the tendons in his arms coiled into a powerful force with thick veins snaking across from his shoulder to his wrist. Finally, Burt noticed he grew taller from his growth, possibly a foot. Before he was shorter than Joel by a few inches. Now, Burt overpowered Joel in size and strength. The tiger was no longer the big guy on campus. Burt laughed to himself in complete satisfaction. "This is amazing!" said Burt in a new deeper voice. "No way Joel can match me now! No way ANYONE can match me now!" He raised both arms, flexed hard, and said, "I'm the biggest and strongest guy in school!"

"Whoa!" The huge bear turned around to see a lean looking wolf standing next to him. The wolf had some solid muscle on him but he was nothing compared to Burt. It was like comparing a mountain to a hill. Burt felt embarrassed thinking he just heard what he said. He tried to shrug it off with a laugh.

"Sorry," said Burt "I guess I got a little carried away."

"I can see why!" exclaimed the wolf. "You're huge! How in the world did you get so big?"

Burt didn't like lying but he couldn't tell the truth either. So he tried hinting the truth by saying, "Well, like everyone else, I do my workouts but I also have a growth spurt or two."

"Growth spurts?" repeated the wolf.

Burt nodded. "Yeah, really big growth spurts!"

Burt raised his arms again to flex his biceps once again. The wolf was amazed. He didn't think arms could get that big. Burt then performed other poses that emphasized his chest and legs, which got the same reaction from the wolf. The wolf grew envious of Burt's body as each pose passed. He wondered what he had to do to get a body like that. Burt could tell just by looking at the wolf he was growing envious but that didn't stop him. Burt kept posing until he felt like he put on a good show.

"As you can see," said Burt. "They helped!"

"Yeah," agreed the wolf. "Umm...mind if I feel your bicep?"

Burt nodded and knelt his giant form in front of the wolf. Burt then took his arm and flexed his bicep in front of his audience. The wolf placed his paw on the thick ball of power and it was unlike anything he felt. He felt warm energy emitting deep inside it. With the veins, the wolf could also see and feel Burt's heart pounding to feed his muscles to stay strong and tough. The wolf's muzzle dropped and Burt's smile widened. Burt figured he could get used to being the muscle god of the school.
1522112221.title: Burt grows bigger than Joel

15221122212.content:
Burt walked out of the showers feeling like he was floating on a cloud, a cloud big enough to carry his weight that is. He strolled back into the weight room as other people stared in awe and envy of him. He got a lot more attention than before and he loved it. Burt entered the weight room again to see what his even bigger muscles could do now. He looked back at the dumbbells but the weight bar next to the rack caught his eye. Burt smiled knowing he could take that bar no problem. He approached the bench and noticed only about fifty pounds of weight were on the bar. The extra weights lied on the side of the bench. Burt knew he could handle fifty easily. It would be a feather to him. He needed to put on some more weight on the bar. He grabbed all the weights and slid them into the bar. The bar looked like it had giagantic blocks on each end. Burt didn't know how much the bar weight now but he didn't care. He was full of confidence that his muscles wouldn't let him down.

Burt lied his massive body on the bench and placed his hands on the bar. He chuckled softly heaved the bar off the bench. As Burt expected, the giant weight felt very little to him. This made Burt grunt happily as he raised the bar up and down for his reps. Burt's biceps swelled to new huge peaks as the bear raised the bar and his chest puffed up to new definiton and power. The workout felt good. Burt could feel the burning of his workout in his chest and arms and he loved it because the burning was similar to the burning sensation from his growths. Burt didn't bother counting the number of reps he was doing. He felt like he could keep doing it forever and his muscles would never tire.

After his hundreth rep, Burt was interrupted by a voice, "Hey there," Burt turned to see it was a familiar face, a lioness. Burt set the bar back into place and stood up on the bench.

"Hey!" greeted Burt. "You're that girl from the lake party."

The lioness nodded. "I thought I'd get a quick workout and that's when I saw you." She then noticed the huge bar Burt was lifting. "Working hard, I see."

"You bet!" Burt replied. He stood up and looked down at the lioness so she could see all his muscle glory. "Gotta keep this body in tip top shape!" Burt then curled his arm downward in front of his chest and flexed his bicep in front of her. The lioness lost breath at this sight. Burt bicep coiled into a bigger ball of muscle than she remembered last time when she touched it. Behind his arm was a set of steel cut abs and pecs. They were more defined and chiseled too. She then looked up to Burt thinking he may have grown a bit taller than the last time she saw him.

"Is it my imagination, or did you get bigger from the last time I saw you?" asked the lioness. Burt got nervous about her suspicion but he knew how to reply.

"Heh, well after I met you and your friends, I felt inspired to get bigger for you!" Burt then smiled and winked making the lioness blush red.

"You're a bit of a flirt, aren't you?"

"That a bad thing?"

"Not at all!"

The two laughed with each other. "You know, I was just about done in here," said Burt. "Want to walk out of here?"

Walking out of a gym with a bodybuilding bear...the lioness thought it was a dream come true. "Sure!" The two walked out of the door and the lioness almost forgot something. "You know...I never got your name."

Burt smiled and offered his meaty hand to her. "I'm Burt."

The lioness accepted his hand which covered her own hand completely in the shake. "I'm Tanya."

Burt and Tanya wandered aimlessly around campus just talking. While people passing by were staring at Burt, Burt didn't notice them. He got lost in his conversation with Tanya. He enjoyed her company. Tanya was smart, funny, and beautiful. Burt couldn't ask for someone better to talk to. Tanya couldn't stop staring at Burt and his frame. The sun beamed down onto Burt fur making his godly muscles glow. Tanya did her best to keep her composure but Burt knew she couldn't stop looking passionately at him. "So, Burt," started Tanya, "What got you started on being big?" Burt didn't know what to say. He didn't want to lie to her but he couldn't say he just ate some mushrooms. He had to hint some truth somehow. Burt had an idea.

"Well, would you believe me that I used to be several feet shorter and fat?" Tanya shook her head and scoffed in disbelief. "It's true! I was short and fat. People would make fun of me and force me to work out." Tanya had trouble picturing Burt as he was before. How could a titan like bear used to be short and chubby bear? It was almost impossible.

"You're kidding!" exclaimed Tanya. "What happened?"

"Well, during the workouts I had a bit of a growth spurt and I took advantage of it!"

"You definitely did! What do the guys who picked you think now?"

"I dunno. I haven't seem them since I got big. But I bet they'd be surprised!" Burt then flexed a bicep playfully to Tanya and she laughed agreeing with him.

Tanya and Burt grew fond of each other on their walk. They got lost in their conversations that they didn't realized they walked to the lake. Tanya took notice and giggled. "We're right back where we started," she said referencing the party. Burt looked out to the crystal sparkling lake and smiled at its beauty. He then smiled at the beauty next to him. Tanya noticed his smiling at her and asked, "What?"

"You know I forgot to do something for you back at the party," said Burt.

"What?"

"Let me show you!" Burt walked Tanya to the shore of the lake and Tanya sat on a spot of grass.

"What did you want to show me?" asked Tanya.

"This!" exclaimed Burt. As Tanya looked on in confusion, she let out a loud gasp as Burt took two steps back towards the water. Witht he sun pouring down on him it made him look like some ancient god, muscles radiating with their power. As he brought his left arm up front front of his chest he stopped. Taking a step forward he pivoted his hips so that he chest remained forward and he flexed his biceps. Those thick mountain like hills of raw muscle exploded with definition. The vascularity at an almost unnatural level as the veins began crisscrossing those biceps. Tanya let out a low whistle and clapped her paws together lightly. "Oh wow! You really know how to put on a show." Burt gave her a wink before a grin spread over his face.

"Hey I'm just getting started." As Tanya stared stared on in awe Burt returned to his starting positon and took a step forward. As he breathed out he brought both both arms up in a classic body builder's pose. Raising both arms until his paws were just above his head and he sucked in a breathe and flexed his entire torso and arms. To Tanya, it was like watching a work of art being created right in front of her eyes. The amount of definition that erupted into life was unbelievable. The veins blew out like thick noodles of spaghetti al over his body. From the massive biceps that were as hard as granite down to his rigid eight pack that could grind meat into fine slices. Burt, this bear before her practically was a god. A real god of muscle, it was absolutely breathtaking.

Burt relaxed his muscles and looked towards Tanya. "What did you think?" asked Burt. Tanya stood up, walked up to him, and placed her left hand on Burt's bulgy abs. Her fingers went up and down his washboard chest feeling the unlimited power they contained. Burt thought Tanya's hand felt good on his chest. It was as warm as his own muscles when he felt them. "I thought you were amazing!" said Tanya. "You definitely know how to show off...and how to show a girl a good time." Burt's cheeks turned red as he grew shy. For such a big guy, Burt felt wobbly when Tanya admires his godly strength.
15221122212.title: Flirt with some girls

152211222121.content:
Tanya and Burt sat on the shore of the lake watching the sun shine on the sparkling water. With the sun's reflection beaming back to their eyes, the lake looked like a pure sapphire. Burt wrapped his vascular arm around Tanya and Tanya hugged his waist. Burt took a deep breath making his chest puff up and more defined. "This is so nice," said Burt. Tanya nodded, "Yeah, I've had a good time with you." She then rubbed her hands against Burt's massive abs making him blush. Tanya giggled, "For a big guy, you can be a bit shy!" Burt returned the laugh. "Only if I see cute girls like you." Tanya then became the one who was blushing.

The two continued staring into the lake until Tanya asked a question. "Say Burt, by any chance, have you ever went professional with your muscles?" Burt wasn't sure how to answer. "Uhh, no, I haven't. To be perfectly honest, I've never competed in bodybuilding competitons or anything like that."

Tanya looked up to him surprised. "Really? Why?"

"Well, I didn't bulk up to compete; I did it to improve myself."

"Ah, I see...I know! How about I take pictures of you so you can see how improved?"

Burt smiled at her. "I'm in!"

Tanya stood up and got in front him blocking the sun. She didn't want glare in the photos. She pulled a smart phone from her pants pocket and held it against her face. Burt stood up and curled his arms. "Ready!"

Tanya snapped at his double bicep pose. His biceps were just as vascular and powerful as his show to Tanya. Burt then puffed up his chest. His pecs and abs bulged into solid stones of granite with thick veins feeding them even more power. Just for fun, Burt put out his right leg and tensed it. The tendons inside thickened and coiled into clean cut tear drop shapes. It looked like his shorts wouldn't be able to contain it (luckily it did). Tanya took photo after photo completely satisfied with each one. With a body like Burt's, it's hard to get a bad shot.

Burt relaxed his muscles and walked towards Tanya. "How do they look?" asked Burt. Tanya said, "Take a look!" She shared her smart phone so Burt could see there was a big and vascular bear taking up most of the screen on the phone! Each photo seemed that way but each showed a solid pose with clear defined and strong muscles. Burt smiled. "I love it! I love them all!" Tanya agreed.

The two continued taking photos until Tanya noticed the sunlight was dimming. A lot of time passed and it was getting dark. "Well, looks like it's getting late," said Burt. Tanya nodded. "Yeah, I should get this photos uploaded on the internet and call it a night." Burt felt nervous about her doing that but at the same time he felt excited. He couldn't wait to see people react to him online.

Tanya stood in front of Burt. "I really had a good time, Burt. You're...you're a really nice guy...and I'm not just saying that because you're big!"

"Well, I think you're great too!" said Burt, "And I'm not saying that because you're cute."

Without thinking, Tanya stood up on her toes and pecked Burt on the cheek. "Have a good night!" she said before walking up the hill to campus. Burt fist pumped himself as a sign of accomplishment.

Before Burt headed home, he visit the mushroom cave once again. He didn't intend on eating any. He walking into the spot and picked up another few in his paw. "Because of these things, my life is getting better!" He put them in a fist and headed home.
152211222121.title: Show off some more

1522112221211.content:
Burt's pleasant sleep was interrupted by a banging on his dorm door. He stood up groggy and grumpy. Who would wake him up at eight o' clock in the morning? "Coming!" said Burt half awake. He rose from bed, stretched his bulging shoulders and rippling back, and walked towards the door without considering changing clothes. Burt opened the door while wearing just his boxers.

"Yeah?" Burt heard a whistle from below. He looked down the see a slender looking lion in suit. The lion looked sharp with his clean blazer, brushed mane, and wide smile. "Man, you are a big fella, aren't you?" said the lion. Burt was confused. "Umm...who are you?" The lion smiled. "I'm the guy who's going to change your life!"

The lion helped himself in to Burt's dorm. "What?" asked Burt. The lion then explained. "My name is Edgar, I'm Tanya's uncle and I wish to speak with you."

Burt's eyes widened leaving all traces of sleepiness. "Tanya's uncle?" Edgar nodded. "Yes sir! You see, Burt, Tanya sent me those photos of you from yesterday and I just so happen to be a modeling sponsor for Galaxy Magazine." Burt's mouth dropped. Galaxy Magazine was the biggest fitness magazine ever! Burt collected those before he found the mushrooms because he would fantasize over how great it would be to be a muscle model. A sponsor from that magazine was in his room!

"R..really?" stuttered Burt. "I read those!"

"I'm glad you do! I'm just going to say it: Burt, I want you be a model for Galaxy Magazine!"

Burt's heart sunk like a rock. He couldn't believe his ears. "Wait," said Burt, "Let me get this straight...you...want me...to be a model?!"

Edgar smiled wider. "Absolutely! I'd be crazy not to ask you! I mean, you're huge! You're one of the biggest guys I've seen! We could you use to be an inspiration to others who want be all muscled up like you!" Burt could see it now, his giant frame on the cover on the biggest fitness magazine and people envying and training to be like him. It sounded like a great opportunity but there was one problem: school. "Well, that sounds like a great honor, sir!" said Burt. "I'd love to! But what about school?"

Edgar waved his hand. "Not to worry! We do our very best to keep your schedule as flexible as possible! You can still be a student or you can work full time with us! We pay very handsomely! You stick with us and you can retire early!"

Burt couldn't believe it! This opportunity was getting better and better by the minute! Without thinking, Burt said, "I'm in! When do I start?!" Edgar clapped his hands with glee. "Fantastic! Ok, this is a bit short notice but we have a shooting later this afternoon at the gym downtown. I will see you there!" Burt nodded agreeing with him. Before Burt could say thank you and goodbye, Edgar made his way to the door and paused. "Oh, almost forgot!" Edgar passed a copy of a magazine to Burt. "Here's the latest issue! Feel free to take a look!" Burt accepted the gift happily and Edgar left the room.

Burt spent the rest of his morning sitting on his bed looking at the magazine. He was so excited that he read it several times. He couldn't help but look at the size of the models in the magazine. They were all about the same size as he was. Then it occurred to him, how can he be a famous model if he looked just like the ones in the magazine? Burt figured he needed to stand out somehow. He then looked at the mushrooms that he placed on his desk after picking them.
1522112221211.title: Start modeling career

15221122212111.content:
Burt walked to his desk, picked up the mushrooms, and stared at them in his meaty paw. Another bite from these and he could turn in the monster of muscle, a behemoth. Burt wasn't sure he wanted that. Or did he? If he grew more, he would stand out more than the other models (who were at his size). People would look up to him in desire and envy. Above all, Burt would be the muscle god of all muscle gods. No one could compare him to his size and strength. No one. He would be in several magazine issues and be the top model. He could even try bodybuilding and be the top dog without really trying. Burt smiled at this fantasy. He looked at the mushrooms again and gobbled them up.

The wait after eating the mushrooms was probably always the most anxious part of the process for Burt. He didn't know he if would grow a little or a lot. He didn't know if it would be painful or soothing, but regardless the changes were going ot be amazing. A few minutes passed before he finally began feeling that familiar pressure in his stomach. He had already stripped off his clothes aside from his boxers to stop himself from destroying any of his clothes in the growth, so he was reayd for it this time. When that first wave of pain hit, he had to grips the table to steady himself.

Each time he made himself grow, the pain seemed to lessen a little each time. Burt had to wonder if the mushrooms would reach a limit and he wouldn't grow anymore once the pain no longer affected him. He gasped loudly as he felt that wonderful heat now flooding through his body and he knew his body was ready to start growing. As usual the growth started in his legs, he wasn't sure why it always began there, but he thought it might be so his legs could support the rest of the body as it expanded.

It was amazing just how much bigger his legs could get. He thought he was massive before, but as he legs throbbed and flexed of their own accord, the muscles began growing even bigger. The teardrop shaped muscles beginning to swell out. It was like a sponge soaking up more liquid.

The more his legs grew, the more incredible they looked. Burt had no doubt he could probably crush a steel bar in his thighs now if he wanted to. He could likely run great distances and not even break a sweat. As the veins began spreading down his legs he had to cry out in a deep growl as a wave of nauseating pain hit him. His spine began cracking audibly in the room and he want faintly aware of himself almost rising from the floor, but it was actually his body growing bigger.

As his torso stretched further to meet the new height of his body, he clenched his abdomen tightly and he bent down on one knee to stop himself from tumbling to the floor. His stomach muscle began flexing hard, those thick ridges, which once seemed like unmovable ridges were suddenly pushing downwards and to his surprise another ridge of muscle began pushing forward until he had an unbeatable ten pack. Right now he was feeling on top of the world. Slowly his body was transforming him into a god that would make everyone he came across swoon.

As the heat spread up to his pecs he had to bite his lip as the muscles began puffing out. Slowly they grew, swelling to the point that I-beams weren't as thick as his rock hard pecs were. As he beat his fist against his chest he was surprised to see they were like steel too. Unyielding even to his own strength.

It was then he felt that burning in his arms and his arm dropped almost immediately. Those biceps began expanding. His arms felt like they were straining against the heaviest weights imaginable. Burt like to imagine that he was bench pressing the mountains themselves to get their raw power as his thirty two inch biceps flexed out to their absolute max. Slowly the vascular veins began spreading across his biceps, pumping that burning hot blood through his biceps while they were swelling. Burt could only watch in awe as they grew inch after inch in size before finally slowing to a stop at thirty six inches. Burt had to sink onto his large paws as he breathed heavily when the growing finally stopped.

When he could stand again, the results were absolutely astounding. No one would ever be able to compete with his muscles. He felt so powerful now. Burt felt like he could probably bench a mountain or two for real. "Oh man. Look out world here I come."
15221122212111.title: Eat the mushrooms

152211222121111.content:
Burt rose up from the floor and looked down his room from his new height. His head almost reached the ceiling of his room. He cracked his neck relieving the remaing tension from his latest growth. He then looked down and around his new godly body and was completely satisfied. Burt placed his right paw on his newly humongous pecs. He could feel they were stonger and tougher than ever. He could even feel his heart pounding harder to feed his muscles with blood and adrenaline.

Burt then reached his abs feeling the bulginess and sheer vascularity they held. He could feel the ridges and veins surrounding his new ten pack abs. He even counted the number of abs to be sure.

Lastly, Burt raised his right arm and pushed hard to form a bicep. It was the biggest muscle he ever saw on anyone. It was a furry and fleshy mountain that reached an impossible peak. Burt could even see thick veins pulsating around it. When bodybuilders have guns, Burt had bombs for muscles and his biceps were like atomic bombs. He placed his left paw on his right bicep and felt the warmth and power erupting from it. His power was umlimited and Burt showed no signs of tireness despite his new growth.

Burt chuckled. "Oh yeah! I'm going to be the biggest model around! I'm the muscle god of all muscle gods! No one can compare to me with this kind of power!" Burt then noticed the time. It was almost time for the modeling shoot! Burt had to admire himself later when he got to the gym because he needed to go immediately. He went through his closet picking up a new pair of elastic gym shorts and a tank top. After a quick change, he was out of the room.

Burt ran off campus and into town very quickly. With his new golden legs, Burt had enough strength and speed to get to the shoot in no time. Burt finally arrived at the front of the gym. He didn't feel tired at all. He wasn't even out of breath. Burt pumped his arm and walked into the gym to start his new life. Inside, there were a couple furs, scales, etc., working out and getting a good pump. One of them is a bull lifting a 300-pound weight, who is almost as big as he is. Looks like his most recent growth spurt made him just a smudge bigger. He was pretty enticed by how pumped and chiseled the bull looked in his blue tank. His arm shriveled up an swelled with great strength with each pump. Guess this is what it's like to be at an actual gym, Burt thought.

"Ah! There's the star attraction!" Burt's ears perked up, hearing Edgar walk up to him. He first takes a moment to check out the hardened bear. "My, this is unexpected."

"What?" Burt raises up both his beefy arms behind his head, arching his upper body forward to flex out his thick pecs and ridged abs. "That I may have gotten a tad larger since we last met?"

"No. That you came here wearing a tank-top. It's not really necessary.", the lion rebuttals. "But that too!" Edgar shows Burt the way, walking up to the center of the gym where a few weight-lifting equipment rested, and where a few cameras stood around. "Gettin' a good idea of where this is going?"

Burt puts on a big grin, "Sure do!" A few of the gym folk start to take looks at the rippling bear as he walks up and sits on a benching equipment. Burt knew his body was ready, and couldn't wait to get it to work! "So what do I gotta do?"

"Oh you know, a few poses here and there, a couple weights being lifted a few times, stuff like that.", Edgar replies excitedly. "Soon as we get these cameras up and running, you can go ahead and give yourself a good pump."

Burt gives his agent a thumbs up, "All-right!"

"So you must be the new model eh?" Burt's eyes immediately lit up wide. That voice... He's heard that voice before. With a mere glance of his eyeballs, he takes a good, long, unexpected look at...his old college teach, Anthony. The bear's jaw went limp. Of everyone in town, HE works out here!? Burt was really worried at this point as sweat drips down his fur, seeing that the ol' was taking a good, long look at him. "You know...you look really familiar. Like an old student of mine."

Burt's eyelid rose higher, his uncertain frown growing deeping. It took him a moment to even mutter a syllable. "...O-...Oh. I-I do...?", he stutters, turning his head away.

"Yeah..." He hums. "You familiar with a kid named Burt Sayer?"

Burt froze for a moment. "......No.", he mutters. "Wha-why do you ask?"

Anthony's expression started to dwindle. "Well, it's just that this old student of mine has been gone for some time. He was my only student, but I guess I kinda overworked him a bit.

Burt continued stuttering hoping to get Anthony's suspicion off of him. "Well, I'll be on the lookout for him. If I see him I'll let you know."

"Thanks!"

Edgar interrupted the two's conversation by talking to Burt. "I've seen you've met our other model." Burt's heart dropped. "Wait, he's a model?" said Burt pointing to Anthony. Edgar nodded. "Yes! And a very good one at that, which is why he's here. If you want, you two can share a shooting and see if we can get some decent shots with the two of you." Burt paused wondering what to do.
152211222121111.title: Go to the model shooting

1522112221211111.content:
"If it's alright with you, Edgar," said Anthony, "I'd like to see what this newcomer can do on his own. With his muscles, his modeling should be promising." Edgar nodded to Anthony and smiled. "That sounds like a good idea! Is that ok with you, big guy?" Burt agreed. He would do anything as long as he was not being interrogated by Anthony.

"Great!" exclaimed Edgar. "First things first, take off your shirt. We're going to need to see that massive chest of yours for the photos." Burt understood. He grabbed the tail of his shirt and pulled it above his head. Edgar, Anthony, and the rest of camera crew were amazed to see how defined and vascular Burt's chest was. It looked like a wall of clean cut diamonds. Burt's abs and pecs flexed without any of Burt's efforts and thick veins pulsated delivering all the power he could ever need. Anthony whistled impressed. "Wow! That's an amazing chest you got there! Never seen anyone with a ten pack before!" The deer then turned to Edgar. "I can see why you picked him."

"Ok, champ," started Edgar, "We're going to start with simple poses and then make our way to the equipment. Doesn't matter which poses you do. Just show us what you got!"

Burt smiled. "It'll be my pleasure!"

Burt raised his right arm doing a simple bicep pose. His bicep swelled to godly proportions as Burt flexed as hard as he could. It erupted with unlimited power and veins snaked across the bicep to insure the power it was losing during the pose. Burt's other bicep showed the same result of vascualrity as he raised his other arm.

Burt then grabbed a dumbbell from the rack near his position. He picked one up labed seven hundred pounds and returned to the cameras. Burt held the dumbbell in front of his chest and started doing reps. Cameras flashed when photographers saw not only his bicep swell under the enormous weight but his chest as well. As Anthony and Edgar thought Burt's chest couldn't get any bigger, it was right before their eyes. His abs and pecs bulged under the pressure making the crevices and the ridges even more defined. Anthony and Edgar couldn't believe it and Burt continued with a sly smile on his face.

Burt then noticed a weighed bar on the side of the shooting site. He quickly grabbed feeling confident that he could lift it. Cameras began flashing more as Burt did some reps with the bar. Burt wanted to do more. The bar felt incredibly light to him so he lifted it up above his head with ease. Photographers began to blind him so they could savor the incredible feat. But they haven't seen anything yet. Burt then released one hand from the bar and did another bicep flex. Cameras flashed everywhere. Edgar never seen a model perform such a feat before, even Anthony had his mouth dropped. Everyone wanted a piece of the muscle god and Burt was happy to share himself with the crowd.

Burt then put the weight down and stretched his arms and back making his arms and chest puff up even more and the cameras flash a few times. "Okay! That's enough!" Edgar yelled to the photographers. Edgar rushed to Burt. "Th...that was amazing! I've never seen a model as big as you work so well with the cameras! Your poses were perfect! Every last one! You have a future in this business, my friend!" Burt blushed but he had a strong sense of pride brewing inside him. He knew he could deliver an excellent shooting and he did. Burt was so excited to have such a positive future for himself and he knew it was only going to get better from here. Anthony looked at Burt and gave him a thumbs up. "You're gonna go far, newbie!"
1522112221211111.title: Pose alone

15221122212111111.content:
Burt blushed from all the attention he was getting from Edgar, Anthony, and the rest of the photo shoot crew. Burt never thought he would get so much praise before, let alone from Anthony. Burt rubbed the back of his head unintentionally bugling the arm he used to reach it. "Thanks guys," said Burt. "I'm glad you guys enjoyed the show!" Edgar snapped his fingers and turned to Anthony. "Say, Anthony, why don't you get ready for a shoot and show the new guy a few pointers?" Anthony smiled. "I would love to!"

"Excellent, I already got your things in the locker room. Go ahead and get changed." Anthony walked away to the locker room and Edgar turned his attention to the titan bear. "You go ahead, take a rest, and get ready for the show Anthony's going to put on!" Burt had to admit. Despite Anthony's treatment towards him, Burt was curious on how Anthony works as a model. What kind of poses will he do? How big is Anthony? All his questions would be answered in a few minutes.

Anthony came back wearing nothing but a pair of spandex shorts and sneakers. The big deer had a solid defined chest with six pack abs and bowling ball sized pecs. Connected to his chest were tree trunk like legs that could kick a hole into anything and vascular arms that could lift anything. Burt was impressed. Although Anthony was nowhere near as big as Burt, Anthony had a good body to model. “Show us what you got, Anthony!” said Edgar.

Cameras started flashing the moment Anthony put on a smile. Anthony raised his arms and pushed them to incredible feats of definition and strength. Veins snaked across Anthony’s biceps to deliver the energy the deer needed to continue his modelling. Anthony then crunched his chest making his pecs and abs bulge and expand right out of his chest. He then took a deep breath and raised his hands behind his head to show off more definition and vascularity of his chest. Cameras went off like fireworks that Burt couldn’t see what Anthony was doing. Whatever it was, it must have been good because the cameras flashed for a solid three minutes.

“Take five, everyone!” Edgar yelled to the photographers. The photographers mingled as Anthony walked towards Edgar and Burt. Edgar chuckled and said, “You never cease to amaze me!”

“I do what I can. What did you think, newbie?”

Burt had to admit he was pretty impressed. Even though Anthony was not as big in muscle as Burt was, Anthony performed some great poses which would make fantastic photos. “I think you did good,” said Burt. “You’re definitely a model.”

Anthony chuckled. “Well so are you! I’m definitely looking forward to modelling with you someday!” Burt hoped it wouldn't happen anytime soon. He was worried Anthony would recognize him.

“Well,” started Edgar, “How about you guys take a break so you can get ready for the party.”

Burt’s ears perked. “What? What party?”

“Your party!” Edgar smiled. “We’re throwing a welcome party for you after joining the magazine! All of the top models of the magazine will be there and I know everyone is looking forward to seeing a big bear like you!” Burt blushed rubbing the back of his head making his chest and arm unintentionally ripple.

Anthony grabbed Burt's shoulder and added, "It's also a pool party! It's at this exclusive penthouse the magazine owns and it has a pool. Perfect place to show off!" Burt loved the idea of showing off the actual models. With his size and strength, Burt knew he will blow everyone's mind at the party. It was a party for him. Burt never had a party for himself before. He couldn't help but be excited.

Burt pumped his arms and said, "Let's party hard!"
15221122212111111.title: Anthony goes next

152211222121111111.content:
As the car turned into the winding side road that led to the house where the party was at Burt felt a bit nervous. He had never had a party dedicated to him before. It was strange that not that long ago he was just a nameless bear in a crowd of college students and now here he was, one of the biggest bears around with muscles that could rival that of a god getting a party just for being so muscular. At the same time he was excited, he usually never went to parties like this... heck until he started eateing the mushrooms, the thought never crossed his mind, but now he was eager to have a good time and to really show off his body.

As the car passed through a small thicket of trees the house finally came into view. Resting at the end of the street surrounded by a beautiful looking stone fence sat the luxurious looking home. With deep blue walls and a light shade of a color Burt couldn't identify was used for the cermic tiles that made up the roof. It looked like a place a wealthy business owner would live so it made sense for the party to be at a place owned by such a popular magazinePull.

Pulling in to an arch the car made a stop next to a few other cars of similar design and color. It seemed like a lot of the models were driven around to parties like this. Though that made some sense to Burt. If they started drinking they would need a driver to take them home instead of getting hurt in a crash. Burt reached for the handle and pulled on it, the lock poping open and he stepped out. Out in the warm sunshine and the crisp clean air, Burt could smell the smoke of burning charcoal and mixed scent of cooking meat wafting on the wind from behind the house. It made his stomach growl with a fierce intensity that came from a need to fuel such a large body.

Burt followed the scent to the backyeard of the house. Burt's eyes and mouth widened from the size of the yard. It was the biggest yard he has ever seen. There were lush green grass and trees following the stone walls of the yard, a massive pool and hot tub occupying most of the space, and a giant patio where hired cooks were preparing food on grills. Burt also couldn't help but be amazed at the guests of the party. There were men and women of various sizes and shapes. There was muscular tiger socializing with other muscled furs and a lean slender looking cheetah girl in a bikini ready for a swim in the pool. Burt knew all the guests were all models just like him. Burt smiled ready to meet them all. He pumped a bicep to himself and walked to the main event.

As Burt walked across the yard, he noticed Edgar talking to Anthony on the patio. Burt figured he meet Edgar first just to let him know he arrived. Burt walked up to Edgar until his hulking shadow covered Edgar. Edgar knew where the shadow came from and turned. "There's the guest of honor!" exclaimed Edgar. "Glad you could make it!"

Burt smiled. "Glad to be here! I would never miss this!"

"I see you're ready to have a good time," said Anthony referring to Burt's swim trunks hugging Burt's massive thighs and no shirt to hide the power in his chest.

"Of course! You said this was a pool party and what better place to show off than that?" said Burt pumping a bicep to the two.

"Great to hear!" said Edgar. "Come on, let's introduce you to the family!" Edgar walked to the front of the pool and Burt followed nervously. Burt wasn't used to having so much attention but at the same time he was excited to start a new chapter in his life. "Attention all!" yelled Edgar to the other models. The models stopped and turned to Edgar and noticed the giant bear standing next to him. "I'm glad you all could make it and hope you're having a great time. But allow me to introduce you to a big addition to our model family, and I mean BIG!" Edgar pointed to Burt. "This is Burt. As you can see, he's got what it takes to make our magazine even better! I hope you all can welcome him!" Edgar then turned to Burt. "Say, Burt, why don't you show them what you can do!"

Burt smiled and looked out to the audience. He raised both his arms and pushed his biceps as hard as he could. His arms swelled and grew to impossible peaks with veins stretching across. Burt then swung his arms to below his abs and tensed his chest making his pecs and abs bulge even more in definition and vascularity. Burt could see the male models looking in envy and females looking in desire. Burt finished posing and the models cheered and clapped for him. Edgar yelled to the audience, "Welcome, Burt!" Burt felt truly happy and like he belonged for the first time.
152211222121111111.title: Go to the party

1522112221211111112.content:
Burt felt the warm welcome come from everywhere at the party. He thought the welcome was almost as big as his muscles...almost. Burt could see male models hanging out and showing off their muscles while female models were swimming in the pool and chatting on the patio. Burt didn't know where to start. Without knowing what else to do, Burt walked amongst the crowd.

Burt walked by the other party goers. He noticed stares from other models about his size and muscles. He playfully held out his bicep where he could hear small gasps and whispers saying, "How did he get so big? Where did he come from? How can I get that big?" Burt just chuckled to himself and continued walking around.

"My, you're a big bear, aren't you?" Burt turned and almost blushed red in his cheeks. The muscular bear noticed a slender tigress in a bikini standing in his tall shadow. The tigress was not muscular but she had a lean body with little to no fat anywhere. Her stripes wrapped around her waist nicely and her tail playfully jerked from side to side.

"Uh, um, yeah, thanks," stuttered Burt. He held out his paw to her. "I'm Burt."

The tigress shook Burt's paw. "Kim," she replied. "So Edgar got you into modelling, huh? Can't say I blame him. You definitely look that part."

"Thanks. You look pretty good too."

"Huh, aren't you sweet?" Kim teased. "Thanks. I might not be one of the muscular models but I get some decent photos if I do say so myself."

"Yeah, I bet."

"Say, I was just about to hang out with some of my friends at the hot tub. Care to join us? I can introduce to some of the models here."

Burt's heart secretly dropped. Being in a hot tub with female models? It was a dream come true for him. "Yeah, sure," said Burt. "Sounds fun!" Kim motioned with her hand for Burt to follow her as she turned around and started walking past the male models who were chatting at the wooden table. As Burt passed some stopped to watch and he couldn't help looking away, instead focusing on Kim as she walked towards an above ground small bubbling pool with steam rising off the surface. There were already several female models relaxing in the water or were actively chatting with each other before they came to a stop when Kim arrived.

"Hey, I asked Burt if he wanted to join us and to relax for a bit, you mind making room for two more?" Most of the girls shook their heads as they scooted out of the way and Kim took the first step up and over the side and sank into the hot water, a soft sigh escaping from her. "Yea... now this is how you relax... come on Burt get in." Burt nodded his head a bit nervously. He'd never been in a hot tub with anyone before, much less one full of several very beautiful models.

He had to take a breath to steady his nerves when he finally took a step up and over the side. When his leg sank into the steaming hot water he took a moment to steady himself ont he side before slipping his other leg into the water and he slipped down, although even sitting down the water only came up to his chest. The heat soaked into every pore of his body and he tilted his head back, feeling the bundle of tension unknotting itself and relaxing at the water jets sprayed his back with a soothing pressure. It really was quite an amazing feeling, one he thoroughly enjoyed. It was like getting a massage and on this body it was almost electric in feeling.

Burt let out a big sigh. "This feels great," said Burt. "This makes my muscles feel so relaxed," he added teasingly. One of the girls with him giggled and said, "Hope they don't make you feel too relaxed." Burt smiled and raised his arm out of the water to flex it. The girls were in awe of the power in his arm. It grew to massive peaks and definition. The female models never seen a bicep that big before. Burt stroked his bicep and said, "Nope, still very strong!" The girls giggled and rushed to feel the amazing power surging through his muscles. They touched every peak, vein, and crevice. Burt loved this type of attention. He never thought that usch beautiful women would ever notice him and now they couldn't get enough of him. The big bear felt very proud of himself.

After talking for a half hour, Kim said, "I have to say Burt, you're pretty fun to hang out with!"

Burt blushed and replied, "Thanks."

"Say Burt, Edgar got me a new photo shoot at the beach next week. He said I'll need a male model for the shoot. You want in?" The hot tub got even hotter to Burt. Going on a beach with a beautiful model? Who could say no to that? Burt couldn't contain his excitement.

"Yeah! Sure, that sounds like fun!"

"Great! After the party I'll let Edgar know and we'll have a great time!"

One of the girls then said, "I call dibs on him on my next shoot!" Burt and the other girls began to laugh.
1522112221211111112.title: Flirt with the female models

15221122212111111122.content:
Burt felt like he was on top of the world. He just signed up for a model shoot with the top female model of the magazine he now works for. He felt great. However his pride was interrupted with a loud grumbling coming from his rippling abs. All the girls in the tub heard it and giggled. Burt couldn't help but blush. "Sorry...guess I'm a bit hungry."

"I bet you are!" said Kim. "You need a lot of food to keep those muscles in top shape." Burt excused himself from the tub and got out to get some food. As he was walking to the food tables, Burt noticed a group of male models surrounding a table. Burt walked over to see what was going on and he saw a muscular tiger and lion sitting in front of several plates with piles of hot dogs.

Burt asked a nearby model, "What's going on?"

"Hot dog eating contest!" said the model. "You want in?" Burt heard his stomach rumble again and smiled. "Count me in!"

"Great! Be careful! It's a lot of food!"

"Don't worry, I got a big appetite!" Burt walked to the table and took his seat next to the lion. The audience then did the countdown. "Ready....set...GO!" The moment it started, Burt had his paws flying over the hotdogs grabbing two or three as a time and simply jamming them into his mouth, his teeth gnashing the bread and meat into a saliva drenched mixture before he swallowed and moved onto the next one.

At one point he began swallowing the hotdogs in bits and pieces or even whole when he found himself starting to slip behind their numbers. Though it seemed no matter how many hot dogs he ate, Burt was still absolutely ravenous. It was like his body just couldn't get enough food and whatever he ate simply burnt up in his stomach to fuel his ever growing body and it just fueled his desire to eat even more. Beside him he could see that the lion was starting to slow down, his bites were taking longer and he looked like he was starting to have to force himself to keep swallowing. On the other side of the table sat a rather muscular horse that looked almost as starved as he was, just shoveling down two at a time.

Burt didn't to be outdone by anyone, even if that meant getting a stomach ache later he would push himself as hard as he could. Burt started crushing two or three hotdogs and pushing them in together and started chewing them up as fast he could. This went on for another thirty minutes. In that time the lion dropped out and so did a rather large wolf who had been sitting at the end of the table.

It all came down to Burt versus the horse, but it looked like even the horse was showing signs of slowing down, meanwhile Burt continued to push down as many hotdogs as he could his stomach seemingly a bottomless pit as his body hungrily took in everything he swallowed.

A model raised Burt's giant arm and shouted, "We have a winner!" Burt stood up from the table and posed in victory. The audience cheered as Burt felt a slight warmth going through his body. He could feel his muscles tingle slightly as bulged a little. The audience didn't notice but Burt could feel his muscles growing slightly more powerful. Burt knew immediately that it was the result of the food he ate. All the food went to his muscles to make him stronger. Burt smiled and raised an slightly bigger bicep.
15221122212111111122.title: Continue with the party

1522112221212.content:
Despite the straining of his bed due to his massive weight, Burt slept great. He arose from his bed stretching and flexing his muscled body. He then rubbed his pecs and abs feeling that they were solid as ever. Burt felt energized and ready for the day. He went through his closet to pick another pair of elastic gym shorts and a bigger tank top. As he put them on, they felt like they were a second layer of skin. His clothes felt tight against Burt’s skin, but Burt didn’t mind. He could still see clear definition underneath his clothes, which he thought mattered. Burt then began to think about what he should do for the day. Meet with Tanya? Go to the school gym? Hang out with other muscle guys (but not as big)? Burt felt like he wanted to burn some of the energy his body was storing but with his being the big guy on campus it might be too easy for him. Burt then remembered there was another gym in town where bodybuilders usually train. Surely he would find some challenge and competition there. It was decided. Before leaving to the gym, Burt grabbed the mushrooms from his desk and stuffed them in a gym bag he prepared.

Burt rushed to the gym with his powerful legs in a matter of minutes. He didn’t feel out of breath at all. In fact, he was more motivated to burn some energy. He stepped in and was surprised to see several muscular guys in the gym training. There were lions, dragons, wolves, even a bull and they were all heavy lifting huge weights that even Burt wasn’t sure he could lift. But he had to take a chance. He walked into the weight room and grabbed an eight hundred dumbbell of the rack. The weight was heavy but Burt thought it was a good weight to train with.

Burt started with one dumbbell. He grabbed it in his right paw and placed his other paw on his right bicep. Between reps, Burt could his bicep swelling and relaxing as the dumbbell was raised up and down. He could feel a burning sensation all over his arm and Burt smiled. The burning felt good. It reminded of him of his muscle growths. After he felt like his arm had enough, Burt switched to his other paw. Burt thought he was getting a very good workout and thought he might even build some decent muscle without the mushrooms.

“I haven’t seen you around before,” Burt looked up and found a massive bull standing in front of him. He was about the same size as the big bear. Burt paused his workout and stood up to the bull. “Um…yeah,” said Burt. “I’m new here and I thought I’d give this gym a try.” The bull nodded. “I’m glad you did. This gym is occupied by most bodybuilders. We have the best equipment for them.”

“I never expected it to be so crowded,” said Burt.

“Eh, everyone’s just here to get ready for a big competition coming up next month,” said the bull.

Burt’s ears perked up at the sound of that sentence. “There’s a bodybuilding competition coming?”

“Yeah, it’s in one month and everybody’s trying to get as big as they can for it.” The bull looked at Burt’s muscles and was impressed. “You look like you could be ready for it.”

Burt’s heart sunk. “Wh…what?! Really?”

The bull nodded. “Yeah, I think you can do it. I just so happen to be a sponsor for the competition. I can squeeze you in if you want.” Burt couldn’t believe his ears. An opportunity to show off his muscles and win money for it…it sounded like a dream come true! With his body Burt knew he could win. “Yeah,” exclaimed Burt. “That sounds awesome!”

“Oh come on, Terry. Don’t get his hopes up!” The two turned to rather large hyena. The bull, which was referred to as Terry, coiled his hand to a fist and frowned at the hyena. Burt wasn’t sure what was going on but he could tell by the tone of the hyena’s voice, Burt didn’t like him. “Go away, Harry,” said Terry. “I don’t want you to intimidate the other competitors.”

Harry chuckled, “I’m not here to intimidate; I’m here to tell the truth and I’m telling you that little bear cub doesn’t stand a chance! He’s only a few inches shorter and we know the biggest is going to win the competition, which will be me!”

“Little bear cub?!” Burt gritted his teeth feeling his blood boil inside his body. Terry clenched his fist, “Harry, keep this up and I’ll remove you from the competition.” Harry waved his hands calmly. “Ok, ok, I’ll see you guys later!” Harry left laughing to himself.

Terry turned to Burt again, “Ignore Harry. He’s just a cocky hyena who thinks he’s all that because he won last year’s competition.” Terry poked his meaty finger on Burt’s chest. “You get in that competition and prove that arrogant hyena that he doesn’t own the place!” Burt smiled and nodded. “It will be my pleasure!”
1522112221212.title: Start bodybuilding career

15221122212121.content:
Harry's insult echoed through Burt's head, "little bear cub." The more Burt thought about it, the more angry towards the hyena he got. Who did that arrogant dog think he was? Burt knew he was bigger than he was...by a couple of inches. Burt knew he had to beat Harry at his own game. But how can an amateur like Burt beat a champion. Burt's face lit up with a smile as he remembered the mushrooms he packed before heading towards the gym. Time for another growth spurt.

"Say Terry," said Burt, "I'm going to the locker room to get changed. I'll be right back."

Terry nodded. "Ok, I might be gone by the time you get back. If I don't see you, I'll see you at the competition!"

Burt waved goodbye to Terry and headed to the locker room to "change." Unlike his last locker room experience, the room was packed with other bodybuilders getting ready to train. It was too crowded to grow. Burt turned to his left and saw a door leading to another room. There was a sign of the side of the door saying "Sauna." Burt walked into the room finding no one inside. Perfect.

Burt took out the mushrooms from his gym bag and stared at them at the palm of his meaty hand. He looked at the mushrooms like a crystal ball as if he could see his future. Burt saw himself bigger than any other bodybuilder, not just Harry. With his new size and strength, Burt thought he could win any competition without really trying. All it would take was a simple bicep flex. He would truly be a muscle god of all muscle gods. Burt shoved the mushrooms in his mouth and swallowed them whole.

He knew he had to wait a little bit for the mushrooms to take effect. Burt felt excitement burning intensely in his gut. He couldn’t wait to see Harry’s reaction of a bigger and tougher bear. However, Burt's burning anticipation was overpowered by another burning sensation in his gut. Burt smiled knowing his growth was about to happen.

The warmth in Burt's stomach quickly turned into intense heat and spread across to the rest of his body from finger to toe. Burt then felt cramps all over making him bend over to the floor on his hands and knees. Though through the intense pain, Burt still held his smile. The power growing inside him was almost intoxicating. Burt flinched when he felt his spine. arm bones, and leg bones shifting and crunching into a new size. His bones grew larger and thicker to make room for more muscle.

Burt felt his legs first. His already godlike legs bulged into new vascularity and definition. His teardrop thigh muscles thickened and his calves coiled into an even bigger shape. Burt then held his stomach as the cramps moved their way up to his abs and pecs. The crevices between his pecs and abs grew deeper as they swelled. They grew more clean cut defined than a solid wall of diamonds. Burt could even feel new muscles pushing against his skin and fur underneath his abs. A new set of abs was formed giving him an incredible new ten pack. His pecs then blew up like a pair of balloons growing more outward from his chest. They stopped to where they almost reached Burt's chin. Thick snake like veins emerged and pulsated across his chest looking like lightning bolts from a storm. Burt then felt his arms growing hot. He could tell his heart was racing by seeing the veins on his arms pumping blood faster than ever. Burt's biceps and triceps grew more powerful inch by inch. Burt sensed even more strength going into his arms. Back to his previous growth, he thought he could lift mountains. Now, he felt like he lift the entire world on his monstrous shoulders. His arms settled after reaching a solid forty three inches.

Burt began to feel his body cooling down. The growth was over but his energy knew no limit. Burt slowly lifted himself up from the ground. As he stood up, he noticed his head almost reached the ceiling of the sauna. Burt smiled at this new size and turned his attention to his arms. He grinned to see they were the biggest and strongest arms in the world. He placed his left paw on his right bicep and flexed his bicep. The tendons in his bicep shifted to a new height and Burt squeezed them to see they were harder than anything on earth.

Burt then noticed he still had his tank top on. He smiled wanting to see his newly developed chest. Burt reached for the collar of his shirt and pulled, tearing the tank top right in the middle.
