Burt gasped to feel a ten pack on his chest and pecs that were the size of mountains. Burt didn't need a mirror to know that he truly looked like a muscle god.

Burt chuckled in a new deeper tone. "Little bear cub?" he repeated from Harry, "I'm thinking muscle god of all muscle gods!" Burt began flexing his arms and crunching his chest to perform several poses. Burt knew each pose was as glorious as the last one. "Nothing can truly stop me now!" said Burt to himself. "I got this competition in the bag!"
15221122212121.title: Eat mushrooms

15221122212122.content:
Burt smiled picturing Harry's arrogant smile wiped off when Burt won the competition. But Burt was at a disadvantage. He never participated in a bodybuilding competition. He didn't know how to beat Harry let alone what to do on stage. Burt may look the part but he feared he couldn't deliver the victory.

"You ok," asked Terry noticing Burt's face of nervousness.

"Umm..." Burt stuttered, "To be perfectly honest, I've never been in a competition before. I have no idea what to do."

Terry put his hand on Burt's giant shoulder. "Don't worry, I can show you the ropes."

"Really?!"

"Yeah. I would love to see you win over that hyena. You're gonna snatch that trophy right from under his nose!"

"How? Do you think I can be big enough to beat him?"

Terry chuckled. "It's not about the size of your muscles that win a contest; it's how you display them in your poses. If you show off the right way, not only would you stand a chance at winning but you'll also look bigger in front of the audience and judges." Burt never thought of it that way. He always thought that the biggest guy with the biggest guns won. He didn't know posing played a major role.

"So, how can I train then?" asked Burt.

"We're going to work on your poses," said Terry. "I'll show you the best ones you can do that'll show off all your muscles the right way! Follow me."

Burt followed the big bull out of the weight room and took him to a room that a full sized mirror that took up one whole wall. Terry clapped his hands. "Alright! Let's do this!" Terry strutted forward as he took Burt by the arm and moved him closer to the mirrors. "The first one is very simple, plus it looks great when done right. You'll look like a god among men." Burt could scarely believe he'd heard that from Terry. He know he had been comparing himself to a god of muscles earlier, but to have the bull confirm that and tell him it could be done well.. it realy got Burt excited to learn.

"I can't wait ot start! What do i start with first?" Terry chuckled as he patted Burt on the back and pinched the shirt ont he collar a bit.

"First. you're going to learn about showcasing. A lot of bodybuilders when they first come out to greet the people watching, they like to make a show of it. It helps get he fans excited and doing well here can earn you some major points later on if the fans favor you and what you do."

"Cool!. So what should i do?"

"I think you should practice stripping off your shirt. A slow reveal gets fans revved up to see what's under that tight shirt and leaves them wanting more afterwards." Burt moved his paws up and gripped the collar of his shirt and began pulling on it when Terry grasped his paw and stopped him. "Whoa there, heh take it easya nd slow down some. If you g too fast the fans won't be as rapt in attention as they could be and you'll gain less attention later on. Try crossing your arms as you grip the shirt from the corners of the front of your shirt."

Letting go of his collar, Burt slowly brought his arms down and crossed them, his fingers gripping the corners of each side of the shirt. The the he held it felt strange to him, but he wasn't one to doubt somebody much more experience at this than he was.

"Alright perfect. Now slowly.. ease the shirt up. it helps build suspense for the fans. They will absolutely eat it up and will clamor for more from you." As Tery instructed Burt began sliding the shirt up, making sure to go slowly as he revealed his torso a couple inches at a time, untilt he shirt was almost entirely off his body. "Great job so far Burt! Now as you're bringing it off your head, flex those biceps a bit. Give them audiance a taste of what you can bring and they'll come back for more everytime."

Burt had to close his eyes for a moment as the shirt came up over his head. Whiel the fabric was starting to slip over his ears he began flexing his biceps, pushing them out to their absolute peak, the massive slabs of muscle exploding in their incredibly definition as the shirt finally slide off his head and he dropped he arms. "How was that?"

Terry clapped loudly as he lifted up Burt's arm and gavehis right bicep a nice firm squeeze. "Very nice! Those are some incredible biceps you have. I can't even squeeze my fingers into them." Burt felt a small tinge of pink burn onto his cheeks as he nodded his head.

"Thanks. That means a lot coming from you." Terry gave Burt a wink before cupping Burt's tricep with his hand.

"Glad to hear it. I only have one suggestion. When you're pulling off your shirt, don't fully flex your biceps." This caused a confused stare to appear on Burt's face as he shook his head.

"How come?"

"If you show off everything your guns have to offer, then it won't be as exciting to the fans when the competition really starts. This game is all about showmanship. You gotta hold back a bit until the end. At the end game you give it all you got and really put on a show that the fans will remember. If you do that I have no doubts you'll win."

Burt felt really flattered and inspired. He felt like he really had a chance to win this competition. "Thanks Terry. You've been a great help. One question though...does the size of your muscles really matter?"

"Of course!" said Terry, "But that's not what it's about. Lots of bodybuilders forget that posing is just as important as working out. That's why people like Harry exist and he only one last year out of luck." Terry then poked at Burt's pecs. "But you have both the looks and the skills. You can do it, Burt....I believe in you."

Burt thought his heart grew as big as his muscles. "Thanks Terry. I'll make you proud."
15221122212122.title: Train

152211222121221.content:
Burt was now filled with support and confidence. He felt like he could take the competition right here and now. He pictured himself holding a trophy above his head. Burt even went so far as to picture Harry pouting on the side of the stage while Burt is still flexing for a crowded audience. Burt had the competition in the bag. He knew it. However, his fantasy was put to a halt when a rumbling noise came from Burt's rippling eight pack. Terry laughed and Burt blushed from embarrassmet. "Looks like all that training left you hungry!" said Terry. "Come on, there's a little cafe just near the weight room." Burt looked up to Terry. "This gym has a cafe?" Terry chuckled and nodded. "Yeah, you'd be amazed what's here."

Burt followed Terry to the cafe. As they were walking, Terry said, "It's also very important that you eat! When you train, you're stressing your body and needs a lot of food to keep it going...and I mean A LOT."

"How much is a lot?" asked Burt.

Terry turned and observed Burt's frame. "Judging by your size...I'd say you could scarf down two whole pizzas." Burt was surprised to hear that. Two whole pizzas? How can anyone eat that much. He knew if anyone saw him eat that much before his growth they'd call him a "fatty." Now eating that much is essential? Burt smiled thinking to himself how much he loves being big.

Terry and Burt finally made it to the cafe. Luckilly there was no line to stop them from getting their food quickly. Terry ordered two steak specials and they took their spot at an empty table near the window peeking at the weight room. A female otter waitress arrived with two plates and placed them in front of the muscle men. Burt couldn't believe it. He counted four steaks on his plate and on Terry's. How could either of them eat this much.

Terry already began eating when Burt asked, "Umm...don't you think this is a bit too much?" Terry shook his head and swallowed a bite. "Not at all. Trust me, you'll need the protein to keep your energy up and with this competition coming up you'll need a lot of energy. I don't want you wearing out while on stage." Burt cut of piece of his first steak and nodded. "Yeah, I know. I'm just not used to these large portions is all."

Terry's eyes widened. "Really? Then how did you get so big? You must have been eating larger portions to keep in shape." Burt didn't want to lie to Terry about how he got so big. Terry was so proud of him and Burt didn't want to crush him by saying he ate some magical mushrooms but he could never lie. "Umm...I have my own regimen," said Burt. Terry didn't bother going further into the conversation as he told Burt to eat all his steaks before they got cold. As long as it meant Terry's not knowing Burt's secret, Burt felt fine.

Burt managed to eat all of his steaks. It was a lot easier than he thought it was going to be. He guess he had a biggeer appitite that he had to deal with for now on. Even after finishing off their food they sat around for a while. Burt assum,ed it was to let his stomach settle, afterall you weren't supposed to go running around after having such a big meal which was fine for Burt. This gave him a good time to get to know Terry a bit more. If he was going to be working with him like this, he had to know more about him. it'd be rude not to ask. "So... what made you get into bodybuilding?"

Terry scratched the back of his head before resting his paws on the table in front of him. "Just jumping right into it hm? Well.. It wasn't exactly my idea to get into it at first." Burt shook his head a bit in confusion.

"It wasn't?" Terry shook his head as a smal smile spread over his face.

"Nope my dad made me when I was younger. Of course it was mainly to 'teach his son to be a man' as he called it.. and more than a little part of that was he wanted a son on a pro football team." Burt sat forward a bit, He was very curious to know how he went from training for football to becoming a very successful bodybuilder.

"Did you join the team?" Terry gave a small nod, though it seemed a little hesitent.

"Yea.. I did, but I honestly didn't enjoy it. The game was fine, I just felt like I wouldn't get anywhere. In the gym though.. I loved working out, always striving to break my old max and become even stronger. I practically lived at the local gym I had when I was growig up, so it's no surprise I met my first body building manager there. Bryan Harriet. One of the biggest panthers I'd ever seen." Burt grin as he flexed a bicep while listening to Terry.

"Was he as big as me?" Terry laughed as he shook his head,

"No he wasn't, but he was pretty close. He proposed an offer to me for competing professionally in competitions. Suffice to say the idea of showing off all my hard work really appealed to me. I quit the football team almost immediately after that first day I met Bryan."

"What did your dad think of you quitting the team?"

"I didn't tell him until after my first competition. Of course it happened to coincide with the first match of the season for my old team. He wasn't too happy to learn at the game that I'd quit a week or so before the game." Terry had a big grin on his face as he leaned back a bit. "Although the look on his face when I came home with a medal and a two thousand dolllar check as a prize was absolutely priceless. I don't think I ever saw his anger fizzle out faster." Terry laughed heartily and soon Burt had joined him. It wasn't hard to get sucked into it. Laughter was infectious and easy to spread.

"What about you?" asked Terry to Burt. "How did you get started?"

Burt's heart sunk. He had to tell white lies again. "Well, believe it or not I used to be a fat kid."

Terry's mouth dropped. "You're kidding!"

Burt shook his head. "Nope! I also got picked on by other kids because I was fat. One guy in particular even forced me into working out because he didn't like the way I look."

"That sucks. What happened?"

"Well, while I was working out, I got myself a growth spurt. I saw myself making progress faster so I just kept at it." Burt flexed a bicep to Terry. "As you can see, it payed off!"

The two laughed and Terry said, "Indeed it has! I must say, you're probably one of the biggest guys I've seen so far. You stay in shape and you'll win this upcoming competition! Who knows? Maybe you'll get into the big leagues!"

Burt blushed. "You really think I can go pro?"

"I know so!"

Burt never felt so supported before in his life. It was as if Terry was giving him additional strength to his mountain of muscle. Burt know felt like he could do anything. He was ready for the competition.
